analyzed: paññā pariyosānam tatas uttari karaṇīya abhāvataḥ ādi pariyosāna dassanena ca sabbe buddha guṇā

original: dassitāva honti. Karuṇāgahaṇena ca sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito
analyzed: dassitā ava honti karuṇā gahaṇena ca sīla kkhandha pubbaṅgamaḥ samādhi kkhandhaḥ dassitaḥ

original: hoti. Karuṇānidānañhi sīlaṃ tato pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito tassā ca jhānattayasampayogato.
analyzed: hoti karuṇā nidānam hi sīlam tatas pāṇa atipāta ādi virati pavattito tassā ca jhāna ttaya sampayogato

original: Paññāvacanena paññākkhandho. Sīlañca sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhaṃ, paññā
analyzed: paññā vacanena paññā kkhandho sīlañca sabba buddha guṇānaṃ ādi samādhi majjham paññā

original: pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti.
analyzed: pariyosānam ti evam pi ādi majjha pariyosāna kalyāṇā sabbe buddha guṇā dassitāḥ honti

original: 2. Evaṃ saṅkhepena sabbabuddhaguṇehi bhagavantaṃ thometvā yassā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo,
analyzed: evam saṅkhepena sabba buddha guṇehi bhagavantam thometvā yassā saṃvaṇṇanam kattu kāmaḥ

original: tāya abhidhammadesanāya aññehi asādhāraṇāya thometuṃ “dayāya tāyā”tiādimāha. Tassā
analyzed: tāya abhidhamma desanāya aññehi asādhāraṇāya thometum dayāya tāya ati ādim āha tassā

original: pana desanāya nidānañca samuṭṭhānañca dassetuṃ “dayāya tāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nidānañca
analyzed: pana desanāya nidānam ca samuṭṭhānañca dassetum dayāya tāya atiādi vuttam nidānam ca

analyzed: desanā paññā tattha abbhantara nidānam dassento dayāya tāya sattesu samussāhita mānasaḥ ti

original: āha. Tattha dayāti karuṇā adhippetā. Tāya hi samussāhito abhidhammakathāmaggaṃ sampavattayīti.
analyzed: āha tattha dayā iti karuṇā adhippetā tāya hi samussāhitaḥ abhidhamma kathā maggam sampavattayi iti

original: Tāyāti ayaṃ ta-saddo pubbe vuttassa paṭiniddeso hoti.
analyzed: tāya iti ayam ta saddo pubbe vuttassa paṭiniddesaḥ hoti

original: Purimagāthāya ca padhānabhāvena paññā niddiṭṭhā, tabbisesanabhāvena karuṇā. Sā hi
analyzed: purima gāthāya ca padhāna bhāvena paññā niddiṭṭhā tad visesana bhāvena karuṇā sā hi

analyzed: tassāḥ nidassana bhūtā appadhānā tam visesetvā vinivattā tasmā tāya ati paṭiniddesam

analyzed: ca paṭiniddeso na yutto ti paññāya tāva paṭiniddeso na yutto ti su vuttam etam karuṇāya

original: pana paṭiniddeso no na yutto “dayāya tāyā”ti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvato.
analyzed: pana paṭiniddesaḥ no na yuttaḥ dayāya tāya ati dvinnam padānam samāna adhikaraṇa bhāvato

original: Samānādhikaraṇānañhi dvinnaṃ padānaṃ rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ viya visesanavisesitabbabhāvo
analyzed: samāna adhikaraṇānam hi dvinnam padānam rūpa kkhandha ādīnam viya visesana visesitabba bhāvaḥ

original: hoti. Rūpa-saddo hi aññakkhandhanivattanatthaṃ vuccamāno visesanaṃ hoti, khandha-saddo
analyzed: hoti rūpa saddaḥ hi añña kkhandha nivattana attham vuccamānaḥ visesanam hoti khandha saddo

original: ca nivattetabbagahetabbasādhāraṇavacanabhāvato visesitabbo, evamidhāpi “dayāya tāyā”ti
analyzed: ca nivattetabba gahetabba sādhāraṇa vacana bhāvataḥ visesitabbaḥ evam idhā api dayāya tāya ati

original: dvinnaṃ padānaṃ ekavibhattiyuttānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvato visesanavisesitabbabhāvo
analyzed: dvinnam padānam eka vibhatti yuttānam samāna adhikaraṇa bhāvataḥ visesana visesitabba bhāvaḥ

original: hoti. Tattha dayā samussāhinīti padhānā, nivattetabbagahetabbasādhāraṇavacanañcidaṃ.
analyzed: hoti tattha dayā samussāhinī iti padhānā nivattetabba gahetabba sādhāraṇa vacanam ca idam

original: Tasmā “dayāyā”ti visesitabbavacanametaṃ, tassa ca yathā visesanaṃ hoti “tāyā”ti idaṃ
analyzed: tasmā dayāya ati visesitabba vacanam etam tassa ca yathā visesanam hoti tāya ati idam

original: vacanaṃ, tathā tassa paṭiniddesabhāvo yojetabbo. Na hi paññāpaṭiniddesabhāve dayāvisesanaṃ

original: ta-saddo hoti, karuṇāpaṭiniddesabhāve ca hotīti. Padhānañca paññaṃ vajjetvā “dayāyā”ti
analyzed: ta saddaḥ hoti karuṇā paṭiniddesa bhāve ca hoti iti padhānam ca paññam vajjetvā dayāya ati

original: etena sambajjhamāno “tāyā”ti ayaṃ ta-saddo appadhānāya karuṇāya paṭiniddeso bhavitumarahati.
analyzed: etena sambajjhamānaḥ tāya iti ayam ta saddaḥ appadhānāya karuṇāya paṭiniddesaḥ bhavitum arahati

original: Ayamettha attho – yāya dayāya samussāhito, na sā yā kāci, sabbaññutaññāṇassa pana
analyzed: ayam ettha atthaḥ yāya dayāya samussāhitaḥ na sā yā kāci sabbaññuta ññāṇassa pana

original: nidassanabhūtā mahākaruṇā, tāya samussāhitoti.
analyzed: nidassana bhūtā mahā karuṇā tāya samussāhitā iti

analyzed: āpannoti tasmai dayā na karuṇāti yadi evam adayā āpannoti

analyzed: etassa aṭṭhakathā ayam nikkaruṇa tam āpannaḥ ti vuttanti dayā mettā ati ca na yujjeyya

analyzed: tasmā dayā saddaḥ yattha yattha pavattati tattha tattha adhippāya vasena yojetabbo

original: Dayā-saddo hi anurakkhaṇatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya ca karuṇāya ca
analyzed: dayā saddaḥ hi anurakkhaṇa attham antonītam katvā pavattamānaḥ mettāya ca karuṇāya ca

analyzed: pavattati iti no na yujjati evam hi aṭṭhakathānam avirodhaḥ hoti iti karuṇā ca desanāya

analyzed: nidāna bhāvena vuttā na mettā accantam eva hi tam samayam bhagavā karuṇā vihārena

analyzed: vihāsi iti evamādīsu tasmai dayā vacanena gahitā iti veditabbā sā hi samussāhinī

analyzed: na mettā mettā pana paññāgatika pavattinī hoti iti

analyzed: no na gahitā purima gāthāya pana sattesu karuṇā yathāruci sappadesa satta visayā

analyzed: nippadesa satta visayā ca sabbā vuttā idha pana nippadesa satta visaya tam gahetum sattesu iti

original: atthaṃ uddharitvā dassetā, paramatthaṃ vā nibbānaṃ pāpayitā. Amatassa dātāti amatasacchikiriyaṃ

original: sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti amatassa dātā. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tadāyattabhāvato
analyzed: sattesu uppādentaḥ amatam dadāti iti amatassa dātā bodhi pakkhiya dhammānam tad āyatta bhāvato

original: dhammassāmī. Suvaṇṇāliṅganti suvaṇṇamayaṃ āliṅgaṃ khuddakamudiṅgaṃ. Supupphitasatapattapadumamiva
analyzed: dhammassāmī suvaṇṇa āliṅganti suvaṇṇa mayam āliṅgam khuddaka mudiṅgam su pupphita sata patta padumam iva

original: sassirikaṃ sasobhaṃ supupphitasatapattasassirikaṃ.
analyzed: sassirikam sasobham su pupphita sata patta sassirikam

original: Anumoditakālato paṭṭhāya…pe… buddhabhāsitaṃ nāma jātanti etena anumodanā buddhabhāsitabhāvassa
analyzed: anumodita kālataḥ buddha bhāsitam nāma jātan ti etena anumodanā buddha bhāsita bhāvassa

original: kāraṇanti ayamattho vutto viya dissati, evañca sati kathāvatthussa buddhabhāsitabhāvo
analyzed: kāraṇam ti ayam atthaḥ vuttaḥ viya dissati evam ca sati kathā vatthussa buddha bhāsita bhāvaḥ

original: na siyā ananumoditattā, tasmā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo – “mahākaccāyano evaṃ vibhajissatī”ti
analyzed: na siyā an anumodita ttā tasmai evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo mahākaccāyanaḥ evam vibhajissati iti

original: disvā bhagavā mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho, tatheva ca thero bhagavatā dinnanayena
analyzed: disvā bhagavā mātikam nikkhipitvā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ tathā iva ca theraḥ bhagavatā dinna nayena

original: ṭhapitamātikāya vibhajīti buddhabhāsitaṃ nāma jātaṃ, taṃ pana anumodanāya pākaṭaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapita mātikāya vibhajīti buddhabhāsitam nāma jātam tam pana anumodanāya pākaṭam

original: jātanti etamatthaṃ sandhāya “evaṃ satthārā…pe… nāma jāta”nti vuttanti.
analyzed: jātanti etam attham sandhāya evam nāma jātanti vuttanti

original: Idāni pāḷiyā sannivesaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha dhammasaṅgaṇīpakaraṇe”tiādimāha. Kāmāvacarakusalato
analyzed: idāni pāḷiyā sannivesam dassetum tattha dhammasaṅgaṇī pakaraṇa iti ādim āha kāmāvacara kusalato

original: aṭṭhāti kāmāvacarakusale cattāro khandhe gahetvā tato aṭṭha cittāni uddharati. Paṭhamā
analyzed: aṭṭha ati kāmāvacara kusale cattāraḥ khandhe gahetvā tatas aṭṭha cittāni uddharati paṭhamā

original: vibhattītipi vadanti. Ekūnanavuti cittānīti yattha etāni cittāni vibhattāni, te pāḷippadesā
analyzed: vadanti ekūnanavuti cittāni iti yattha etāni cittāni vibhattāni te pāḷippadesā

original: “ekūnanavuti cittānī”ti vuttā. Tesañca samudāyo cittavibhatti, tasmā upapannametaṃ
analyzed: ekūnanavuti cittāni iti vuttā tesam ca samudāyaḥ citta vibhatti tasmai upapannam etam

original: “ekūnanavuti cittāni cittavibhattī”ti. Mātikañca uddisitvā tattha ekekaṃ padaṃ uddharitvā
analyzed: ekūnanavuti cittāni citta vibhattī iti mātikam ca uddisitvā tattha ekekam padam uddharitvā

original: yasmā cittāni vibhattāni, tasmā mātikāpi cittavibhattiantogadhāyevāti cittuppādakaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: cittāni vibhattāni tasmā mātikā api citta vibhatti anta gadhāya iva ati citta uppāda kaṇḍam

original: mātikāpadabhājanīyavasena duvidhanti idampi vacanaṃ yujjati.
analyzed: mātikā pada bhājanīya vasena idam api vacanam yujjati

original: Mūlatoti “tīṇi kusalamūlānī”tiādinā kusalādīnaṃ mūlavasena saṅkhipitvā vacanaṃ. “Vedanākkhandho”tiādinā
analyzed: mūlataḥ iti tīṇi kusala mūlāni iti ādinā kusala ādīnam mūla vasena saṅkhipitvā vacanam vedanā kkhandha iti ādinā

original: khandhato. “Kāyakamma”ntiādinā dvārato. “Sukhabhūmiyaṃ kāmāvacare”tiādinā bhūmito.
analyzed: khandhataḥ kāya kammanti ādinā dvārataḥ sukha bhūmi yam kāmāvacarā iti ādinā bhūmitaḥ

original: Atthoti hetuphalaṃ. Dhammoti hetu. “Tīṇi kusalamūlāni tīṇi akusalamūlānī”tiādinā
analyzed: attho ti hetu phalam dhammo ti hetu tīṇi kusala mūlāni tīṇi akusala mūlāni itiādinā

original: hetuvasena saṅgaho dhammato nikkhepo. “Taṃsampayutto, taṃsamuṭṭhānā tadekaṭṭhā ca
analyzed: hetu vasena saṅgahaḥ dhammataḥ nikkhepaḥ tad sampayuttaḥ tad samuṭṭhānā tad ekaṭṭhā ca

original: kilesā”tiādinā hetuphalavasena saṅgaho atthato nikkhepo. Atha vā dhammoti bhāsito.
analyzed: kilesa ati ādinā hetu phala vasena saṅgahaḥ atthataḥ nikkhepaḥ atha vā dhammaḥ ti bhāsito

original: Atthoti bhāsitattho. “Tayo kusalahetū”ti dhammo. “Tattha katame tayo kusalahetū alobho”tiādi
analyzed: attho ti bhāsita ttho tayo kusala hetū ti dhammo tattha katame tayo kusala hetū alobho tiādi

original: attho, so ca dhammo. “Tattha katamo alobho”tiādi atthoti evaṃ atthadhammavasena nikkhepo
analyzed: attho so ca dhammo tattha katamaḥ alobhaḥ tiādi attho ti evam attha dhamma vasena nikkhepaḥ

original: veditabbo. Nāmatoti “tīṇi kusalamūlānī”ti vuttadhammānaṃ alobhotiādināmavasena. Liṅgatoti
analyzed: veditabbaḥ nāmato ti tīṇi kusala mūlāni iti vutta dhammānam alobho ti ādi nāma vasena liṅgato ti

original: uddiṭṭhassa ekasseva dhammassa “alobho alubbhanā alubbhitatta”nti purisādiliṅgavasena nikkhepo.
analyzed: uddiṭṭhassa ekassa iva dhammassa alobhaḥ alubbhanā a lubbhita ttanti purisa ādi liṅga vasena nikkhepaḥ

original: Gaṇanacāranti gaṇanappavattiṃ. Samānentīti samānaṃ karonti pūrenti, tathā samānetabbanti
analyzed: gaṇana cāranti gaṇana pavattim samānenti iti samānam karonti pūrenti tathā samānetabbanti

original: etthāpi. “Vijjābhāgino avijjābhāgino”ti evamādīsu ettha viññātesu ābhidhammikattherā
analyzed: ettha api vijjā bhāginaḥ avijjā bhāginaḥ ti evamādīsu ettha viññātesu ābhidhammika therā

original: suttantaṃ suṇantā cintentā ca suttantesu “vijjābhāgino”tiādīsu āgatesu atthassa viññātattā
analyzed: suttantam suṇantā cintentā ca suttantesu vijjā bhāgino ti ādīsu āgatesu atthassa viññāta ttā

original: na kilamantīti etamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ābhidhammikattherānaṃ…pe… akilamatthaṃ ṭhapitā”ti.
analyzed: na kilamanti iti etam attham sandhāya vuttam ābhidhammika thera anaṃpe a kilamattham ṭhapitā ati

original: Anamataggoti aññātaggo. Khandhantaranti khandhanānattaṃ, khandhameva vā. Gahetuṃ
analyzed: anamataggo ti aññātaggo khandhantaram ti khandha nānattam khandham eva vā gahetum

original: asakkuṇeyyattā saṇhaṃ, sukhumāya paññāya gahetabbato sukhumañca dhammaṃ saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ.
analyzed: a sakkuṇeyya ttā saṇham sukhumāya paññāya gahetabbataḥ sukhumam ca dhammam saṇha sukhuma dhammam

original: Balavatā ñāṇavegena pavattattā balavato ñāṇavegassa nimittabhāvato ca balavaṃ. Gambhīrameva
analyzed: balavatā ñāṇa vegena pavatta ttā balavataḥ ñāṇa vegassa nimitta bhāvataḥ ca balavam gambhīram eva

analyzed: gambhīra gatam gambhīrāni vā gatāni gamanāni etassa santi iti gambhīra gatam yathānupubbanti

analyzed: yathā anupubbena nikhilena ati niravasesena desitam pañca khila rahitena vā bhagavatā

analyzed: desitam rūpa gatam vā ati hattha gatam rūpam viya cakkhunā paṭivedha ñāṇena samanta paṭṭhānam

original: yo passati, so attheva, no natthī”ti attānaṃ sandhāya thero vadatīti.
analyzed: yaḥ passati saḥ atthā iva no natthi iti attānam sandhāya theraḥ vadati iti

original: Khuddakavatthuvibhaṅge āgatesu ekādhikesu aṭṭhasu kilesasatesu aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni

analyzed: apanetvā sesāḥ dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyaḥ ca uppanna anuppanna bhāvena di guṇitāni

analyzed: dasa adhikāni honti appakam pana ūnam adhikam vā na gaṇana upagam hoti iti

analyzed: vuttam itaresam atīta ādi bhāva āmasanā aggahaṇam khepane daṭṭhabbam

analyzed: mecaka paṭā ati nīla nibhā paṭā citta samuṭṭhānā vaṇṇa dhātū ti citta paccaya otu samuṭṭhānā

analyzed: vaṇṇa dhātū ti atthaḥ gahetabbo kasmā na hi citta samuṭṭhānam rūpam bahi nigacchati iti

analyzed: citta samuṭṭhāna rūpa paramparāya āgata ttā pana evam vuttam atha vā citta samuṭṭhānā

analyzed: sussaratā viya ettha hi sussaratā ati upādinnaka adhikāre āgatam na ca saddaḥ upādinnakaḥ

analyzed: sandhāya citta samuṭṭhānā vaṇṇa dhātū iti vadati

original: Kāyasakkhinti paccakkhaṃ. Dantāvaraṇanti oṭṭhadvayaṃ. Mukhādānanti mukhavivaraṃ.

original: Tenetametassāti vinayassa. Attatthaparatthādibhedeti yo taṃ suttaṃ sajjhāyati suṇāti

analyzed: sūcā iti para suttassa api iti ayam attho siyā suttena ca yaḥ attho pakāsito saḥ tassa eva

analyzed: puggalassa vasena atta attha para tthā vuttā

analyzed: atha vā suttam an apekkhitvā ye attattha ādayaḥ api attha ppabhedāḥ vuttā niddese

analyzed: attho vodānaḥ attho paramattho attho ti te suttam sūceti iti attho atha vā attanā

original: ca appiccho hotī”ti attatthaṃ, “appicchakathañca paresaṃ kattā hotī”ti paratthaṃ
analyzed: ca appicchaḥ hoti iti atta attham appiccha katham ca paresam kattā hoti iti parattham

analyzed: atta hita para hita ādīni sa atisayam pakāsitāni honti na āṇā dhamma sabhāva vasa ppavattāya ati

original: idameva “atthānaṃ sūcanato sutta”nti vuttaṃ.

original: Abhikkamantīti ettha abhi-saddo kamanassa vuddhibhāvaṃ atirekattaṃ dīpeti. Abhikkantenāti
analyzed: abhikkamanti iti ettha abhi saddo kamanassa vuddhi bhāvam atireka ttam dīpeti abhikkantena ati

original: devaloke desitabhāvassa pākaṭattā desaparisā ca pākaṭāti kiṃ nidānakiccaṃ siyāti.

original: Yattha khandhādayo nippadesena vibhattā, so abhidhammo nāma, tasmā tassa nidānena
analyzed: yattha khandha ādayaḥ nippadesena vibhattā saḥ abhidhammaḥ nāma tasmā tassa nidānena

original: khandhādīnaṃ nippadesatopi paṭividdhaṭṭhānena bhavitabbanti adhippāyena thero “mahābodhinidāno
analyzed: khandha ādīnam nippadesataḥ pi paṭividdha ṭṭhānena bhavitabban ti adhippāyena theraḥ mahā bodhi nidāno

original: abhidhammo”ti dasseti. “So evaṃ pajānāmi sammādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayita”ntiādinā nayena
analyzed: abhidhammaḥ ti dasseti saḥ evam pajānāmi sammādiṭṭhi paccayā api vedayita nti ādinā nayena

original: paccayādīhi vedanaṃ upaparikkhanto khandhādipadesānaṃ vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ vasena
analyzed: paccaya ādīhi vedanam upaparikkhanto khandha ādi padesānam vedanā khandha ādīnam vasena

original: vihāsi. Dhammeti kusalādiaraṇante.
analyzed: vihāsi dhamma iti

original: Dhammaṃ parivattentoti sāṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiṃ parivattento etaṃ paravādīcodanaṃ patvā
analyzed: dhammam parivattento ti sa aṭṭhakatham pāḷim parivattento etam paravādī codanam patvā

original: “ayaṃ paravādī”tiādimāha. Amhādisesu nidānaṃ jānantesu paṭisaraṇesu vijjamānesu appaṭisaraṇo
analyzed: ayam paravādī iti ādim āha amhādisesu nidānam jānantesu paṭisaraṇesu vijjamānesu appaṭisaraṇaḥ

original: araññe kandanto viya nidānasabbhāve sakkhibhūtesupi amhesu vijjamānesu asakkhikaṃ
analyzed: araññe kandantaḥ viya nidāna sabbhāve sakkhi bhūtesu pi amhesu vijjamānesu asakkhikam

original: aḍḍaṃ karonto viya hoti, nidānassa atthibhāvampi na jānāti, nanu etaṃ nidānanti kathento
analyzed: aḍḍam karontaḥ viya hoti nidānassa atthi bhāvam pi na jānāti nanu etam nidānam ti kathento

original: evamāha. Ekamevāti desanānidānameva ajjhāsayānurūpena desitattā. Dve nidānānīti adhigantabbadesetabbadhammānurūpena
analyzed: evam āha ekam eva ati desanā nidānam eva ajjhāsayā anurūpena desita ttā dve nidānāni iti adhigantabba desetabba dhamma anurūpena

original: desitattā. Abhidhammādhigamassa mūlaṃ adhigamaṃ nidetīti adhigamanidānaṃ. Bodhiabhinīhārasaddhāyāti
analyzed: desita ttā abhidhamma adhigamassa mūlam adhigamam nideti iti adhigama nidānam bodhi abhinīhāra saddhāya ati

original: yāya saddhāya dīpaṅkaradasabalassa santike bodhiyā cittaṃ abhinīhari paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
analyzed: yāya saddhāya dīpaṅkara dasa balassa santike bodhiyā cittam abhinīhari paṇidhānam akāsi

original: Sumedhakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: sumedha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Caturo ca asaṅkhiyeti uddhaṃ ārohanavasena atikkamitvā amaraṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosīti
analyzed: caturaḥ ca uddham ārohana vasena atikkamitvā amaram nāma nagaram ahosi iti

original: vacanasesayojanā kātabbā. Dasahīti hatthiassarathabherīsaṅkhamudiṅgavīṇāgītasammatāḷehi
analyzed: vacana sesa yojanā kātabbā dasahi iti

original: “asnātha pivatha khādathā”ti dasamena saddena. Te pana ekadesena dassetuṃ “hatthisadda”ntiādi
analyzed: a snātha pivatha khādatha ati dasamena saddena te pana eka desena dassetum hatthi sadda ntiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Hatthisaddanti karaṇatthe upayogo daṭṭhabbo. Bherīsaṅkharathānañca saddehi
analyzed: vuttam hatthi saddam ti karaṇa atthe upayogaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ bherī saṅkha rathānam ca saddehi

original: avivittanti vā ghositanti vā yojetabbaṃ. Hatthisaddanti vā hatthisaddavantaṃ nagaraṃ.
analyzed: avivittam ti vā ghositam ti vā yojetabbam hatthi saddanti vā hatthi saddavantam nagaram

original: Khādatha pivatha cevāti iti-saddo ñātatthattā appayutto daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: khādatha pivatha ca iva ati iti saddaḥ ñāta tthattā appayuttaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Sabbaṅgasampannaṃ uyyānapokkharaṇīādisampannattā. Lakkhaṇeti itthilakkhaṇe purisalakkhaṇe
analyzed: sabba aṅga sampannam uyyāna pokkharaṇī ādi sampanna ttā lakkhaṇe ti itthi lakkhaṇe purisa lakkhaṇe

original: ca. Itihāseti porāṇe. Sadhammeti attano tevijjadhamme ca yaññavidhiādike ca. Pāraminti
analyzed: ca itihāse iti porāṇe sadhamme iti attano tevijja dhamme ca yañña vidhi ādike ca

original: pārañāṇaṃ pārādhigamaṃ gato. Cintesahanti cintesiṃ ahaṃ sumedhabhūtoti satthā vadati.
analyzed: pāra ñāṇam pāra adhigamam gataḥ aham sumedha bhūto ti satthā vadati

original: Atthi hehitīti so vijjamāno bhavissati. Na hetuyeti abhavituṃ. Evamevāti evamevaṃ.
analyzed: atthi hehiti iti so vijjamānaḥ bhavissati na hetuyā iti a bhavitum evam eva ati evam evam

original: Na gavesatīti na gantuṃ esati na icchati nānugacchati vā. Dhoveti dhovante. Serīti
analyzed: na gavesati iti na gantum esati na icchati na anugacchati vā dhova iti dhovante

original: sāyattiko. Sayaṃvasīti savaso. Mahācorasamo viyāti kāyasārāgavasena duccaritānesanehi
analyzed: sāyattikaḥ sayaṃvasī iti savasaḥ mahā cora samaḥ viyāti kāya sā rāga vasena duccarita anesanehi

original: kusalabhaṇḍacchedanā. Nāthāti nāthavanto. Pañcadosavivajjitanti evamādikassa attho
analyzed: kusala bhaṇḍa chedanāḥ nāthā ati nāthavanto pañca dosa vivajjitanti evamādikassa attho

original: kesuci aṭṭhakathāpotthakesu likhitoti katvā na vakkhāma.
analyzed: kesuci aṭṭhakathā potthakesu likhito ti katvā na vakkhāma

original: Sāsaneti ettha tāpasasāsanaṃ jhānābhiññā ca. Vasībhūtassa sato. Mayi evaṃbhūte dīpaṅkaro
analyzed: sāsana iti ettha tāpasa sāsanam jhāna abhiññā ca vasībhūtassa sataḥ mayi evaṃbhūte dīpaṅkaro

original: jino uppajji. Sodheti jano. Añjasaṃ vaṭumāyananti pariyāyavacanehi maggameva vadati.
analyzed: jinaḥ uppajji sodha iti janaḥ añjasam pariyāya vacanehi maggam eva vadati

original: Mā naṃ akkamitthāti ettha nanti padapūraṇamatte nipāto. Ghātiyāmahanti ettha ca a-iti
analyzed: mā nam akkamittha ati ettha na nti pada pūraṇa matte nipātaḥ ettha ca ai ti

original: ca haṃ-iti ca nipātā, ahaṃ-iti vā eko nipāto sānunāsiko kato. Āhutīnanti dakkhiṇāhutīnaṃ.
analyzed: ca haṃ iti ca nipātāḥ ahaṃ iti vai ekaḥ nipātaḥ sa anunāsikaḥ kataḥ āhutīnam ti dakkhiṇa āhutīnam

original: Manti mama, maṃ vā abrvi.
analyzed: manti mama mam vai abrvi

original: Kappe atikkamitvā vuttepi bodhimhi mātādisaṃkittane saṅgaṇhituṃ “bodhi tassa bhagavato”tiādimāha.
analyzed: kappe atikkamitvā vutte api bodhimhi mātā ādi saṃkittane saṅgaṇhitum bodhi tassa bhagavataḥ iti ādim āha

original: Sukhenāti uttamena sukhena. Asamoti tāpasehi asamo. Abhiññāsukhatopi visiṭṭhaṃ īdisaṃ
analyzed: sukhena ati uttamena sukhena asamaḥ ti tāpasehi asamaḥ abhiññā sukhataḥ pi visiṭṭham īdisam

original: buddhattabyākaraṇajaṃ sukhaṃ alabhiṃ. Yāti yāni nimittāni. Ābhujatīti āvattati. Abhiravantīti
analyzed: buddha tta byākaraṇa jam sukham alabhim yāti yāni nimittāni ābhujati iti āvattati abhiravanti iti

original: saddaṃ karonti. Chuddhāti nikkhantā. Nuddhaṃsatīti na uddhaṃ gacchati. Ubhayanti
analyzed: saddam karonti chuddhā ati nikkhantā na uddhaṃsati iti na uddham gacchati ubhayanti

original: ubhayavacanaṃ. Dhuvasassatanti ekantasassataṃ, aviparītamevāti attho. Āpannasattānanti
analyzed: ubhaya vacanam dhuva sassatam ti ekanta sassatam aviparītam eva ati atthaḥ āpannasattānam ti

original: gabbhinīnaṃ. Yāvatādasa disā, tattha. Dhammadhātuyāti dhammadhātuyaṃ, sabbesu dhammesu vicināmīti attho.
analyzed: gabbhinīnam yāvatā dasa disā tattha dhammadhātuyā ati dhammadhātuyam sabbesu dhammesu vicināmi iti attho

original: Yassa sampuṇṇo, taṃ vamateva udakaṃ nissesaṃ. Eteti ekissāpi dānapāramitāya anekappakāratāya
analyzed: yassa sampuṇṇaḥ tam vamatā iva udakam nissesam eta iti ekissa api dāna pāramitāya aneka ppakāra tāya

original: bahuvacananiddeso kato. Paṭilaggitaṃ rakkhatīti vacanaseso, bhummatthe vā upayogo.
analyzed: bahuvacana niddeso kataḥ paṭilaggitam rakkhati iti vacana sesaḥ bhumma tthe vā upayogaḥ

original: Catūsu bhūmīsūti pātimokkhādīsu saṃvarabhūmīsu. Advejjhamānasoti kadāci khamanaṃ
analyzed: catūsu bhūmīsu iti pātimokkha ādīsu saṃvara bhūmīsu advejjhamānaso ti kadāci khamanam

original: kadāci akkhamanaṃ, kassaci khamanaṃ kassaci akkhamananti evaṃ dvedhābhāvaṃ anāpannamānaso
analyzed: kadāci akkhamanam kassaci khamanam kassaci akkhamanan ti evam dvedhā bhāvam an āpanna mānasaḥ

original: hutvā. Saccassa vīthi nāma diṭṭhādi ca adiṭṭhādi ca yathābhūtaṃva vatthu. Adhiṭṭhānanti
analyzed: hutvā saccassa vīthi nāma diṭṭha ādi ca a diṭṭha ādi ca vatthu adhiṭṭhānanti

original: kusalasamādānādhiṭṭhānaṃ, samādinnesu kusalesu acalatā adhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Pathaviyā
analyzed: kusala samādāna adhiṭṭhānam samādinnesu kusalesu acala tā adhiṭṭhānam nāma pathaviyā

original: upekkhanaṃ nāma vikārānāpatti. Aññatrāti aññaṃ. Sabhāvarasalakkhaṇeti ettha bhāvoti
analyzed: upekkhanam nāma vikāra anāpatti aññatra ati aññam sa bhāva rasa lakkhaṇā iti ettha bhāvaḥ ti

original: aviparītatā vijjamānatā, saha bhāvena sabhāvo, aviparīto attano bodhiparipācanakiccasaṅkhāto
analyzed: a viparīta tā vijjamāna tā saha bhāvena sa bhāvaḥ aviparītaḥ attanaḥ bodhi paripācana kicca saṅkhāto

original: raso, anavajjavatthupariccāgādisaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇañca sabhāvarasalakkhaṇaṃ, tato sammasato.
analyzed: rasaḥ anavajja vatthu pariccāga ādi saṅkhātam lakkhaṇam ca sabhāva rasa lakkhaṇam tatas sammasato

original: Dhammatejenāti ñāṇatejena. Calatāti calatāya kampanatāya. Sesīti sayi. Mā bhāthāti
analyzed: dhamma tejena ati ñāṇa tejena cala tā ati cala tāya kampana tāya sesi iti sayi mā bhātha ati

original: mā bhāyittha. Sabbītiyoti sabbā ītiyo upaddavā taṃ vivajjantu.
analyzed: mā bhāyittha sabbītiyā iti sabbāḥ ītiyaḥ upaddavā tam vivajjantu

original: Sumedhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sumedha kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Pavacchatīti deti. Yogenāti upāyena. Samiṃsūti sannipatiṃsu. Appattamānasāti appattaarahattā
analyzed: pavacchati iti dā iti yogena ati upāyena appatta mānasā ati appatta arahattā

original: bhikkhū garahitā bhavanti. Rittāti suññā antarahitā. Sālakalyāṇī nāma eko rukkho.
analyzed: bhikkhū gara hitāḥ bhavanti rittā ati suññā antarahitā sālakalyāṇī nāma ekaḥ rukkho

original: Buddhacakkavattikāleyeva kira ekāheneva uppajjati.
analyzed: buddha cakkavatti kāleya iva kira eka ahena iva uppajjati

original: Liṅgasampattīti purisaliṅgatā. Hetūti tihetukapaṭisandhitā. Guṇasampattīti abhiññāsamāpattilābhitā.
analyzed: liṅga sampatti iti purisa liṅga tā hetu uti ti hetuka paṭisandhi tā guṇa sampatti iti abhiññā samāpatti lābhi tā

original: Adhikāroti buddhānaṃ sakkārakaraṇaṃ. Chandatāti buddhattappattiyaṃ chandasamāyogo.
analyzed: adhikāraḥ ti buddhānam sakkāra karaṇam chanda tā ati chanda samāyogaḥ

original: Sabbaṅgasampannāti aṭṭhaṅgāni samodhānetvā katapaṇidhānā. Pakkhikāti pīṭhasappikā.
analyzed: sabba aṅga sampannā ti aṭṭhaṅgāni samodhānetvā kata paṇidhānā pakkhikā ati pīṭhasappikā

original: Paṇḍakāti ubhayaliṅgarahitā. Bodhisattā ca brahmalokūpapattipaṭhamakappikesu kālesu
analyzed: paṇḍakā ati ubhaya liṅga rahitā bodhisattā ca brahma loka upapatti paṭhama kappikesu kālesu

original: ubhayaliṅgarahitā honti, na pana paṇḍakapariyāpannāti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyāpannā
analyzed: ubhaya liṅga rahitāḥ honti na pana paṇḍaka pariyāpannā ti etam attham dassetum pariyāpannā

original: na bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ, yathāvuttesu vā dosesu sabbesu pariyāpannā na bhavanti, bodhisattesu

original: vā pariyāpannā tadantogadhā, paricchinnasaṃsārattā vā pariyāpannā bodhisattā ubhatobyañjanapaṇḍakā
analyzed: vā pariyāpannā tad antogadhā paricchinna saṃsārattā vā pariyāpannāḥ bodhisattā ubhatas byañjana paṇḍakā

original: na bhavantīti attho. Sabbattha suddhagocarā yasmā, tasmā micchādiṭṭhiṃ na sevanti.
analyzed: na bhavanti iti sabbattha suddha gocarāḥ yasmā tasmā micchādiṭṭhim na sevanti

original: Micchādiṭṭhinti natthikāhetukākiriyadiṭṭhiṃ. Bhavābhaveti khuddake ceva mahante ca
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhim ti natthika ahetuka akiriya diṭṭhim bhava abhava iti khuddake ca iva mahante ca

original: bhave. Bhojaputteti luddake. Lagananti saṅgo. Aññathāti līnatā. Gāmaṇḍalāti gāmadārakā.
analyzed: bhave bhoja putta iti luddake saṅgaḥ aññathā ati līna tā

original: Rūpanti vippakāraṃ. Ayaṃ tāva nidānakathā yāya abhidhammassa buddhabhāsitatāsiddhīti
analyzed: vippakāram ayam tāva nidāna kathā yāya abhidhammassa buddha bhāsita tā siddhi iti

original: atthayojanā kātabbā.
analyzed: attha yojanā kātabbā

original: Nidānakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nidāna kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 1. Cittuppādakaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: cittuppāda kaṇḍam

original: Tikamātikāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: tikamātikā pada vaṇṇanā

original: Idāni paṭiññātakathaṃ kātuṃ “idāni iti me…pe… kathanokāso sampatto”tiādimāha. Ito paṭṭhāyāti kusaladhammapadato paṭṭhāya.
analyzed: idāni paṭiññāta katham kātum idāni iti mepe kathana ukāso sampatto ti ādim āha itas paṭṭhāya ati kusala dhamma padataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: 1. Sabbapadehi laddhanāmoti tīsupi padesu vedanāsaddassa vijjamānattā tena laddhanāmo
analyzed: sabba padehi laddha nāmaḥ ti tīsu pi padesu vedanā saddassa vijjamāna ttā tena laddha nāmaḥ

original: sabbapadehi laddhanāmo hoti. Nanu sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammāti cattāri padāni,
analyzed: sabba padehi laddha nāmaḥ hoti nanu sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāḥ dhammā ti cattāri padāni

original: evaṃ sesesupīti dvādasetāni padāni, na tīṇīti vedanāsaddassa padattayāvayavattaṃ
analyzed: evam sesesu pi iti dvādasa etāni padāni na tīṇi iti vedanā saddassa

original: sandhāya “sabbapadehī”ti vucceyya, na yuttaṃ. “Vedanāyā”ti hi visuṃ padaṃ na kassaci
analyzed: sandhāya sabba padehi iti vucceyya na yuttam vedanāya ati hi visum padam na kassaci

original: padassa avayavo hoti, nāpi sukhādipadabhāvaṃ bhajatīti tena laddhanāmo kathaṃ sabbapadehi
analyzed: padassa avayavaḥ hoti nā api sukha ādi pada bhāvam bhajati iti tena laddha nāmaḥ katham sabba padehi

original: laddhanāmo siyāti? Adhippetappakāratthagamakassa padasamudāyassa padattā. Pajjati
analyzed: laddha nāmaḥ siyā ti adhippeta ppakāra attha gamakassa pada samudāyassa pada ttā pajjati

original: avabujjhīyati etenāti hi padaṃ, “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā”ti etena ca padasamudāyena
analyzed: avabujjhīyati etena ati hi padam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāḥ dhammā ati etena ca pada samudāyena

original: yathādhippeto attho samatto viññāyati, tasmā so padasamudāyo “pada”nti vuccati. Evaṃ
analyzed: yathā adhippeto attho samattaḥ viññāyati tasmā so pada samudāyaḥ padanti vuccati evam

original: itarepi veditabbā. Tasmā tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samudāyānaṃ avayavena laddhanāmo sabbapadehi laddhanāmoti yutto.
analyzed: itarā api veditabbā tasmā tesam tiṇṇam samudāyānam avayavena laddha nāmo sabba padehi laddha nāmo ti yuttaḥ

original: Ganthato ca atthato cāti ettha hetupadasahetukapadādīhi sambandhattā ganthato ca
analyzed: ganthato ca atthato ca ati ettha hetu pada sahetuka pada ādīhi sambandha ttā ganthato ca

original: hetuatthasahetukatthādīhi sambandhattā atthato ca aññamaññasambandho veditabbo. Sahetukahetusampayuttadukā
analyzed: hetu attha sahetuka ttha ādīhi sambandha ttā atthataḥ ca aññamañña sambandhaḥ veditabbaḥ sa hetuka hetu sampayutta dukā

original: hi hetuduke hetūhi sambandhattā hetudukasambandhā, hetusahetukaduko hetudukasahetukadukasambandho
analyzed: hi hetu duke hetūhi hetu duka sambandhā hetu sahetuka dukaḥ hetu duka sahetuka duka sambandhaḥ

original: ubhayekapadavasena. Tathā hetuhetusampayuttaduko hetudukahetusampayuttadukasambandho,
analyzed: ubhaya eka pada vasena tathā hetu hetu sampayutta dukaḥ hetu duka hetu sampayutta duka sambandhaḥ

original: nahetusahetukaduko ekadvipadavasena hetudukasahetukadukasambandhoti. Kaṇṇikā viyāti
analyzed: eka dvipada vasena hetu duka sahetuka duka sambandhā iti kaṇṇikā viyāti

original: pupphamayakaṇṇikā viya. Ghaṭā viyāti pupphahatthakādīsu pupphādīnaṃ samūho viya.
analyzed: puppha maya kaṇṇikāḥ viya ghaṭāḥ viya ati puppha hatthaka ādīsu puppha ādīnam samūhaḥ viya

original: Kaṇṇikāghaṭādīsu hi pupphādīni vaṇṭādīhi aññamaññasambandhāni hontīti tathāsambandhatā
analyzed: kaṇṇikā ghaṭa ādīsu hi puppha ādīni vaṇṭa ādīhi aññamañña sambandhāni honti iti tathā sambandha tā

original: etesaṃ dukānaṃ vuttā. Dukasāmaññatoti aññehi hetudukādīhi dukavasena samānabhāvā.
analyzed: etesam dukānam vuttā duka sāmaññato ti aññehi hetu duka ādīhi duka vasena samāna bhāvā

original: Aññehīti sārammaṇadukādīhi. Asaṅgahito padeso yesaṃ atthi, te sappadesā. Yesaṃ pana
analyzed: aññehi iti sa ārammaṇa duka ādīhi asaṅgahitaḥ padesaḥ yesam atthi te sappadesāḥ yesam pana

original: natthi, te nippadesā.
analyzed: na atthi te nippadesā

original: na vacanānupubbenāti. Etthāha – yadi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena taṇhādiṭṭhīhi upetena ādinnā

original: upādinnā, sabbatebhūmakadhammā ca taṇhādīnaṃ ārammaṇā honti, na ca upetasaddo kamme
analyzed: upādinnā sabba tebhūmaka dhammā ca taṇhā ādīnam ārammaṇāḥ honti na ca upeta saddo kamme

original: eva niruḷho, tena kammasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthi, tasmā sabbatebhūmakadhammapaccayuppannānaṃ
analyzed: eva niruḷhaḥ tena kammassa iva gahaṇe kāraṇam na atthi tasmā

analyzed: gahita ttā upasaddena ca upeta tā mattam jotitam na ārammaṇa karaṇam samannāgama nivattakam

analyzed: upādinna ttam āpajjati iti na āpajjati bodhaneyya ajjhāsaya vasena desanā pavattitaḥ yesam hi

original: atthavibhāvanā katā “kammunā”ti.
analyzed: attha vibhāvanā katā kammunā ati

analyzed: vadati upagamanam ca tena upagatam upetam kim pana asati

analyzed: saḥ ca upapatti bhavo tebhūmaka vipāka kaṭattā rūpa saṅgahaḥ bhava paccayā jāti iti ettha

original: Tasmā eva avisesetvā “upādānassa ārammaṇapaccayabhūtānametaṃ adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ.

analyzed: saṃkileso ti dasa kilesa vatthūni vuccanti saṃkiliṭṭhā ti tehi vibādhitā upatāpitā

analyzed: laddhum arahanti iti atthaḥ ārammaṇa bhāva anatikkamanato ti etena saṃkilesa anatikkamanam eva

original: 6. Saha vitakkena hontīti vacanaseso yojetabbo avuccamānassapi bhavati-atthassa viññāyamānattā.
analyzed: saha vitakkena honti iti vacana sesaḥ yojetabbaḥ a vuccamānassa api bhavati atthassa viññāyamāna ttā

original: Mattāti pamāṇavācakaṃ ekaṃ padanti gahetvā “vicārova mattā etesa”nti attho vutto.
analyzed: mattā iti pamāṇa vācakam ekam padam ti gahetvā vicāraḥ uva mattā etesan ti atthaḥ vutto

original: Savitakkasavicārā dhammā hi vitakkavisiṭṭhena vicārena savicārā, ete pana vicāramattena

analyzed: atthaḥ vicāra matta vacanena avitakka tte siddhe avitakkānam aññesam pi atthi bhāva jotana attham

analyzed: ca honti tesu a vuccamānesu nivattetabba gahetabbassa a dassita ttā vicāra mattā ava avitakkā ati

original: Atha vā savicārā duvidhā savitakkā avitakkā ca, tesu avitakke nivattetuṃ ādipadaṃ

analyzed: upekkhati iti vedayamānā api majjhatta vedanā sukha ākāre dukkha ākāre ca udāsinā hoti iti

original: 50-54. Dhammasabhāvaṃ aggahetvā parato āmasantīti parāmāsā. Paratoti niccādito. Āmasantīti sabhāvapaṭisedhena parimajjanti.
analyzed: dhamma sabhāvam aggahetvā paratas āmasanti iti parāmāsā paratas ti nicca āditas āmasanti iti sabhāva paṭisedhena parimajjanti

original: 55-68. Sabhāvato vijjamānaṃ avijjamānaṃ vā vicittasaññāya saññitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā
analyzed: sabhāvataḥ vijjamānam a vijjamānam vā vicitta saññāya saññitam ārammaṇam aggahetvā

original: appavattito ālambamānā dhammā sārammaṇā. Cintanaṃ gahaṇaṃ ārammaṇūpaladdhi. Cetasi
analyzed: appavattitaḥ ālambamānāḥ dhammā sa ārammaṇā cintanam gahaṇam ārammaṇa upaladdhi cetasi

original: niyuttā, cetasā saṃsaṭṭhā vā cetasikā. Dubbiññeyyanānattatāya ekībhāvamivupagamanaṃ
analyzed: niyuttā cetasā saṃsaṭṭhā vā cetasikā dubbiññeyya nānatta tāya ekībhāvam iva upagamanam

original: nirantarabhāvupagamanaṃ. Yesaṃ rūpānaṃ cittaṃ sahajātapaccayo hoti, tesaṃ cittassa
analyzed: nirantara bhāva upagamanam yesam rūpānam cittam sahajāta paccayaḥ hoti tesam cittassa

original: ca suviññeyyanānattanti nirantarabhāvānupagamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ekato vattamānāpīti
analyzed: ca su viññeyya nānattam ti nirantara bhāva anupagamanam veditabbam ekatas vattamānā api iti

original: api-saddo ko pana vādo ekato avattamānāti etamatthaṃ dīpeti. Idamettha vicāretabbaṃ
analyzed: api saddaḥ kaḥ pana vādaḥ ekatas avattamānā ti etam attham dīpeti idam ettha vicāretabbam

original: – avinibbhogarūpānaṃ kiṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhatā, udāhu visaṃsaṭṭhatāti? Visuṃ ārammaṇabhāvena
analyzed: avinibbhoga rūpānam kim aññam aññam saṃsaṭṭha tā udāhu visaṃsaṭṭha tā ati visum ārammaṇa bhāvena

original: suviññeyyanānattattā na saṃsaṭṭhatā, nāpi visaṃsaṭṭhatā saṃsaṭṭhāti anāsaṅkanīyasabhāvattā.
analyzed: su viññeyya nānatta ttā na saṃsaṭṭha tā na api visaṃsaṭṭha tā saṃsaṭṭhāti an āsaṅkanīya sabhāva ttā

original: Catunnañhi khandhānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhasabhāvattā rūpanibbānehipi so saṃsaṭṭhabhāvo
analyzed: catunnam hi khandhānam aññamaññam saṃsaṭṭha sabhāva ttā rūpa nibbānehi pi saḥ saṃsaṭṭha bhāvaḥ

original: atthi natthīti siyā āsaṅkā, tasmā tesaṃ itarehi, itaresañca tehi visaṃsaṭṭhasabhāvatā
analyzed: atthi natthi iti siyā āsaṅkā tasmā tesam itarehi itaresam ca tehi visaṃsaṭṭha sabhāva tā

original: vuccati, na pana rūpānaṃ rūpehi katthaci saṃsaṭṭhatā atthīti tadāsaṅkābhāvato visaṃsaṭṭhatā
analyzed: vuccati na pana rūpānam rūpehi katthaci saṃsaṭṭha tā atthi iti tad āsaṅka abhāvataḥ visaṃsaṭṭha tā

original: ca rūpānaṃ rūpehi na vuccatīti. Esa hi tesaṃ sabhāvoti. Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānādipadesu
analyzed: ca rūpānam rūpehi na vuccati iti esa hi tesam sabhāvaḥ ti citta saṃsaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna ādi padesu

original: saṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānādisaddā cittasaddāpekkhāti paccekaṃ cittasaddasambandhattā cittasaṃsaṭṭhā
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna ādi saddā citta sadda apekkhā ati paccekam citta sadda sambandha ttā citta saṃsaṭṭhā

original: ca te cittasamuṭṭhānā cāti paccekaṃ yojetvā attho vutto. Upādiyantevāti bhūtāni gaṇhanti
analyzed: ca te citta samuṭṭhānā ca ati paccekam yojetvā atthaḥ vuttaḥ upādiyante iva ati bhūtāni gaṇhanti

original: eva, nissayanti evāti attho. Yathā bhūtāni upādiyanti gayhanti nissīyanti, na tathā
analyzed: eva nissayanti eva ati atthaḥ yathā bhūtāni upādiyanti gayhanti nissīyanti na tathā

original: etāni gayhanti nissīyanti, tasmā upādā. Atha vā bhūtāni amuñcitvā tesaṃ vaṇṇanibhādibhāvena gahetabbato upādā.
analyzed: etāni gayhanti nissīyanti tasmai upādā atha vā bhūtāni a muñcitvā tesam vaṇṇa nibha ādi bhāvena gahetabbataḥ upādā

original: 75-82. Saṃkiliṭṭhattike vuttanayenāti saṃ-saddaṃ apanetvā kilisantīti kilesātiādinā nayena.
analyzed: saṃkiliṭṭha ttike vutta nayena ati saṃsaddam apanetvā kilisanti iti kilesa ati ādinā nayena

original: 83-100. Kāmāvacarādīsu ayamaparo attho – kāmataṇhā kāmo, evaṃ rūpārūpataṇhā rūpaṃ
analyzed: kāma avacara ādīsu ayam aparaḥ attho kāma taṇhā kāmaḥ evam rūpa arūpa taṇhā rūpam

original: arūpañca. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tāni yattha avacaranti, te kāmāvacarādayoti. Evañhi
analyzed: ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena tāni avacaranti te evam hi

original: sati aññabhūmīsu uppajjamānānaṃ akāmāvacarāditā kāmāvacarāditā ca nāpajjatīti siddhaṃ
analyzed: sati añña bhūmīsu uppajjamānānam akāmāvacara ādi tā kāmāvacara ādi tā ca na āpajjati iti siddham

original: hoti. Nikkhepakaṇḍepi “etthāvacarā”ti vacanaṃ avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsāya kāmataṇhāya
analyzed: hoti nikkhepa kaṇḍe pi vacanam avīci para nimmita paricchinna ukāsāya kāma taṇhāya

original: ārammaṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ, tadokāsatā ca taṇhāya tanninnatāya veditabbā.
analyzed: ārammaṇa bhāvam sandhāya vuttan ti veditabbam tad okāsa tā ca taṇhāya tad ninna tāya veditabbā

original: Yadi pariyāpannasaddassa antogadhāti ayamattho, maggādidhammānañca lokuttarantogadhattā
analyzed: yadi pariyāpanna saddassa antogadhāti ayam atthaḥ magga ādi dhammānam ca lokuttara ntogadha tā

original: pariyāpannatā āpajjati. Na hi “pariyāpannā”ti ettha tebhūmakagahaṇaṃ atthīti? Nāpajjati
analyzed: pariyāpanna tā āpajjati na hi pariyāpannā ati ettha tebhūmaka gahaṇam atthi iti na āpajjati

original: sabbadā pavattamānassa paccakkhassa lokassa vasena pariyāpannanicchayato. Atha vā
analyzed: sabbadā pavattamānassa paccakkhassa lokassa vasena pariyāpanna nicchayataḥ atha vā

original: paricchedakārikāya taṇhāya paricchinditvā āpannā paṭipannā gahitāti pariyāpannā.
analyzed: pariccheda kārikāya taṇhāya paricchinditvā āpannā paṭipannā gahitā ati pariyāpannā

original: Anīya-saddo bahulā kattuabhidhāyakoti vaṭṭacārakato niyyantīti niyyānīyā, nī-kārassa
analyzed: anīya saddaḥ kattu abhidhāyakaḥ iti vaṭṭa cārakataḥ niyyanti iti niyyānīyāḥ nīkārassa

original: rassattaṃ ya-kārassa ca ka-kārattaṃ katvā “niyyānikā”ti vuttaṃ, niyyānakaraṇasīlā
analyzed: rassa attam yakārassa ca kakāra attam katvā niyyānikā ati vuttam niyyāna karaṇa sīlā

original: vā niyyānikā. Uttaritabbassa aññassa niddiṭṭhassa abhāvā niddisiyamānā sauttarā dhammāva
analyzed: vā niyyānikā uttaritabbassa aññassa niddiṭṭhassa abhāvā niddisiyamānā sa auttarā

original: uttaritabbāti “attāna”nti āha. Rāgādīnanti rāgādīnaṃ dasannaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaniyatākusalānaṃ
analyzed: uttaritabbā ati attānam iti āha rāga ādīnam ti rāga ādīnam dasannam kilesānam sabba niyata akusalānam

original: vā. Tehi nānappakāradukkhanibbattakehi abhibhūtā sattā kandanti akandantāpi kandanakāraṇabhāvato.
analyzed: vā tehi nānappakāra dukkha nibbattakehi abhibhūtā sattā kandanti a kandantā api kandana kāraṇa bhāvato

original: Yasmā pana pahānekaṭṭhatāvasena ca “saraṇā”ti āha, tasmā “rāgādīna”nti vacanena rāgadosamohāva
analyzed: pana ca āha tasmā vacanena

original: gahitāti ñāyati. Raṇa-saddo vā rāgādireṇūsu niruḷho daṭṭhabbo, raṇaṃ vā yuddhaṃ,
analyzed: gahitā ati ñāyati raṇa saddo vā rāga ādi reṇūsu niruḷhaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ raṇam vā yuddham

original: “kāmā te paṭhamā senā”ti evamādikā ca akusalā senā ariyamaggayuddhena jetabbattā
analyzed: kāmā te paṭhamā senā ati evamādikā ca akusalā senā ariya magga yuddhena jetabba ttā

original: sayuddhattā “saraṇā”ti vuccantīti. Araṇavibhaṅgasutte pana sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā
analyzed: sa yuddhattā saraṇā ti vuccanti iti araṇa vibhaṅga sutte pana sa dukkhā sa upaghātā sa upāyāsā

original: sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipadābhūtā kāmasukhānuyogādayo “saraṇā”ti vuttāti dukkhādīnaṃ
analyzed: sa pariḷāhā kāma sukha anuyoga ādayo saraṇā ati vuttā ati dukkha ādīnam

original: raṇabhāvo tannibbattakasabhāvānaṃ akusalānaṃ saraṇatā ca veditabbā.
analyzed: raṇa bhāvaḥ tad nibbattaka sabhāvānam akusalānam saraṇa tā ca veditabbā

original: Piṭṭhidukā samattā.
analyzed: piṭṭhidukā samattā

original: Suttantikadukamātikāpadavaṇṇanā
101-108. Vijjārāsantogadhadhammā vijjāsabhāgatāya tadekadese vijjākoṭṭhāse vattantīti
analyzed: vijjā rāsantogadha dhammāḥ vijjā sabhā gatāya tad eka dese vijjā koṭṭhāse vattanti iti

original: vuttā. Vajirassa yattha taṃ patati, tattha abhejjaṃ nāma kiñci maṇipāsāṇādi natthi,
analyzed: vuttā vajirassa yattha tam patati tattha abhejjam nāma kiñci maṇi pāsāṇa ādi natthi

original: na ca tena gamanamaggo viruhati, evameva arahattamaggena yattha so uppajjati, tasmiṃ
analyzed: na ca tena gamana maggaḥ viruhati evam eva arahatta maggena yattha so uppajjati tasmin

original: santāne abhejjo kileso nāma natthi, na ca bhinno puna viruhatīti vajirupamatā veditabbā.
analyzed: santāne abhejjaḥ kilesaḥ nāma natthi na ca bhinnaḥ puna viruhati iti vajirupama tā veditabbā

original: Tadupacārena bālā yathā “mañcā ghosantī”ti. Kaṇhābhijātīti apāyā vuccanti manussesu
analyzed: tad upacārena bālāḥ yathā mañcāḥ ghosanti iti kaṇha abhijātī iti apāyāḥ vuccanti manussesu

original: ca dobhaggiyaṃ. Tapanassa vā dukkhassa hitāti tapaniyā.
analyzed: ca dobhaggiyam tapanassa vā dukkhassa hitā ati tapaniyā

original: Dāsādīsupi sirivaḍḍhakādisaddā viya atathattā vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattā
analyzed: dāsa ādī supi sirivaḍḍhaka ādi saddāḥ viya atathattā vacana mattam eva adhikāram katvā pavattā

original: adhivacanā. Yasmā pana adhivacananiruttipaññattipadāni samānatthāni, sabbañca vacanaṃ
analyzed: adhivacanā yasmā pana adhivacana nirutti paññatti padāni samāna atthāni sabbam ca vacanam

original: adhivacanādibhāvaṃ bhajati, tasmā tesupi vacanavisesesu visesena pavattehi adhivacanādisaddehi
analyzed: adhivacana ādi bhāvam bhajati tasmā tesu pi vacana visesesu visesena pavattehi adhivacana ādi saddehi

original: sabbāni vacanāni atthappakāsanasāmaññena vuttānīti etenādhippāyena ayaṃ atthayojanā
analyzed: sabbāni vacanāni attha ppakāsana sāmaññena vuttāni iti etena adhippāyena ayam attha yojanā

original: katāti veditabbā. Atha vā adhi-saddo uparibhāge, upari vacanaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Kassa
analyzed: katā ati veditabbā atha vā adhi saddaḥ upari bhāge upari vacanam adhivacanam kassa

original: upari? Pakāsetabbassa atthassāti viditovāyamattho. Adhīnaṃ vā vacanaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: upari pakāsetabbassa atthassa ati viditaḥ uva ayam atthaḥ adhīnam vā vacanam adhivacanam

original: Kena adhīnaṃ? Atthena. Tathā taṃtaṃatthappakāsane nicchitaṃ, niyataṃ vā vacanaṃ nirutti.
analyzed: kena adhīnam atthena tathā taṃ taṃ attha ppakāsane nicchitam niyatam vā vacanam nirutti

original: Pathavīdhātupurisāditaṃtaṃpakārena ñāpanato paññattīti evaṃ adhivacanādipadānaṃ sabbavacanesu
analyzed: pathavī dhātu purisa ādi taṃ taṃ pakārena ñāpanato paññatti iti evam adhivacana ādi padānam sabba vacanesu

original: pavatti veditabbā. Aññathā sirivaḍḍhakadhanavaḍḍhakappakārānameva abhilāpānaṃ adhivacanatā,
analyzed: pavatti veditabbā aññathā sirivaḍḍhaka dhanavaḍḍhaka ppakārānam eva abhilāpānam adhivacana tā

original: abhisaṅkharontīti evaṃpakārānameva niddhāraṇavacanānaṃ niruttitā, takko vitakkoti
analyzed: abhisaṅkharonti iti evaṃpakārānam eva niddhāraṇa vacanānam nirutti tā takkaḥ

original: evaṃpakārānameva ekamevatthaṃ tena tena pakārena ñāpentānaṃ paññattitā ca āpajjeyyāti.
analyzed: evaṃpakārānam eva ekam eva attham tena tena pakārena ñāpentānam paññatti tā ca āpajjeyya ati

original: 109-118. Phasso vedanāti sabbadāpi arūpadhammānaṃ phassādināmakattā pathaviyādīnaṃ
analyzed: phassaḥ vedanā ti sabbadā api arūpa dhammānam phassa ādi nāmaka ttā pathaviya ādīnam

original: kesakumbhādināmantarāpatti viya nāmantarānāpajjanato ca sadā attanāva katanāmatāya
analyzed: kesa kumbha ādi nāma antara āpatti ca sadā

original: catukkhandhanibbānāni nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena nāmaṃ. Namanaṃ avinābhāvato ārammaṇābhimukhatā,
analyzed: catu khandha nibbānāni nāma karaṇa ṭṭhena nāmam namanam avinābhāvataḥ ārammaṇa abhimukha tā

original: namanahetubhūtatā nāmanaṃ. Atha vā adhivacanasamphasso viya adhivacanaṃ nāmamantarena
analyzed: namana hetu bhūta tā nāmanam atha vā adhivacana samphassaḥ adhivacanam nāmam antarena

original: ye anupacitabodhisambhārānaṃ gahaṇaṃ na gacchanti, te nāmāyattaggahaṇā nāmaṃ. Rūpaṃ
analyzed: ye an upacita bodhi sambhārānam gahaṇam na gacchanti te nāma āyatta gahaṇāḥ nāmam rūpam

original: pana vināpi nāmasādhanaṃ attano ruppanasabhāvena gahaṇaṃ upayātīti rūpaṃ.
analyzed: pana vinā api nāma sādhanam attanaḥ ruppana sabhāvena gahaṇam upayāti iti rūpam

original: 119-123. Ito pubbe parikammaṃ pavattaṃ, ito paraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ, majjhe samāpattīti evaṃ
analyzed: itas pubbe parikammam pavattam itas param bhavaṅgam majjhe samāpatti iti evam

original: samāpattīnaṃ appanāparicchedapaññā samāpattikusalatā. Vuṭṭhāne kusalabhāvo pubbe
analyzed: samāpattīnam appanā pariccheda paññā samāpatti kusala tā vuṭṭhāne kusala bhāvo pubbe

original: vuṭṭhāne paricchedakaraṇañāṇaṃ. Lakkhaṇādivasena aniccādivasena ca manasi karaṇaṃ manasikāro.
analyzed: vuṭṭhāne pariccheda karaṇa ñāṇam lakkhaṇa ādi vasena anicca ādi vasena ca manasi karaṇam manasikāro

original: 124-134. Sucisīlatā soraccaṃ. Sā hi sobhanakammaratatāti. Sammodakassa, sammodako
analyzed: suci sīla tā soraccam sā hi sobhana kamma rata tā ati sammodakassa sammodakaḥ

original: vā mudubhāvo sammodakamudubhāvo, saṇhavācatā. “Aguttadvāratā”ti vutte kesu dvāresūti
analyzed: vā mudu bhāvo sammodaka mudu bhāvaḥ saṇha vāca tā agutta dvāra tā ati vutte kesu dvāresu iti

original: na paññāyatīti “indriyesū”ti vuttaṃ. Sampajānātīti sampajāno, tassa bhāvo sampajaññaṃ.
analyzed: na paññāyati iti indriyesu uti vuttam sampajānāti iti sampajāno tassa bhāvaḥ sampajaññam

original: Tadapi ñāṇaṃ yasmā sampajānāti, tasmā “sampajānātīti sampajañña”nti āha. Appaṭisaṅkhāne
analyzed: tat api ñāṇam yasmai sampajānāti tasmai sampajānāti iti sampajaññanti āha a paṭisaṅkhāne

original: nimitte visaye vā. Vīriyasīsenāti vīriyapāmokkhena. Uppannaṃ balanti vīriyopatthambhena
analyzed: nimitte visaye vā vīriya sīsena ati vīriya pāmokkhena uppannam balam ti vīriya upatthambhena

original: hi kusalabhāvanā balavatī thirā uppajjatīti tathā uppannā balavatī kusalabhāvanā
analyzed: hi kusala bhāvanā balavatī thirā uppajjati iti tathā uppannā balavatī kusala bhāvanā

original: balavanto satta bojjhaṅgātipi vuccanti. Kasiṇanimittaṃ viya saññāṇaṃ viya saviggahaṃ
analyzed: balavanto satta bojjhaṅgāḥ ti pi vuccanti kasiṇa nimittam viya saññāṇam viya sa viggaham

original: viya ca suṭṭhu upalakkhetabbākāraṃ “nimitta”nti vuccati. Samatho ca evaṃ ākāroti
analyzed: viya ca suṭṭhu upalakkhetabba ākāram nimittan ti vuccati samatho ca evam ākāro ti

original: “nimitta”nti vutto. Tathā hi so paccavekkhantena paccavekkhaṇato gayhatīti. Uddhaccamiva
analyzed: nimittam ti vuttaḥ tathā hi so paccavekkhantena paccavekkhaṇataḥ gayhati iti uddhaccam iva

original: cittaṃ na vikkhipatīti, vikkhepapaṭikkhepo vā avikkhepo.
analyzed: cittam na vikkhipati iti vikkhepa paṭikkhepaḥ vā avikkhepaḥ

original: 135-142. Sīlameva punappunaṃ āseviyamānaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttarampi sīlaṃ paripūretīti
analyzed: sīlam eva punappunar āseviyamānam lokiyam lokuttaram pi sīlam paripūreti iti

original: “sīlaparipūraṇato”ti vuttaṃ. Sīlassa sampadāti kāraṇasīlampi phalasīlampi sampannasamudāyassa
analyzed: sīla paripūraṇato ti vuttam sīlassa sampadā ati kāraṇa sīlam pi phala sīlam pi sampanna samudāyassa

original: ekadesavasena vuttaṃ. Atha vā “katame ca thapati akusalā sīlā? Akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ
analyzed: eka desa vasena vuttam atha vā katame ca thapati akusalā sīlā akusalam kāya kammaṃ

original: akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ pāpako ājīvo”ti vuttattā sabbampi kusalākusalaṃ “sīla”nti gahetvā
analyzed: akusalam vacī kammam pāpakaḥ ājīvaḥ ti vutta ttā sabbam pi kusala akusalam sīlan ti gahetvā

original: tattha kusalasīlaṃ niddhāretvā “sīlasampadā”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ diṭṭhisampadāpi veditabbā.
analyzed: tattha kusala sīlam niddhāretvā sīla sampadā iti vuttam evam diṭṭhi sampadā api veditabbā

original: Asāmaggī…pe… pattitoti cakkhurūpālokamanasikārānaṃ asamavetānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa
analyzed: a sāmaggī pe pattito ti cakkhu rūpa āloka manasikārānam a samavetānam cakkhu viññāṇassa

original: ahetubhāve sati samavetānañca taṃsabhāvāvinivattito hetubhāvānāpattitoti attho. Na
analyzed: ahetu bhāve sati samavetānam ca taṃsa bhāva avinivattitaḥ hetu bhāva anāpattitaḥ ti atthaḥ na

original: hi sabhāvantaraṃ aññena sahitaṃ sabhāvantaraṃ hotīti. Ekasminti andhasate ekekasmiṃ
analyzed: hi sabhāvantaram aññena sahitam sabhāvantaram hoti iti ekasmin ti andha sate ekekasmin

original: andheti adhippāyo. Aññathā yathārutavasena atthe gayhamāne ekassa andhassa dassanāsamatthatā
analyzed: andha iti adhippāyaḥ aññathā yathā ruta vasena atthe gayhamāne ekassa andhassa dassana asamattha tā

original: sabbesampi na hoti, nāpi ekassa asamatthatāya sabbesampi asamatthatā vuttā, kintu
analyzed: sabbesam pi na hoti na api ekassa asamattha tāya sabbesam pi asamattha tā vuttā kintu

original: sabbesaṃ visuṃ asamatthatāya evāti upamāvacanaṃ na yujjeyya, nāpi upamopamitabbasambandho.
analyzed: sabbesam visum asamattha tāya eva ati upamā vacanam na yujjeyya nā api upamā upamitabba sambandhaḥ

original: Na hi upamitabbesu cakkhādīsu ekassa asamatthatāya sabbesampi asamatthatā vuttā,
analyzed: na hi upamitabbesu cakkha ādīsu ekassa asamattha tāya sabbesam pi asamattha tā vuttā

original: kintu sabbesaṃ visuṃ asamatthatāya sahitānaṃ asamatthatāti. Andhasataṃ passatīti

original: ca andhasataṃ sahitaṃ passatīti adhippāyo aññathā vuttanayena upamitabbāsamānatāpattito.
analyzed: ca andha satam sahitam passati iti adhippāyaḥ aññathā vutta nayena upamitabba asamāna tā āpattito

original: Sādhā…pe… ṭhitabhāvoti yesu vijjamānesu phalappavatti tesaṃ samodhāne, yathā pavattamānesu

original: tesu phalappavatti, tathā pavattimāha. Na yesaṃ kesañci anekesaṃ samodhānamattaṃ

original: sāmaggī. Na hi saddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbasamodhānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa, kaṭṭhakapālapāsāṇasamodhānaṃ
analyzed: sāmaggī na hi sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabba samodhānam cakkhu viññāṇassa kaṭṭha kapāla pāsāṇa samodhānam

original: vā sotaviññāṇassa hetūti. Tanti taṃ dassanaṃ. Asā…pe… siddhoti nāyamattho sādhetabbo
analyzed: vā sota viññāṇassa hetu iti tam ti tam dassanam siddhaḥ ti na ayam attho sādhetabbo

original: visuṃ ahetūnaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ sahitānaṃ hetubhāvassa paccakkhasiddhattāti attho. Na

original: hi paccakkhasiddhe yuttimagganaṃ yuttanti.
analyzed: hi paccakkha siddhe yutti magganam yuttam ti

analyzed: manussattā ādīnam khaṇa avayavānam sāmaggī khaṇa sāmaggī tam vinā saḥ navama cakka sampatti saṅkhātaḥ

analyzed: khaṇaḥ natthi sā eva hi khaṇa sāmaggī saḥ khaṇo ti attho khaṇape dīpeti attanaḥ dullabha tāya ati

analyzed: atthaḥ khaṇa atthaḥ vā samaya saddo khaṇa saṅkhāto samayaḥ iti vutto saḥ yasmin dullabhe

analyzed: khaṇe sati iti imassa atthassa vibhāvana vasena tad āyattāya kusala uppattiyā dullabha bhāvam

original: dīpeti. Etenupāyena samavāya…pe… vuttiṃ dīpetīti ettha ito paresu ca yojanā tassa
analyzed: dīpeti etena upāyena vuttim dīpeti iti ettha itas paresu ca yojanā tassa

original: tassa taṃtaṃdīpane kātabbā.
analyzed: tassa taṃ taṃ dīpane kātabbā

original: Tassa purisassāti “seyyathāpi bhikkhave cattāro daḷhadhammā dhanuggahā sikkhitā katahatthā
analyzed: tassa purisassa ati seyyathā api bhikkhave cattāraḥ daḷhadhammāḥ dhanuggahāḥ sikkhitā katahatthāḥ

analyzed: katu pāsanā catuddisā ṭhitāḥ assu atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya aham katu pāsanānaṃ

original: kaṇḍe khitte khitte appatiṭṭhite pathaviyaṃ gahetvā āharissāmī”’ti evaṃ vuttajavanapurisassa.
analyzed: kaṇḍe khitte khitte appatiṭṭhite pathaviyam gahetvā āharissāmi iti evam vutta javana purisassa

original: Tāva parittakoti gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ

original: sirasi pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsannipātato ca parittataro kālo. Kālasaṅkhāto samayo
analyzed: sirasi pāde ca baddha khura dhārā sannipātataḥ ca parittataraḥ kālaḥ kāla saṅkhātaḥ samayaḥ

original: cittaparicchinno vuccamāno teneva paricchedakacittena “evaṃ paritto aha”nti attano
analyzed: citta paricchinnaḥ vuccamānaḥ tena iva paricchedaka cittena evam parittaḥ ahanti attanaḥ

original: parittataṃ dīpeti. Yathā cāhaṃ, evaṃ sabbo kusalacittappavattikāloti tassa parittataṃ
analyzed: paritta tam dīpeti yathā ca aham evam sabbaḥ kusala citta ppavatti kālo ti tassa paritta tam

original: dīpeti. Saddassa dīpanā vuttanayānusārena veditabbā.
analyzed: dīpa iti saddassa dīpanā vutta naya anusārena veditabbā

original: Pakativādīnaṃ mahato viya aṇuvādīnaṃ dviaṇukassa viya ca ekasseva. Hetu…pe… vuttitaṃ
analyzed: pakati vādīnam mahataḥ viya aṇu vādīnam dvi aṇukassa viya ca ekassa iva hetupe

original: dīpetīti paccayāyattavuttidīpanato tapparabhāvā hetusaṅkhātassa parāyattavuttidīpanatā
analyzed: dīpeti iti paccaya āyatta vutti dīpanato tad para bhāvā hetu saṅkhātassa para āyatta vutti dīpana tā

analyzed: vuttā sati pana paccaya āyatta bhāve paccaya sāmaggī āyatta tā samavāya saṅkhātena dīpiyati iti

original: atapparabhāvato tassa taṃdīpanatā na vuttā. Anena samayena kattubhūtena, anena samayena
analyzed: a tad para bhāvataḥ tassa tad dīpana tā na vuttā anena samayena kattu bhūtena anena samayena

original: vā karaṇabhūtena bhagavatā paṭisedhitoti attho. Esa nayo purimāsu dīpanāsu.
analyzed: vā karaṇa bhūtena bhagavatā paṭisedhito ti attho esa nayo purimāsu dīpanāsu

original: Adhikaraṇavasenāti ādhāravasena. Etthāti kālasamūhasaṅkhāte samaye gahiteti attho.
analyzed: adhikaraṇa vasena ati ādhāra vasena ettha ati kāla samūha saṅkhāte samaye gahitā iti attho

original: Kālopi hi cittaparicchinno sabhāvato avijjamānopi ādhārabhāveneva saññāto “adhikaraṇa”nti
analyzed: kālaḥ api hi citta paricchinnaḥ sabhāvataḥ a vijjamānaḥ api ādhāra bhāvena iva saññātaḥ adhikaraṇam ti

original: vutto taṃkhaṇappavattānaṃ tato pubbe parato ca abhāvā. Bhāvoti kiriyā. Kiriyāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: vuttaḥ tad khaṇa ppavattānam tatas pubbe paratas ca abhāvāḥ bhāvo ti kiriyā kiriyāya kiriya antara lakkhaṇam

analyzed: samayassa sattā kiriyāya cittuppāda kiriyā phassa ādi bhavana kiriyā ca lakkhīyati iti ubhayattha

original: samayasadde bhummaniddeso kato lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti.
analyzed: samaya sadde bhumma niddeso kataḥ lakkhaṇa bhūta bhāva yutto ti

original: Uddānatoti uddesato saṅkhepato. Kilesakāmo vatthukāmabhāvaṃ bhajanto kāmanīyavasena
analyzed: uddānato ti uddesataḥ saṅkhepato kilesa kāmaḥ vatthu kāma bhāvam bhajanto kāmanīya vasena

original: bhajati, na kāmanavasenāti kāmanavasena kilesakāmo eva hoti, na vatthukāmo. Duvidhopesoti
analyzed: bhajati na kāmana vasena ati kāmana vasena kilesa kāmaḥ eva hoti na vatthu kāmaḥ duvidha upeso ti

original: vacanena duvidhassapi sahitassa avacaraṇappadesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tena vatthukāmasseva
analyzed: vacanena duvidhassa api sahitassa avacaraṇa ppadesam saṅgaṇhāti tena vatthu kāmassa eva

original: pavattideso rūpārūpadhātudvayaṃ apanītaṃ hoti. Nanu ca duvidhopi sahito rūpārūpadhātūsu
analyzed: pavatti desaḥ rūpa arūpa dhātu dvayam apanītam hoti nanu ca duvidhaḥ api sahitaḥ rūpa arūpa dhātūsu

analyzed: pavattati rūpa arūpa avacara dhammānam vatthu kāma ttā tad ārammaṇānam rūpa arūpa rāgānam ca

original: kilesakāmabhāvasiddhitoti? Taṃ na, bahalakilesassa kāmarāgassa kilesakāmabhāvena
analyzed: kilesa kāma bhāva siddhitaḥ ti tam na bahala kilesassa kāma rāgassa kilesa kāma bhāvena

original: idha saṅgahitattā. Evañca katvā rūpārūpadhātūsu pavattamānesu kāmāvacaradhammesu
analyzed: idha saṅgahita ttā evañca katvā rūpa arūpa dhātūsu pavattamānesu kāmāvacara dhammesu

original: nikanti idha na saṅgahitā sukhumattā. “Uddānato dve kāmā”ti sabbakāme uddisitvāpi
analyzed: idha na saṅgahitā sukhuma ttā uddānataḥ dve kāmā ti sabba kāme uddisitvā api

original: hi “duvidhopeso”ti ettha tadekadesabhūtā aññamaññasahitatāparicchinnā kāmarāgatabbatthukadhammāva
analyzed: hi duvidhā upesā ti ettha tad eka desa bhūtā aññamañña sahita tā paricchinnā kāma rāga tabbatthuka dhammā ava

analyzed: idha pavattati iti anavasesa pavatti tam sandhāya duvidhā upesaḥ ti vuttam vatthu kāmaḥ api

original: kāmāvacaradhammāva idha gahitā. Evañca katvā sasatthāvacaropamā yuttā hoti. “Rūpūpapattiyā
analyzed: kāmāvacara dhammā idha gahitā evañca katvā sa satthāvacara upamā yuttā hoti rūpa upapattiyā

original: maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti ettha rūpabhavo uttarapadalopaṃ katvā “rūpa”nti vutto, evamidhāpi
analyzed: maggam bhāveti iti ettha rūpa bhavaḥ uttara pada lopam katvā rūpam iti vuttaḥ evam idha api

original: uttarapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. Aññathā hi cittaṃ kāmāvacarāvacaranti vucceyyāti. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasenātiādike

original: “kāmo”ti sabbaṃ taṇhamāha, tasmā “kāmañcesā”tiādi vuttaṃ, “kāme avacāretīti kāmāvacāra”nti
analyzed: kāmo ti sabbam taṇham āha tasmā vuttam kāme avacāreti iti kāma avacāranti

original: vattabbe cā-saddassa rassattaṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: vattabbe ca a saddassa ras sattam katam

original: Ruḷhisaddenāti ñāṇasampayuttesu ruḷhena saddena, ñāṇasampayuttesu vā pavattitvā anavajjasukhavipākatāya
analyzed: ruḷhi saddena ati ñāṇa sampayuttesu ruḷhena saddena ñāṇa sampayuttesu vā pavattitvā anavajja sukha vipāka tāya

original: taṃsadisesu ñāṇavippayuttesu ruḷhena saddena. Atha vā kiñci nimittaṃ gahetvā satipi
analyzed: taṃsadisesu ñāṇa vippayuttesu ruḷhena saddena atha vā kiñci nimittam gahetvā satipi

original: aññasmiṃ taṃnimittayutte kismiñcideva visaye sammutiyā cirakālatāvasena nimittavirahepi
analyzed: aññasmin tad nimitta yutte kismiṃcid eva visaye sammutiyā cira kāla tā vasena nimitta virahe pi

original: pavatti ruḷhi nāma yathā “mahiyaṃ setīti mahiṃso, gacchantīti gāvo”ti, evaṃ kusalasaddassapi

original: ruḷhibhāvo veditabbo. Paññāniddese “kosalla”nti abhidhamme vuttaṃ, tassa ca bhāvā
analyzed: ruḷhi bhāvaḥ veditabbo paññā niddese kosallanti abhidhamme vuttam tassa ca bhāvā

original: kusalasaddappavattīti kosallayogā kusalanti ayaṃ abhidhammapariyāyo hoti. Kusalanti kusalabhāvaṃ āha.
analyzed: kusala sadda ppavattī iti kosalla yogā kusalanti ayam abhidhamma pariyāyaḥ hoti kusalanti kusala bhāvam āha

original: Vipākādīnaṃ avajjapaṭipakkhatā natthīti kusalameva anavajjalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Anavajjalakkhaṇamevāti
analyzed: vipāka ādīnam avajja paṭipakkha tā natthi iti kusalam eva anavajja lakkhaṇam vuttam anavajja lakkhaṇam eva ati

original: sukhavipākasabhāvassa lakkhaṇabhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ, taṃnivāraṇañca

original: tassa paccupaṭṭhānataṃ vatthukāmatāya kataṃ. Sampattiatthena rasena vodānabhāvarasaṃ.
analyzed: tassa paccupaṭṭhānatam vatthu kāma tāya katam sampatti atthena rasena vodāna bhāva rasam

original: Phalaṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhānena iṭṭhavipākapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabhāvo kakkhaḷādiphusanādiko
analyzed: phala aṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhānena iṭṭha vipāka paccupaṭṭhānam sabhāvaḥ kakkhaḷa ādi phusana ādiko

original: asādhāraṇo. Sāmaññaṃ sādhāraṇo aniccādisabhāvo. Idha ca kusalalakkhaṇaṃ sabbakusalasādhāraṇasabhāvattā
analyzed: asādhāraṇaḥ sāmaññam sādhāraṇaḥ anicca ādi sabhāvaḥ idha ca kusala lakkhaṇam sabba kusala sādhāraṇa sabhāva ttā

original: sāmaññaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, akusalādīhi asādhāraṇatāya sabhāvo vā. Upaṭṭhānākāroti gahetabbabhāvena
analyzed: sāmaññam daṭṭhabbam akusala ādīhi asādhāraṇa tāya sabhāvaḥ vā upaṭṭhāna ākāraḥ iti gahetabba bhāvena

original: ñāṇassa upaṭṭhahanākāro. Phalaṃ pana attano kāraṇaṃ paṭicca tappaṭibimbabhāvena,
analyzed: ñāṇassa upaṭṭhahana ākāraḥ phalam pana attanaḥ kāraṇam paṭicca tad paṭibimba bhāvena

original: paṭimukhaṃ vā upaṭṭhātīti paccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: paṭimukham vā upaṭṭhāti iti paccupaṭṭhānam

original: Vijānātīti saññāpaññākiccavisiṭṭhaṃ visayaggahaṇaṃ āha. Sabbacittasādhāraṇattā yattha
analyzed: vijānāti iti saññā paññā kicca visiṭṭham visaya ggahaṇam āha sabba citta sādhāraṇa ttā yattha

original: yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati, tattha tattha tathā tathā gahetabboti. Yaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvena
analyzed: yattha yathā yathā atthaḥ labbhati tattha tattha tathā tathā gahetabbo ti yam āsevana paccaya bhāvena

original: cinoti, yañca kammunā abhisaṅkhatattā citaṃ, taṃ tathā “citta”nti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana
analyzed: cinoti yat ca kammunā abhisaṅkhata ttā citam tam tathā cittam ti vuttam yam pana

original: tathā na hoti, taṃ parittakiriyadvayaṃ antimajavanañca labbhamānacintanavicittatādivasena
analyzed: tathā na tam paritta kiriya dvayam antima javanam ca labbhamāna cintana vicitta tā ādi vasena

original: “citta”nti veditabbaṃ. Hasituppādo pana aññajavanagatikova. Cittānaṃ panāti vicitrānanti
analyzed: cittam ti veditabbam hasita uppādo pana añña javana gatikaḥ iva cittānam pana ati vicitrānam ti

original: attho. Tadantogadhattā hi samudāyavohārena avayavopi “citta”nti vuccati yathā pabbatanadīsamuddādiekadesesu
analyzed: atthaḥ hi samudāya vohārena avayavaḥ api cittan ti vuccati yathā pabbata nadī samudda ādi ekadesesu

original: diṭṭhesu pabbatādayo diṭṭhāti vuccantīti. Caraṇaṃ nāma gahetvā caritabbacittapaṭo. Rūpānīti bimbāni.
analyzed: diṭṭhesu pabbata ādayaḥ diṭṭhā ti vuccanti iti caraṇam nāma gahetvā caritabba citta paṭaḥ rūpāni iti bimbāni

original: Ajjhattikanti indriyabaddhaṃ vadati. Cittakatamevāti cittassa mūlakāraṇataṃ sandhāya
analyzed: ajjhattikam ti indriya baddham vadati cittakatam eva ati cittassa mūla kāraṇa tam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Kammassa hetaṃ cittaṃ kāraṇanti. Taṃ pana atthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kāyakammādibheda”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: vuttam kammassa ha etam cittam kāraṇam ti tam pana attham vibhāvetum kāya kamma ādi bheda nti ādim āha

original: Liṅganānattanti saṇṭhānanānattaṃ, bhinnasaṇṭhānaṅgapaccaṅgavato sarīrassa vā nānattaṃ.

original: Vohāravasena itthipurisādibhāvena voharitabbesu patthanāvisesā uppajjanti, tato kammavisesā.
analyzed: vohāra vasena itthi purisa ādi bhāvena voharitabbesu patthanā visesāḥ uppajjanti tatas kamma visesā

original: Evamidaṃ kammanānattaṃ vohāranānattato hoti. Apā…pe… kāditāti evamādīsu ādi-saddehi

original: gatiyā upapattiyā attabhāve lokadhammesu ca nānākaraṇāni suttāgatāni saṅgaṇhāti.

original: Kammanānattādivasenāti ettha kusalākusalavasena kammanānattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Visadisasabhāvatā

original: hi nānattanti. Kusalakammassa dānādivasena kāyasucaritādibhāvena ca puthuttaṃ, akusalakammassa

original: ca macchariyādīhi kāyaduccaritādīhi ca puthuttaṃ veditabbaṃ. Bahuppakāratā hi puthuttanti.
analyzed: ca macchariya ādīhi kāya duccarita ādīhi ca puthuttam veditabbam bahu ppakāra tā hi puthuttam ti

original: Annadānādivasena dānādīnaṃ pāṇātipātāviratiādivasena kāyasucaritādīnaṃ āvāsamacchariyādivasena

original: macchariyādīnaṃ pāṇātipātādivasena kāyaduccaritādīnañca pabhedo veditabbo. Ekekassa
analyzed: macchariya ādīnam pāṇa atipāta ādi vasena kāya duccarita ādīnam ca pabhedaḥ veditabbaḥ ekekassa

analyzed: hi pakārassa bhedo pabhedaḥ iti nānatta ādīnam vavatthānam tathā tathā vavatthita tā nicchita tā

original: Etenupāyena liṅganānattādīni veditabbāni. Kammanānattādīhi nibbattāni hi tānīti.
analyzed: etena upāyena liṅga nānatta ādīni veditabbāni kamma nānatta ādīhi nibbattāni hi tāni iti

original: Paccuppannassa liṅgassa kammato pavattiṃ tadanukkamena paccuppannakammassa nipphattiñca
analyzed: paccuppannassa liṅgassa kammataḥ pavattim tad anukkamena paccuppanna kammassa nipphattiñca

original: paṭiccā”tiādimāha. Tattha purimena kammavacanena avijjāsaṅkhārā, liṅgādivacanena
analyzed: paṭicca ati ādim āha tattha purimena kamma vacanena avijjā saṅkhārāḥ liṅga ādi vacanena

original: viññāṇādīni bhavapariyosānāni, gatiādivacanena jātijarāmaraṇāni gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.

original: Tattha gatīti nirayādayo pañca gatiyo vuccanti, tāsaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ apadādibhāvo. Tā

analyzed: hi tathā upapatti iti go mahiṃsa ādi khattiya ādi cātumahārājika ādi upapattiyaḥ tāsam

original: nānākaraṇaṃ uccāditā. Khattiyo eva hi ekacco kulabhogaissariyādīhi ucco hoti, ekacco
analyzed: nānākaraṇam khattiyaḥ eva hi ekaccaḥ kula bhoga issariya ādīhi uccaḥ hoti ekaccaḥ

original: nīco. Tehi eva hīnatāya hīno, padhānabhāvaṃ nītatāya paṇīto, aḍḍhatāya sugato, daliddatāya

original: duggato. Kulavasena vā uccanīcatā, issariyavasena hīnapaṇītatā, bhogavasena sugataduggatatā

analyzed: yojetabbā suvaṇṇa dubbaṇṇa tā ati odāta sāma ādi vaṇṇa suddhi asuddhi vasena vuttam sujāta dujjāta tā ati

original: nigrodhaparimaṇḍalādiārohapariṇāhehi lakkhaṇehi vā attabhāvaparipuṇṇāparipuṇṇajātatāvasena.
analyzed: nigrodha parimaṇḍala ādi āroha pariṇāhehi lakkhaṇehi vā atta bhāva paripuṇṇa a paripuṇṇa jāta tā vasena

original: Susaṇṭhitadussaṇṭhitatāti aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānavasena.

original: Aparampi vuttaṃ ajjhattikacittassa yathāvuttassa cittakatabhāvasādhakaṃ suttaṃ “kammato”tiādi.
analyzed: aparam pi vuttam ajjhattika cittassa yathā vuttassa citta kata bhāva sādhakam suttam kammato tiādi

original: Kammañhi cittato nibbattanti tato nipphajjamānaṃ sabbampi cittaṃ cittakatamevāti
analyzed: kamman hi cittataḥ nibbattanti tatas nipphajjamānam sabbam pi cittam cittakatam eva ati

original: sādheti. Kammanibbattato liṅgato pavattamānaliṅgasaññā mūlakāraṇato kammato āsannakāraṇato

analyzed: liṅgato ca pavattā hoti iti āha atha vā liṅgam ca saññā ca

original: liṅgasaññā, tā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kammato liṅgato ca pavattareti attho. Saññāto bhedaṃ
analyzed: liṅga saññā tā yathāsaṅkhyam kammataḥ liṅgataḥ ca pavattareti attho saññātaḥ bhedam

original: gacchantīti te itthipurisādiliṅgasaññāto itthipurisādivohārabhedaṃ dhammā gacchanti,
analyzed: gacchanti iti te itthi purisa ādi liṅga saññātaḥ itthi purisa ādi vohāra bhedam dhammā gacchanti

original: tathā tathā voharitabbāti attho. Imāya gāthāya atītapaccuppannaddhapaṭiccasamuppādavasena
analyzed: tathā tathā voharitabbā ti atthaḥ imāya gāthāya atīta paccuppanna ddha paṭiccasamuppāda vasena

original: cittakataṃ cittaṃ dassitaṃ.
analyzed: citta katam cittam dassitam

original: Loko eva pajātattā pajāti purimapādassa vivaraṇaṃ pacchimapādo daṭṭhabbo. Yathā rathassa
analyzed: lokaḥ eva pajāta ttā pajāti purima pādassa vivaraṇam pacchima pādaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ yathā rathassa

original: āṇi nibandhanā, evaṃ sattalokarathassa kammaṃ nibandhananti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: nibandhanā evam satta loka rathassa kammam nibandhanan ti upamā saṃsandanam veditabbam

original: Imāya ca gāthāya addhadvayavasena cittassa kammaviññāṇakatatā dassitā. Kittinti parammukhā
analyzed: imāya ca gāthāya addha dvaya vasena cittassa kamma viññāṇa kata tā dassitā parammukhā

original: kittanaṃ patthaṭayasataṃ. Pasaṃsanti sammukhā pasaṃsanaṃ thutiṃ. Kammanānākaraṇanti
analyzed: kittanam patthaṭa yasatam pasaṃsanti sammukhā pasaṃsanam thutim kamma nānākaraṇanti

original: kammato nibbattanānākaraṇaṃ kammajehi anumiyamānaṃ kammasseva vā nānākaraṇaṃ.

original: Kammassakāti kammasayā. Kammassa dāyaṃ tena dātabbaṃ ādiyantīti kammadāyādā. Aṇḍajādīnañca
analyzed: kammassakā ati kamma sayā kammassa dāyam tena dātabbam ādiyanti iti kamma dāyādāḥ aṇḍaja ādīnam ca

analyzed: yonīnam kammataḥ nibbatta ttā kammam eva yoni atta bhāva paṭilābha nimittam etesanti kammayonī

original: Bandhanaṭṭhena kammaṃ bandhu etesanti kammabandhū.
analyzed: bandhana ṭṭhena kammam bandhu etesanti kamma bandhū

original: Cittassāti kammaviññāṇassa. Tassa pana aladdhokāsatā aññena kammena paṭibāhitattā
analyzed: cittassa ati kamma viññāṇassa tassa pana a laddha ukāsa tā aññena kammena paṭibāhita ttā

analyzed: puggalassa nibbatta ttā ca veditabbā vijjamānam pi apara apariya vedanīya kamma viññāṇam

original: kālagatipayogādisahakārīpaccayavikalatāya avasesapaccayavekallaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekaccacittanti
analyzed: kāla gati payoga ādi sahakārī paccaya vikala tāya avasesa paccaya vekallam daṭṭhabbam ekacca cittam ti

analyzed: cittena kattabba citrena ekacca bhūtam tena kattabba citram āha

original: Anubhavitvā bhavitvā ca apagataṃ bhūtāpagataṃ. Anubhūtabhūtatā hi bhūtatāsāmaññena

analyzed: ca okāsaḥ kataḥ etena ati okāsaḥ kataḥ etassa ati ca duvidhatthe pi evam eva kata saddassa

original: paranipāto veditabbo.
analyzed: para nipātaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Sabbadā avattamānampi gamiyacittaṃ paṭipakkhapaccavekkhaṇāya avikkhambhitattā “uppanna”nti

original: vuccati. Lokiyadhammañhi desetabbaṃ patvā desanāya cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ hoti, dhammasabhāvaṃ

original: rāgādayo ekantaakusalā. Akusalapakkhikāti phassādayopi tappakkhikā. Mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ

analyzed: paṭhamam uppannaḥ viya hoti iti evam vuttaḥ sampayuttā api tad anuvattana tāya

original: Cittena nīyatīti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ sandhāyāha, taṇhāsampayuttaṃ vā. Pabhassaranti

original: Katarapaññaṃ tvantiādi na pāḷiāruḷhaṃ, evaṃ bhagavā pucchatīti aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttaṃ.

original: Sātanti sabhāvavasena vuttaṃ, madhuranti madhuraṃ viyāti upamāvasena. Ponobbhavikāti

original: punabbhavakaraṇasīlā. Tatratatrābhinandanato nandī, nandibhūto rāgo nandirāgo, nandirāgabhāvena

original: sahagatāti nandirāgasahagatāti na ettha sampayogavasena sahagatabhāvo atthīti sahagatasaddo

original: taṇhāya nandirāgabhāvaṃ joteti. Nandirāgabhūtāti cassa attho. Nissayeti pādake. Rūpārūpārammaṇānanti
analyzed: taṇhāya nandi rāga bhāvam jotā iti nandi rāga bhūtā ati ca ssa atthaḥ nissaye iti pādake

original: pathavīkasiṇādiākāsādiārammaṇānaṃ. Saṃsaṭṭheti khīrodakaṃ viya samodite ekībhāvamiva

original: hi “ghaṭṭanā”ti vutto. Saṅghaṭṭanena saheva saddo uppajjati, na pubbāparabhāvena.
analyzed: hi ghaṭṭana ati vuttaḥ saṅghaṭṭanena saha iva saddaḥ uppajjati na pubba apara bhāvena

original: Pathavīdhātuyāti idaṃ vāyodhātuyā viya cālanaṃ pathavīdhātuyā saṅghaṭṭanaṃ kiccaṃ
analyzed: idam vāyodhātuyā cālanam pathavī dhātuyā saṅghaṭṭanam kiccam

original: adhikanti katvā vuttaṃ, vikārassa ca tappaccayabhāvo vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tabbikārānañhi
analyzed: adhikam ti katvā vuttam vikārassa ca tad paccaya bhāvaḥ vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: bhūtānaṃ aññamaññassa paccayabhāvoti. Aññampi sabbaṃ vidhānaṃ kāyaviññattiyaṃ viya veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhūtānam aññam aññassa paccaya bhāvaḥ ti aññam pi sabbam vidhānam kāyaviññattiyam viya veditabbam

original: Tisamuṭṭhānikakāyaṃ…pe… na labbhati. Na hi cālanaṃ upādinnaghaṭṭananti. Cālanañhi
analyzed: na labbhati na hi cālanam upādinna ghaṭṭanan ti cālanam hi

original: desantaruppādanaparamparatā, ghaṭṭanaṃ paccayavisesena bhūtakalāpānaṃ āsannataruppādoti.
analyzed: desantara uppādana parampara tā ghaṭṭanam paccaya visesena bhūta kalāpānam āsanna taru ppādaḥ ti

original: Upatthambhanakiccampi natthīti upatthambhanena vinā paṭhamacittasamuṭṭhānāpi ghaṭṭanākārena
analyzed: upatthambhana kiccam pi natthi iti upatthambhanena vinā paṭhama citta samuṭṭhānā api ghaṭṭana ākārena

original: pavattatīti ghaṭṭanatthaṃ upatthambhanena payojanaṃ natthi, laddhāsevanena citteneva
analyzed: pavattati iti ghaṭṭana attham upatthambhanena payojanam natthi laddha āsevanena cittena iva

original: ghaṭṭanassa balavabhāvato cāti adhippāyo. Upatthambhanaṃ natthi atthīti vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ghaṭṭanassa balava bhāvataḥ ca ati adhippāyaḥ upatthambhanam natthi atthi iti vicāretvā gahetabbam

original: Vacīkammadvārakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vacī kamma dvāra kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Manokammadvārakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: manaḥ kamma dvāra kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Ayaṃ nāma cetanā kammaṃ na hotīti na vattabbāti idaṃ yassa dvāraṃ mano, taṃdassanatthaṃ
analyzed: ayam nāma cetanā kammam na hoti iti na vattabbā ati idam yassa dvāram manaḥ tad dassana attham

original: vuttaṃ. Kappetīti “tvaṃ phusanaṃ karohi, tvaṃ vedayita”nti evaṃ kappentaṃ viya pavattatīti
analyzed: vuttam kappeti iti tvam phusanam karohi tvam vedayitanti evam kappentam viya pavattati iti

original: attho. Pakappanañca tadeva. Kiṃ piṇḍaṃ karotīti āyūhanatthavasena pucchati. Phassādidhamme
analyzed: tat eva kim piṇḍam karoti iti āyūhana attha vasena pucchati phassa ādi dhamme

original: hi avippakiṇṇe katvā sakiccesu pavattanaṃ āyūhanaṃ, tattheva byāpāraṇaṃ cetayanaṃ,
analyzed: hi a vippakiṇṇe katvā sa kiccesu pavattanam āyūhanam tattha iva byāpāraṇam cetayanam

original: tathākaraṇaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇanti. Tebhūmakasseva gahaṇaṃ lokuttarakammassa kammakkhayakarattā.
analyzed: tathā karaṇam tebhūmakassa iva gahaṇam lokuttara kammassa kamma kkhaya kara ttā

original: Manokammadvārakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: manaḥ kamma dvāra kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Kammakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: kamma kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Cetayitvā kammaṃ karotīti ettha yasmā purimacetanāya cetayitvā sanniṭṭhānakammaṃ
analyzed: cetayitvā kammam karoti iti ettha yasmai purima cetanāya cetayitvā sanniṭṭhāna kammaṃ

original: karoti, tasmā cetanāpubbakaṃ kammaṃ taṃcetanāsabhāvamevāti cetanaṃ ahaṃ kammaṃ vadāmīti
analyzed: karoti tasmā cetanā pubbakam kammam cetanam aham kammam vadāmi iti

original: attho. Atha vā samānakālattepi kāraṇakiriyā pubbakālā viya vattuṃ yuttā, phalakiriyā
analyzed: atthaḥ atha vā samāna kāla tte pi kāraṇa kiriyā pubba kālāḥ viya vattum yuttā phala kiriyā

original: ca aparakālā viya. Yasmā ca cetanāya cetayitvā kāyavācāhi copanakiriyaṃ manasā ca
analyzed: ca yasmai ca cetanāya cetayitvā manasā ca

original: abhijjhādikiriyaṃ karoti, tasmā tassā kiriyāya kārikaṃ cetanaṃ ahaṃ kammaṃ vadāmīti
analyzed: abhijjhā ādi kiriyam karoti tasmā tassā kiriyāya kārikam cetanam aham kammam vadāmi iti

original: attho. Kāye vāti kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte kāye vā. Satīti dharamāne, anirodhite vā. Kāyasamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: attho kāye vā ati kāya viññatti saṅkhāte kāye vā sati iti dharamāne a nirodhite vā kāya samuṭṭhāpikā

original: cetanā kāyasañcetanā. Ettha ca sukhadukkhuppādakena kammena bhavitabbaṃ, cetanā ca
analyzed: cetanā kāya sañcetanā ettha ca sukha dukkha uppādakena kammena bhavitabbam cetanā ca

original: sukhadukkhuppādikā vuttāti tassā kammabhāvo siddho hoti. Sañcetaniyanti sañcetanasabhāvavantaṃ.
analyzed: sukha dukkha uppādikā vuttā ati tassā kamma bhāvo siddho hoti sañcetaniyanti sañcetana sabhāvavantam

original: Samiddhittherena “sañcetaniyaṃ, āvuso…pe… manasā sukhaṃ so vedayatī”ti avibhajitvā
analyzed: manasā sukham saḥ vedayati iti a vibhajitvā

original: byākato. Sukhavedanīyantiādinā pana vibhajitvā byākātabbo so pañho, tasmā sammā byākato
analyzed: byākataḥ sukha vedanīya nti ādinā pana vibhajitvā byākātabbo so pañho tasmā sammā byākato

original: nāma na hoti. Itaradvayepi eseva nayo. Yathā pana suttāni ṭhitāni, tathā copanakiriyānissayabhūtā
analyzed: nāma na hoti itara dvaye pi esā iva nayaḥ yathā pana suttāni ṭhitāni tathā copana kiriyā nissaya bhūtā

original: kāyavācā abhijjhādikiriyānissayo ca manodvārāni, yāya pana cetanāya tehi kāyādīhi
analyzed: kāya vācā abhijjhā ādi kiriyā nissayo ca manaḥ dvārāni yāya pana cetanāya tehi kāya ādīhi

original: karaṇabhūtehi copanābhijjhādikiriyaṃ karonti vāsiādīhi viya chedanādiṃ, sā cetanā
analyzed: karaṇa bhūtehi copana abhijjhā ādi kiriyam karonti vāsi ādīhi chedana ādim sā cetanā

original: kammanti dvārappavattiyampi kammadvārābhedanañca kammadvāravavatthānañca dissati,
analyzed: kammanti dvāra ppavattiyam pi kamma dvāra abhedanam ca kamma dvāra vavatthānañca dissati

original: evañca sati “kāyena ce kataṃ kamma”ntiādigāthāyo ativiya yujjanti.
analyzed: evam ca sati kāyena ce katam yujjanti

original: Lokuttaramaggo idha lokiyakammakathāyaṃ anadhippetopi bhajāpiyamāno tīṇi kammāni
analyzed: lokuttara maggo idha lokiya kamma kathā ayam anadhippetaḥ api tīṇi kammāni

original: bhajati. Manena dussīlyanti kāyikavācasikavītikkamavajjaṃ sabbaṃ akusalaṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
analyzed: bhajati kāyika vācasika vītikkama vajjam sabbam akusalam saṅgaṇhāti

original: micchādiṭṭhisaṅkappavāyāmasatisamādhiṃ vā. Tampi cetaṃ “manasā saṃvaro sādhū”ti vuttassa
analyzed: micchā diṭṭhi saṅkappa vāyāma sati samādhim vā tam pi ca itam manasā saṃvaro sādhu iti vuttassa

original: saṃvarassa paṭipakkhavasena vuttaṃ, na sīlavipattivasena. Na hi sā mānasikā atthīti
analyzed: saṃvarassa paṭipakkha vasena vuttam na sīla vipatti vasena na hi sā mānasikā atthi iti

original: maggasseva bhajāpanaṃ mahāvisayattā. Bojjhaṅgā hi manokammameva bhajeyyuṃ, na ca
analyzed: maggassa iva mahā visaya ttā bojjhaṅgāḥ hi manaḥ kammam eva bhajeyyum na ca

original: na sakkā maggabhajāpaneneva tesaṃ bhajāpanaṃ viññātunti.
analyzed: na sakkā magga bhajāpanena iva tesam bhajāpanam viññātunti

original: Kammapathaṃ appattānampi taṃtaṃdvāre saṃsandanaṃ avarodhanaṃ dvārantare kammantaruppattiyampi
analyzed: kamma patham appattānam pi taṃ taṃ dvāre saṃsandanam avarodhanam dvāra antare kamma antara uppattiyam pi

original: kammadvārābhedanañca dvārasaṃsandanaṃ nāma. “Tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā akusalaṃ
analyzed: kamma dvāra abhedanam ca dvāra saṃsandanam nāma tividhā bhikkhave kāya sañcetanā akusalam

original: kāyakamma”ntiādinā kammapathappattāva sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā kammanti vuttāti purimacetanā
analyzed: kāya kamma nti ādinā kamma patha ppattā ava sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanā kammanti vuttā ati purima cetanā

original: sabbā kāyakammaṃ na hotīti vuttaṃ. Āṇāpetvā…pe… alabhantassāti āṇattehi amāritabhāvaṃ
analyzed: sabbā kāya kammam na hoti iti vuttam a labhantassa ati āṇattehi a mārita bhāvam

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ, vacīduccaritaṃ nāma hoti akammapathabhāvatoti adhippāyo. “Ime sattā
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam vacīduccaritam nāma hoti a kammapatha bhāvato ti adhippāyaḥ ime sattā

original: haññantū”ti pavattabyāpādavasena cetanāpakkhikā vā bhavanti kāyakammavohāralābhā.
analyzed: haññantu uti pavatta byāpāda vasena cetanā pakkhikāḥ vā bhavanti kāya kamma vohāra lābhā

original: Abbohārikā vā manokammavohāravirahā. Sasambhārapathavīādīsu āpādayo ettha nidassanaṃ.
analyzed: abbohārikāḥ vā manaḥ kamma vohāra virahāḥ sa sambhāra pathavī ādīsu āpa ādayaḥ ettha nidassanam

original: Kulumbassāti gabbhassa, kulasseva vā. Tissopi saṅgītiyo āruḷhatāya ananujānanato
analyzed: kulumbassa ati gabbhassa kulassa iva vā tissaḥ api saṅgītiyaḥ āruḷha tāya an anujānanato

original: “tava suttassā”ti vuttaṃ. Dasavidhā iddhi paṭisambhidāmagge iddhikathāya gahetabbā.
analyzed: tava suttassa ati vuttam dasavidhā iddhi paṭisambhidā magge iddhi kathāya gahetabbā

original: Bhāvanāmayanti adhiṭṭhāniddhiṃ sandhāya vadati. Ghaṭabhedo viya parūpaghāto, udakavināso
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna iddhim sandhāya vadati ghaṭa bhedaḥ viya udaka vināsaḥ

analyzed: viyaḥ iddhi vināso ca hoti iti upamā saṃsandati tava bhāvanā mayāya

analyzed: hoti iti vuttaḥ ñāpetum icchitaḥ atthaḥ hoti sattame pade iti

original: maṇḍalādito sattame pade.
analyzed: maṇḍala ādeḥ sattame pade

original: Vacanantarena gametabbatthaṃ neyyatthaṃ, sayameva gamitabbatthaṃ nītatthaṃ. Kiriyato

original: samuṭṭhāti, udāhu akiriyatoti tenādhippetaṃ sampajānamusāvādaṃ sandhāya pucchati,
analyzed: samuṭṭhāti udāhu tena adhippetam sampajāna musāvādam sandhāya pucchati

original: na uposathakkhandhake vuttaṃ. Tattha avuttameva hi so anariyavohāraṃ vuttanti gahetvā
analyzed: na uposatha khandhake vuttam tattha avuttam eva hi so anariya vohāram vuttan ti gahetvā

original: voharatīti. Vācāgiranti vācāsaṅkhātaṃ giraṃ, vācānuccāraṇaṃ vā.

original: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Natthikadiṭṭhādayo eva hi kammapathappattā kammanti. Cetanā
analyzed: vuttanti daṭṭhabbam natthika diṭṭha ādayaḥ eva hi kamma patha ppattā kammanti cetanā

analyzed: pana ittha abbohārikā ati kāya dvāre vacī dvāre ca samuṭṭhitā api kāya kammam vacī kammanti

original: ca vohāraṃ na labhati abhijjhādippadhānattā. “Tividhā, bhikkhave, manosañcetanā akusalaṃ
analyzed: ca vohāram na labhati abhijjhā ādi ppadhāna ttā tividhā bhikkhave manaḥ sañcetanā akusalam

original: manokamma”nti pana vacanato sabhāveneva sā manokammaṃ, na abhijjhādipakkhikattāti
