original: cintanakāle cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi manodvāre eva samuṭṭhahanti, tasmā
analyzed: cintana kāle cetanā api cetanā sampayutta dhammā api manaḥ dvāre eva samuṭṭhahanti tasmā

original: cetanāya abbohārikabhāvo kathañci natthīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: cetanāya abbohārika bhāvo kathañci natthi iti adhippāyaḥ

original: “Tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā kusalaṃ kāyakamma”ntiādivacanato pāṇātipātādipaṭipakkhabhūtā
analyzed: tividhā bhikkhave kāya sañcetanā kusalam kāya kamman ti ādi vacanato pāṇātipāta ādi paṭipakkha bhūtā

original: tabbirativisiṭṭhā cetanāva pāṇātipātaviratiādikā hontīti “cetanāpakkhikā vā”ti vuttaṃ,
analyzed: tad virati visiṭṭhā cetanā ava pāṇātipāta virati ādikāḥ honti iti cetanā pakkhikāḥ vā ti vuttam

original: na “viratipakkhikā”ti. Rakkhatīti avināsetvā katheti. Bhindatīti vināsetvā katheti.
analyzed: na virati pakkhikā ati rakkhati iti a vināsetvā kathā iti bhindati iti vināsetvā kathā iti

original: Kammakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kamma kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Cakkhuviññāṇadvāranti cakkhuviññāṇassa dvāraṃ. Cakkhu ca taṃ viññāṇadvārañcāti vā
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa dvāran ti cakkhu viññāṇassa dvāram cakkhu ca tam viññāṇa dvāram ca ati vā

original: cakkhuviññāṇadvāraṃ. Cakkhu viññāṇadvāranti vā asamāsaniddeso. Taṃ pana cakkhumeva.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa dvāram cakkhu viññāṇa dvāram ti vā asamāsa niddeso tam pana cakkhum eva

original: Esa nayo sesesupi. “Cakkhunā saṃvaro sādhū”tiādikāya gāthāya pasādakāyacopanakāyasaṃvare
analyzed: esa nayo sesesu pi cakkhunā saṃvaro sādhu uti ādikāya gāthāya

original: ekajjhaṃ katvā kāyena saṃvaro vutto, taṃ idha bhinditvā aṭṭha saṃvarā, tappaṭipakkhabhāvena

original: asaṃvarā aṭṭha kathitā. Sīlasaṃvarādayopi pañceva saṃvarā sabbadvāresu uppajjamānāpi,
analyzed: asaṃvarā aṭṭha kathitā sīla saṃvara ādayaḥ pi pañcā iva saṃvarā sabba dvāresu uppajjamānā api

original: tappaṭipakkhabhāvena dussīlyādīni asaṃvarāti vuttāni. Tattha dussīlyaṃ pāṇātipātādicetanā.
analyzed: tad paṭipakkha bhāvena dussīlya ādīni vuttāni tattha dussīlyam pāṇātipāta ādi cetanā

original: Muṭṭhassaccaṃ satipaṭipakkhā akusalā dhammā. Pamādanti keci. Sītādīsu paṭigho akkhanti.
analyzed: muṭṭhassaccam sati paṭipakkhāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ pamādanti keci sītā ādīsu paṭighaḥ

original: Thinamiddhaṃ kosajjaṃ.
analyzed: thinam iddham kosajjam

original: Vinā vacīdvārena suddhaṃ kāyadvārasaṅkhātanti idaṃ vacīdvārasallakkhitassa musāvādādinopi
analyzed: vinā vacī dvārena suddham kāya dvāra saṅkhātanti idam vacī dvāra sallakkhitassa musāvāda ādinaḥ api

original: kāyadvāre pavattisabbhāvā asuddhatā atthīti taṃnivāraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Na hi taṃ kāyakammaṃ
analyzed: kāya dvāre pavatti sabbhāvā asuddha tā atthi iti tad nivāraṇa attham vuttam na hi tam kāya kammam

original: hoti. Suddhavacīdvāropalakkhitaṃ pana vacīkammameva hotīti. Ettha asaṃvaroti etena
analyzed: hoti suddhavacī dvāra upalakkhitam pana vacī kammam eva hoti iti ettha etena

original: suddhakāyadvārena upalakkhito asaṃvaro dvārantare uppajjamānopi vutto. Dvārantarānupalakkhitaṃ
analyzed: suddha kāya dvārena upalakkhitaḥ asaṃvaraḥ dvāra antare uppajjamānaḥ api vuttaḥ dvāra antara anupalakkhitam

original: sabbaṃ taṃdvārikākusalañceti veditabbaṃ. Evañca katvā kammapathasaṃsandane “copanakāyaasaṃvaradvāravasena
analyzed: sabbam tat dvārikā kusalam ca iti veditabbam evam ca katvā kamma patha saṃsandane copana kāya asaṃvara dvāra vasena

original: uppajjamāno asaṃvaro akusalaṃ kāyakammameva hotī”tiādi “akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ copanakāyaasaṃvaradvāravasena
analyzed: uppajjamānaḥ asaṃvaraḥ akusalam kāya kammam eva hoti itiādi akusalam kāya kammam copana kāya asaṃvara dvāra vasena

original: vacīasaṃvaravasena ca uppajjatī”tiādinā saha aviruddhaṃ hoti. Asaṃvaro hi dvārantare
analyzed: vacī asaṃvara vasena ca uppajjati iti ādinā saha aviruddham hoti asaṃvaraḥ hi dvāra antare

original: uppajjamānopi sadvāre evāti vuccati, sadvāravasena uppannoti ca, kammaṃ aññadvāre
analyzed: uppajjamānaḥ api sa dvāre eva ati vuccati sa dvāra vasena uppannaḥ ti ca kammam añña dvāre

original: aññadvāravasena cāti evaṃ aviruddhaṃ.
analyzed: añña dvāra vasena ca ati evam aviruddham

original: Atha vā etthāti suddhaṃ asuddhanti etaṃ avicāretvā etasmiṃ copaneti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: atha vā ettha ati suddham a suddham ti etam a vicāretvā etasmin copanā iti vuttam hoti

original: Evaṃ sati dvārantaropalakkhitaṃ kammapathabhāvappattatāya vacīmanokammaṃ copanakāyaasaṃvaradvāre
analyzed: evam sati dvāra antara upalakkhitam kammapatha bhāva ppatta tāya vacī manaḥ kammam copana kāya asaṃvara dvāre

original: uppannaṃ, sesaṃ sabbaṃ taṃdvāruppannākusalaṃ viya “copanakāyaasaṃvaro”ti vuccati.

original: hotīti atthasiddhito. Kammaṃ pana hontaṃ kiṃ kammaṃ hotīti? Manokammameva hotīti.

original: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – copanappattaṃ akusalaṃ kāyadvāre vacīdvāre ca manokammaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: idam vuttam hoti copana pattam akusalam kāya dvāre vacī dvāre ca manaḥ kammam hoti iti

original: Atha vā taṃ-saddassa manokammena sambandhaṃ akatvā chaphassadvāravasena yaṃ uppajjati,
analyzed: atha vā taṃ saddassa manaḥ kammena sambandham a katvā cha phassa dvāra vasena yam uppajjati

original: tanti yathāvuttauppādamattaparicchinnena sambandho kātabbo. Kiṃ pana tanti? Kammakathāya
analyzed: tanti yathā vutta auppāda matta paricchinnena sambandhaḥ kātabbo kim pana tanti kamma kathāya

original: pavattamānattā kammanti viññāyati, tañca manosamphassadvāre uppajjamānampi tividhaṃ
analyzed: pavattamāna ttā kammanti viññāyati tat ca manaḥ samphassa dvāre uppajjamānam pi tividham

original: kammaṃ hotīti. Yathā taṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “kāyavacīdvāresu copanaṃ patta”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: kammam hoti iti yathā tam hoti tam dassetum kāya vacī dvāresu copanam patta nti ādim āha

original: Tattha niyamassa akatattā copanappatti upalakkhaṇabhāvena kāyavacīkammanāmasādhikāva,
analyzed: tattha niyamassa a kata ttā ca upana ppatti upalakkhaṇa bhāvena kāya vacī kamma nāma sādhikā ava

original: na pana sabbampi copanappattaṃ kāyavacīkammameva, nāpi kusalapakkhe copanaṃ appattaṃ
analyzed: na pana sabbam pi copana pattam kāya vacī kammam eva nā api kusala pakkhe copanam appattam

original: kāyavacīkammaṃ na hotīti ayamattho siddhova hotīti.
analyzed: kāya vacī kammam na hoti iti ayam attho siddho va hoti iti

original: Atha vā tanti taṃ chaphassadvāravasena uppajjamānaṃ manokammanti sabbaṃ manasāpi
analyzed: atha vā tat ti tam cha phassa dvāra vasena uppajjamānam mano kammanti sabbam manasā api

original: nipphajjamānaṃ kammaṃ manokammanti codakādhippāyena gahetvā vadati, na pubbe dassitamanokammanti.
analyzed: nipphajjamānam kammam manaḥ kammanti ca udaka adhippāyena gahetvā vadati na pubbe dassita manaḥ kammanti

original: Yo hi parassa adhippāyo “manasā nipphattito sabbena manokammeneva bhavitabbaṃ, na
analyzed: yaḥ hi parassa adhippāyaḥ manasā nipphattitaḥ sabbena manaḥ kammena iva bhavitabbam na

original: kāyavacīkammenā”ti, taṃ nivattetvā kammattayaniyamaṃ dassetuṃ idamāraddhaṃ “taṃ kāyavacīdvāresu
analyzed: kāya vacī kammena ati tam nivattetvā kamma ttaya niyamam dassetum idam āraddham tam kāya vacī dvāresu

original: copanaṃ patta”ntiādi. Ettha ca saṅkarābhāvo purimanayeneva veditabbo. Atha vā kammanti
analyzed: copanam patta ntiādi ettha ca saṅkara abhāvaḥ purima nayena iva veditabbaḥ atha vā

original: avisesena kammasaddamattena sambandhaṃ katvā yathāvutto kammappabhedo yathā hoti,
analyzed: avisesena kamma sadda mattena sambandham katvā yathāvuttaḥ kamma ppabhedaḥ yathā hoti

original: taṃ pakāraṃ dasseti. Asaṅkaro ca vuttanayova. Yaṃ pana vadanti “kāyavacīkammasahajātā
analyzed: tam pakāram dasseti asaṅkaro ca vutta nayaḥ uva yam pana vadanti kāya vacī kamma sahajātā

original: abhijjhādayo yadā cetanāpakkhikā honti, tadā tāni manokammāni kāyavacīkammāni hontī”ti,
analyzed: abhijjhā ādayaḥ yadā cetanā pakkhikāḥ honti tadā tāni manaḥ kammāni kāya vacī kammāni honti iti

original: tañca na, cetanāpakkhikānaṃ manokammattābhāvā. Abbohārikatte ca manokammatā suṭṭhutaraṃ
analyzed: tat ca na cetanā pakkhikānam manaḥ kamma tta abhāvā abbohārika tte ca manaḥ kamma tā suṭṭhutaram

original: natthi. Vuttampi cetaṃ “abbohārikā vā”ti. Tasmā manokammassa kāyavacīkammatā na vattabbā.
analyzed: natthi vuttam pi ca itam abbohārikā vāti tasmā manaḥ kammassa kāya vacī kamma tā na vattabbā

original: Abhijjhādikiriyākārikāya eva cetanāya sampayuttā abhijjhādayo manokammaṃ, na pāṇātipātādikāyavacīkiriyākārikāyāti
analyzed: abhijjhā ādi kiriyā kārikāya eva cetanāya sampayuttāḥ abhijjhā ādayaḥ manaḥ kammam na pāṇa atipāta ādi kāya vacī kiriyā kārikāya ati

original: bhiyyopi tesaṃ manokammatāti na tesaṃ manokammānaṃ sataṃ kāyavacīkammatā vattabbāti.
analyzed: bhiyyaḥ api tesam manaḥ kamma tā ati na tesam manaḥ kammānam satam kāya vacī kamma tā vattabbā ti

original: Evaṃ kammānaṃ dvāresu dvārānañca kammesu aniyatattā dvāranibandhanaṃ na kataṃ. Idāni
analyzed: evam dvāresu kammesu aniyata ttā dvāra nibandhanam na katam idāni

original: akatepi ca dvāranibandhane yesaṃ dvārānaṃ vasena idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, tesaṃ taṃtaṃdvārakammapathānañca

original: vasena uppattiyā yathābhaṭṭhapāḷiyā vuttāya ca dīpanatthaṃ “tattha kāmāvacara”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: vasena uppattiyāḥ yathā bhaṭṭha pāḷiyā vuttāya ca dīpana attham tattha kāmāvacaranti ādim āha

original: Cittaṃ tividhakammadvāravasena uppajjatīti idaṃ manokammadvārabhūtassa tena sabhāvena
analyzed: cittam tividha kamma dvāra vasena uppajjati iti idam manaḥ kamma dvāra bhūtassa tena sabhāvena

original: uppattiṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Yathā vā cittaṃ cittādhipateyyanti sampayuttavasena vuccati,
analyzed: uppattim gahetvā vuttam yathā vā cittam citta ādhipateyyanti sampayutta vasena vuccati

original: evamidhāpīti veditabbaṃ. Copanadvayarahitassa manopabandhassa manokammadvārabhāve
analyzed: evam idha api iti veditabbam copana dvaya rahitassa manopabandhassa mano kamma dvāra bhāve

original: pana vattabbameva natthi.
analyzed: pana vattabbam eva natthi

original: Kammapathasaṃsandanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kammapatha saṃsandana kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dvārakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dvāra kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Ayaṃ yojanāti “rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā”ti etena saha “yaṃ yaṃ vā panā”ti
analyzed: ayam rūpa ārammaṇam vā āpe dhamma ārammaṇam vā ati etena saha yam yam vā panāti

original: etassa ayaṃ sambandhoti attho. Ko panāyaṃ sambandhoti? Yena vacanāni aññamaññaṃ sambajjhanti,
analyzed: etassa ayam sambandho ti atthaḥ kaḥ pana ayam sambandhaḥ ti yena vacanāni aññamaññam sambajjhanti

original: taṃ pubbāparavacane payojanaṃ sambandho. Idha ca sabbārammaṇatādidassanaṃ “rūpārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tam pubba apara vacane payojanam sambandhaḥ idha ca sabba ārammaṇa tā ādi dassanam rūpa ārammaṇam

original: vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā”ti etassa anantaraṃ “yaṃ yaṃ vā panā”ti etassa vacane payojanaṃ
analyzed: vāpe dhamma ārammaṇam vāti etassa anantaram yam yam vā panāti etassa vacane payojanam

original: yojanā daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha “rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā ārabbhā”ti ettakena
analyzed: yojanā daṭṭhabbam tattha rūpa ārammaṇam vā āpe dhamma ārammaṇam vā ārabbhāti ettakena

original: āpannaṃ dosaṃ dassetvā tannivattanavasena “yaṃ yaṃ vā panā”ti etassa payojanaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: āpannam dosam dassetvā tad nivattana vasena yam yam vā panāti etassa payojanam dassetum

original: “heṭṭhā”tiādimāha. Dutiye atthavikappe “yaṃ yaṃ vāpanā”ti etena appadhānampi rūpādiṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhā ti ādim āha dutiye attha vikappe yam yam etena appadhānam pi rūpa ādim

original: ākaḍḍhati. Na hi padhānassa cittassa attanoyeva ārammaṇabhāvo atthīti. Heṭṭhā vuttanayenāti
analyzed: ākaḍḍhati na hi padhānassa cittassa attano yeva ārammaṇa bhāvaḥ atthi iti heṭṭhā vutta nayena ati

original: sabbārammaṇatādinayena. “Heṭṭhā gahitameva gahitanti vatvā tassa vacane payojanaṃ
analyzed: sabba ārammaṇa tā ādi nayena heṭṭhā gahitam eva gahitanti vatvā tassa vacane payojanam

original: dassetuṃ ‘rūpaṃ vā…pe… idaṃ vā idaṃ vā ārabbhā’ti kathetuṃ idaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum rūpam vāpe idam vā idam vā ārabbha ati kathetum idam vuttanti vuttam

original: Tattha idaṃ vā idaṃ vāti etaṃ sabbārammaṇatādiṃ sandhāya kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: tattha idam vā idam vā iti etam sabba ārammaṇa tā ādim sandhāya kathitam ti veditabbam

original: Dhammuddesavārakathā
analyzed: dhamma uddesa vāra kathā

original: Phassapañcamakarāsivaṇṇanā
Ācariyānanti revatācariyassa. Na panetaṃ sārato daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi phassādīnaṃ kāmāvacarādibhāvadassanatthaṃ idamāraddhaṃ, kintu tasmiṃ samaye phassādisabhāvadassanatthanti.
analyzed: ācariyānam ti revata ācariyassa na pana etat sārataḥ daṭṭhabbam na hi phassa ādīnam kāmāvacara ādi bhāva dassana attham idam āraddham kintu tasmin samaye phassa ādi sabhāva dassana attham ti

original: Cittassa paṭhamābhinipātattāti sabbe cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyābhāvena vuccantīti
analyzed: cittassa paṭhama abhinipāta ttā ati sabbe cetasikā citta āyattā citta kiriyā bhāvena vuccanti iti

original: phasso “cittassa paṭhamābhinipāto”ti vutto. Kāmaṃ uppannaphasso puggalo cittacetasikarāsi
analyzed: phasso cittassa paṭhama abhinipāto ti vutto kāmam uppanna phassaḥ puggalo

original: vā ārammaṇena phuṭṭho phassasahajātāya vedanāya taṃsamakālameva vedeti, phasso pana
analyzed: vā ārammaṇena phuṭṭhaḥ phassa sahajātāya vedanāya tad sama kālam eva vedeti phassaḥ pana

original: obhāsassa padīpo viya vedanādīnaṃ paccayaviseso hotīti purimakālo viya vutto. Gopānasīnaṃ
analyzed: obhāsassa padīpaḥ viya vedanā ādīnam paccaya viseso hoti iti purima kālaḥ viya vuttaḥ gopānasīnam

original: upari tiriyaṃ ṭhapitakaṭṭhaṃ pakkhapāso. Kaṭṭhadvayādi viya ekadesena ekapassena
analyzed: upari tiriyam ṭhapita kaṭṭham pakkhapāsaḥ kaṭṭha dvaya ādi viya eka desena eka passena

original: anallīyamānopi rūpena saha phassassa sāmaññaṃ anallīyamānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanameva, na visayabhāvo,
analyzed: an allīyamānaḥ api rūpena saha phassassa sāmaññam an allīyamānam saṅghaṭṭanam eva na visaya bhāvaḥ

original: saṅghaṭṭanañca phassassa cittārammaṇānaṃ sannipatanabhāvo eva. Vatthārammaṇasannipātena

analyzed: sampajjati iti saṅghaṭṭana sampattiko phassaḥ pāṇi dvayassa sannipātaḥ viya citta ārammaṇa sannipāto

analyzed: phassaḥ cittassa ārammaṇe sannipatita ppavattiyā paccayaḥ hoti iti kicca ṭṭhena iva rasena

original: saṅghaṭṭanaraso. Tathā paccayabhāvo hi tassa phassassa saṅghaṭṭanakiccanti. Yathā
analyzed: saṅghaṭṭana rasaḥ tathā paccaya bhāvaḥ hi tassa phassassa saṅghaṭṭana kiccanti yathā

original: hi pāṇiyā pāṇimhi saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammā, evaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe
analyzed: hi pāṇiyā pāṇimhi saṅghaṭṭanam tad visesa bhūtāḥ rūpa dhammāḥ evam cittassa ārammaṇe

original: saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūto eko cetasikadhammo daṭṭhabbo. Citteyevāti etena cetasikasabhāvataṃ
analyzed: saṅghaṭṭanam tad bisesa bhūtaḥ ekaḥ cetasika dhammo daṭṭhabbo citte iva iva ati etena cetasika sabhāva tat

original: Indriyassa tadabhimukhabhāvo āvajjanāya ca ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ visayassa parikkhatatā
analyzed: indriyassa tad abhimukha bhāvaḥ āvajjanāya ca ārammaṇa karaṇam visayassa parikkhata tā

analyzed: abhisaṅkhata tā viññāṇassa visaya bhāva karaṇanti attho

original: Sukhavedanāyameva labbhati assādabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Vissavitāyāti arahatāya. Anekatthattā

original: hi dhātūnaṃ arahattho vipubbo susaddo. Vissavaṃ vā sajanaṃ vasitā kāmakāritā vissavitā.
analyzed: hi dhātūnam arahatthaḥ vipubbaḥ su saddaḥ vissavam vā sajanam vasitā kāma kāritā vissavitā

original: Ārammaṇarasekadesameva anubhavantīti idaṃ phusanādikiccaṃ ekadesānubhavanamiva hotīti
analyzed: ārammaṇa rasa ekadesam eva anubhavanti iti idam phusana ādi kiccam eka desa anubhavanam iva hoti iti

original: katvā vuttaṃ. Vedayitasabhāvo eva hi anubhavananti. Phusanādibhāvena vā ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ

original: ekadesānubhavanaṃ, vedayitabhāvena gahaṇaṃ yathākāmaṃ sabbānubhavanaṃ. Evaṃ sabhāvāneva

original: tāni gahaṇānīti na vedanāya viya phassādīnampi yathāsakakiccakaraṇena sāmibhāvānubhavanaṃ

original: Nimittena punasañjānanakiccā paccābhiññāṇarasā. Punasañjānanassa paccayo punasañjānanapaccayo,

analyzed: nimitta kārikāya nimittena sañjānantiyā ca sabbāya saññāya samānam veditabbam ñāṇam eva

analyzed: anuvattati tasmai abhinivesa kārikā viparīta ggāhikā ca na hoti iti adhippāyaḥ etena upāyena

original: samādhisampayuttāya aciraṭṭhānatā ca na hotīti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: samādhi sampayuttāya acira ṭṭhāna tā ca na hoti iti daṭṭhabbā

original: Abhisandahatīti pabandhati pavatteti. Cetanābhāvo byāpārabhāvo. Diguṇussāhāti na
analyzed: abhisandahati iti pabandhati pavattā iti cetanā bhāvaḥ byāpāra bhāvaḥ na

original: diguṇaṃ vīriyayogaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, attano eva pana byāpārakiccassa mahantabhāvaṃ
analyzed: diguṇam vīriya yogam sandhāya vuttam attanaḥ eva pana byāpāra kiccassa mahanta bhāvam

original: dīpeti. Ussāhanabhāvenāti ādarabhāvena. Sā hi sayaṃ ādarabhūtā sampayutte ādarayatīti.
analyzed: dīpa iti ussāhana bhāvena ati ādara bhāvena sā hi sayam ādara bhūtā sampayutte ādarayati iti

original: Vijānanaṃ ārammaṇassa upaladdhi. Sandahanaṃ cittantarassa anuppabandhanaṃ. Cakkhunā
analyzed: vijānanaṃ ārammaṇassa upaladdhi sandahanaṃ cittantarassa anuppabandhanaṃ cakkhunā

original: hi diṭṭhanti cakkhunā daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā “diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññāta”nti daṭṭhabbādi
analyzed: hi diṭṭhanti cakkhunā daṭṭhabbam yathā diṭṭham sutam mutam viññātam ti daṭṭhabba ādi

original: vuccati, evamidhāpi veditabbaṃ. Cakkhunā hītiādīsu cakkhunā…pe… manasā dvārenāti
analyzed: vuccati evam idha api veditabbam cakkhunā hi iti ādīsu manasā dvārena ati

original: attho. Nagaraguttikassa viya cittassa ārammaṇavibhāvanamattaṃ upadhāraṇamattaṃ upaladdhimattaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ nagara guttikassa viya cittassa ārammaṇa vibhāvana mattam upadhāraṇa mattam upaladdhi mattam

original: kiccaṃ, ārammaṇapaṭivedhanapaccābhiññāṇādi pana kiccaṃ paññāsaññādīnanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: kiccam ārammaṇa paṭivedhana pacca abhiññāṇa ādi pana kiccam paññāsaññā ādīnam ti veditabbam

original: Purimaniddiṭṭhanti samayavavatthāne niddiṭṭhaṃ. Bhāvento viya na na uppajjati, kintu
analyzed: purima niddiṭṭhanti samaya vavatthāne niddiṭṭham bhāventaḥ viya na na uppajjati kintu

original: uppajjatīti dassetuṃ “cittaṃ hotī”ti vuttanti etaṃ hoti-saddassa uppajjati-saddassa
analyzed: uppajjati iti dassetum cittam hoti iti vuttan ti etam hoti saddassa uppajjati saddassa

original: ca samānatthatte sati yujjeyya, tadatthatte ca tattha uppannaṃ hotīti na vucceyya.
analyzed: ca samāna atthatte sati yujjeyya tad atthatte ca tattha uppannam hoti iti na vucceyya

original: Na hi yuttaṃ uppannaṃ uppajjatīti vattuṃ. Cittassa ca uppannatā samayavavatthāne
analyzed: na hi yuttam uppannam uppajjati iti vattum cittassa ca uppanna tā samaya vavatthāne

original: vuttā evāti kiṃ tassa puna uppattidassanena. Yena ca samayavavatthānaṃ kataṃ, tassa
analyzed: vuttāḥ evā ti kim tassa puna uppatti dassanena yena ca samaya vavatthānam katam tassa

original: niddeso na na sakkā kātunti kiṃ taṃ niddesatthaṃ uddesena dutiyena, niddeseneva ca
analyzed: niddesaḥ na na sakkā kātun ti kim tam niddesa attham uddesena dutiyena niddesena iva ca

original: phassādīhi ca aññattaṃ cittassa sijjhatīti kiṃ tadatthena puna vacanena, aññappayojanattā
analyzed: phassa ādīhi ca aññattam cittassa sijjhati iti kim tad atthena puna vacanena añña ppayojana ttā

original: pana purimassa cittavacanassa pacchimaṃ vuttaṃ. Purimañhi samayavavatthānatthameva
analyzed: pana purimassa citta vacanassa pacchimam vuttam purimam hi samaya vavatthāna attham eva

original: vuttaṃ, na vavatthitasamaye vijjamānadhammadassanatthaṃ, itarañca tasmiṃ samaye vijjamānadhammadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: vuttam na vavatthita samaye vijjamāna dhamma dassana ttham itarañca tasmin samaye vijjamāna dhamma dassana ttham

original: vuttaṃ, na samayavavatthānatthaṃ, na ca aññadatthaṃ vacanaṃ aññadatthaṃ vadati, na
analyzed: vuttam na samaya vavatthāna attham na ca aññadattham vacanam aññadattham vadati na

original: ca lesena vuttoti katvā mahākāruṇiko atthaṃ pākaṭaṃ na karotīti.
analyzed: ca lesena vuttaḥ ti katvā mahā kāruṇiko attham pākaṭam na karoti iti

original: Phassapañcamakarāsivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Jhānaṅgarāsivaṇṇanā
Vitakketīti dhammato aññassa kattunivattanatthaṃ dhammameva kattāraṃ niddisati. Tassa
analyzed: vitakketi iti dhammataḥ aññassa kattu nivattana attham dhammam eva kattāram niddisati tassa

original: pana vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ “vitakkanaṃ vā”ti bhāvaniddeso. Rūpaṃ rūpanti pathavī
analyzed: pana vasa vatti bhāva nivāraṇa attham vitakkanam vāti bhāva niddesaḥ rūpam pathavī

original: pathavīti vā ākoṭento viya hotīti ākoṭanalakkhaṇo. Ādito, abhimukhaṃ vā hananaṃ āhananaṃ,
analyzed: pathavī iti vā ākoṭentaḥ viya hoti iti ākoṭana lakkhaṇaḥ āditas abhimukham vā hananam āhananam

original: parito, parivattetvā vā āhananaṃ pariyāhananaṃ. Vicārato oḷārikaṭṭhena vicārasseva
analyzed: paritas vā āhananam pariyāhananam vicārataḥ oḷārika ṭṭhena vicārassa iva

original: pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena anuravato oḷāriko tassa ca pubbaṅgamo ghaṇṭābhighāto viya hoti vitakko.
analyzed: pubbaṅgama ṭṭhena anuravataḥ oḷārikaḥ tassa ca pubbaṅgamaḥ ghaṇṭā abhighātaḥ viya hoti vitakko

original: So yathā ghaṇṭābhighāto paṭhamābhinipāto hoti, evaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaniropanaṭṭhena
analyzed: saḥ yathā ghaṇṭā abhighāto paṭhama abhinipātaḥ hoti evam ārammaṇa abhimukha niropana ṭṭhena

original: paṭhamābhinipāto hoti. Vipphāravāti vicalanayutto. Anuppabandhena pavattiyanti upacāre
analyzed: paṭhama abhinipātaḥ hoti vipphāra vāti vicalana yuttaḥ an uppabandhena upacāre

original: vā appanāyaṃ vā santānena pavattiyaṃ. Tattha hi vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā
analyzed: vā appanāyam vā santānena pavattiyam tattha hi vitakkaḥ niccalaḥ hutvā ārammaṇam anupavisitvā

original: pavattati. Maṇḍalanti khalamaṇḍalaṃ.
analyzed: pavattati khala maṇḍalam

original: Piṇayatīti tappeti, vaḍḍheti vā. Pharaṇarasāti paṇītarūpehi kāyassa byāpanarasā.
analyzed: piṇayati iti vaḍḍheti vā pharaṇa rasā ati paṇīta rūpehi kāyassa byāpana rasā

original: Udaggabhāvo odagyaṃ. Khuddikā lahuṃ lomahaṃsanamattaṃ katvā bhinnā na puna uppajjati.
analyzed: udagga bhāvaḥ odagyam khuddikā lahum loma haṃsana mattam katvā bhinnā na punar uppajjati

original: Khaṇikā bahulaṃ uppajjati. Ubbegato pharaṇā niccalattā ciraṭṭhitikattā ca paṇītatarā.
analyzed: khaṇikā bahulam uppajjati ubbegataḥ pharaṇā niccala ttā ciraṭṭhitika ttā ca paṇītatarā

original: Passaddhiyā nimittabhāvena gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī. Appanāsampayuttāva pīti appanāsamādhipūrikāti
analyzed: passaddhiyāḥ nimitta bhāvena gabbham gaṇhantī appanā sampayuttā ava pi iti appanā samādhi pūrikā ti

original: katvā sā ṭhapitā. Itarā dve khaṇikopacārasamādhipūrikā pītī.
analyzed: katvā sā itarā dve khaṇikā upacāra samādhi pūrikā pītī

original: Samādhicittenāti samādhisahitacittena. Avisāro attano eva avisaraṇasabhāvo. Avikkhepo
analyzed: samādhi cittena ati samādhi sahita cittena avisāraḥ attanaḥ eva a visaraṇa sabhāvaḥ avikkhepaḥ

original: sampayuttānaṃ avikkhittatā. Yena sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so dhammo avikkhepoti.
analyzed: sampayuttānam a vikkhitta tā yena sampayuttāḥ a vikkhittāḥ honti so dhammo a vikkhepaḥ ti

original: Visesatoti yebhuyyena. Sukhavirahitopi hi atthi samādhīti. Padīpanidassanena santānaṭṭhitibhāvaṃ samādhissa dasseti.
analyzed: visesato ti yebhuyyena sukha virahitaḥ api hi atthi samādhi iti padīpa nidassanena santāna ṭṭhiti bhāvam samādhissa dasseti

original: Jhānaṅgarāsivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Indriyarāsivaṇṇanā
Saddahanti etāyāti saddahanakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena
analyzed: saddahanti etāya ati saddahana kiriyāya pavattamānānam dhammānam tattha ādhipacca bhāvena

original: saddhāya paccayataṃ dasseti. Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathāpaccayabhāve sati “puggalo saddahatī”ti
analyzed: saddhāya paccaya tam dasseti tassāḥ hi dhammānam tathā paccaya bhāve sati puggalaḥ saddahati iti

original: vohāro hoti. Pasādanīyaṭṭhānesu pasādassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ akusalaṃ assaddhiyaṃ micchādhimokkho
analyzed: vohāraḥ hoti pasādanīya ṭṭhānesu pasādassa paṭipakkha bhūtam akusalam assaddhiyam micchādhimokkho

original: ca. Pasādabhūto nicchayo vatthugato adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ, na yevāpanakādhimokkhoti.
analyzed: ca pasāda bhūtaḥ nicchayaḥ vatthu gataḥ adhimokkha lakkhaṇam na yevāpanaka adhimokkhā ti

original: Indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti “maṃ antarena tumhākaṃ adhimuccanaṃ natthi, mayā saddahathā”ti
analyzed: indaṭṭham kāreti iti mam antarena tumhākam adhimuccanam na atthi mayā saddahatha ati

original: viya attānaṃ anuvatteti sampayuttadhamme. Evaṃ sesesupi. Pakkhandananti saṃsīdanaṃ.
analyzed: viya attānam anuvatteti sampayutta dhamme evam sesesu pi pakkhandanam ti saṃsīdanam

original: Paṅko kaddamato ghanībhūto hoti. Paṇakaṃ picchilaṃ udakamalaṃ. Pītaṃ udakaṃ. Okappanalakkhaṇāti
analyzed: paṅko kaddamataḥ ghanībhūtaḥ hoti paṇakam picchilam udaka malam pītam udakam okappana lakkhaṇā ti

original: anupavisitvā evametanti kappanalakkhaṇā. Akalusabhāvo akālusiyaṃ, anāvilabhāvoti
analyzed: an upavisitvā evam etat ti kappana lakkhaṇā akalusa bhāvaḥ akālusiyam anāvila bhāvaḥ ti

original: attho. Buddhādivatthūni saddheyyāni. Sappurisūpasevanasaddhammasavanayonisomanasikāradhammānudhammapaṭipattiyo
analyzed: atthaḥ buddha ādi vatthūni saddheyyāni sappurisa upasevana saddhamma savana yoni so manasikāra dhamma anudhamma paṭipattiyaḥ

original: sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Kusaladhammānaṃ ādāne hattho viya, sabbasampattinipphādane vittaṃ
analyzed: sotāpattiyaṅgāni kusala dhammānaṃ ādāne hatthaḥ viya sabba sampatti nipphādane vittam

original: viya, amatakasiphalaphalane bījaṃ viya daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: viya amata kasi phala phalane bījam viya daṭṭhabbā

original: Vīrabhāvoti yena vīro nāma hoti, so dhammoti attho. Anubalappadānaṃ paggaho. Maggo
analyzed: vīra bhāvaḥ iti yena vīraḥ nāma hoti saḥ dhammaḥ ti atthaḥ anubala padānam paggahaḥ maggo

original: gantabbo hoti, maggo gato, kammaṃ kattabbaṃ, kammaṃ kataṃ, appamattako ābādho uppanno,

original: labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, labhati…pe… pāripūrinti
analyzed: labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadattham pāripūrim labhati pe pāripūrim ti

original: Cirakatādiārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṃ. Udake
analyzed: cirakata ādi ārammaṇam upagantvā ṭhānam a nissajjanam vā ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānam udake

analyzed: alābu viya ārammaṇam pilavitvā gantum appadānam pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa

original: ṭhapanaṃ sāraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ. Apilāpe karoti apilāpeti. Gatiyoti
analyzed: ṭhapanam sāraṇam a sammuṭṭha tā karaṇam apilāpanam apilāpe karoti apilāpa iti

original: nipphattiyo sambhavato phalato ca. Aparo nayoti rasādidassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. Sammosapaccanīkaṃ
analyzed: nipphattiyaḥ sambhavataḥ phalato ca aparaḥ nayo ti rasa ādi dassana attham āraddham sammosa paccanīkam

original: kiccaṃ asammoso, na sammosābhāvamattaṃ. Satiyā vatthubhūtā kāyādayo kāyādisatipaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: kiccam asammosaḥ na sammosa abhāva mattam satiyā vatthu bhūtā kāya ādayo kāya ādi sati paṭṭhānā

original: satiyoyeva vā purimā pacchimānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vā purimā pacchimānam padaṭṭhānam

original: Vikkhepassa uddhaccassa. Paññāpetīti pakārehi jānāpeti. Ekālokā hotīti vipassanupakkilesobhāsaṃ
analyzed: vikkhepassa uddhaccassa paññāpeti iti pakārehi jānāpeti eka ālokā hoti iti vipassanu pakkilesa ubhāsam

original: sandhāyāha. Manate vijānāti etenāti vā mano, evañca katvā “manañca paṭicca dhamme
analyzed: sandhāya āha manate vijānāti etena ati vā manaḥ evañca katvā manañca paṭicca dhamme

original: cā”ti kāraṇabhāvena mano vutto. Sabbo hi mano attano anantarassa viññāṇassa kāraṇanti.
analyzed: ca ati kāraṇa bhāvena manaḥ vutto sabbaḥ hi mano attanaḥ anantarassa viññāṇassa kāraṇanti

original: Vijānātīti paricchinnopaladdhivasena jānāti, na saññāpaññā viya sañjānanapaṭivijjhanavasena.
analyzed: vijānāti iti paricchinna upaladdhi vasena jānāti na saññā paññā viya sañjānana paṭivijjhana vasena

original: Pītisomanassasampayogatoti vutte yena yogā sumano hoti, taṃ somanassanti vuccatīti
analyzed: pīti somanassa sampayogato ti vutte yena yogā sumanaḥ hoti tam somanassanti vuccati iti

analyzed: pītiyā ca somanassa bhāvaḥ āpajjati tasmā vinā api kāyena vatthunā sāta vedanā sampayogato ti

analyzed: yojetabbam evam ca nippītikam somanassañca saṅgahitam hoti pīti upalakkhitam vā somanassam

original: sappītikaṃ nippītikañca somanassanti attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: sappītikam nippītikam ca somanassanti atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Pavattasantatādhipateyyanti pavattasaṅkhātāya santatiyā adhipatibhūtaṃ. Jīvitindriyassa
analyzed: pavatta santata ādhipateyyanti pavatta saṅkhātāya santatiyai adhipati bhūtam jīvitindriyassa

analyzed: hi attanaḥ vijjamāna kkhaṇe anupālentassa anantaram ca sa anupālanānam uppattiyāḥ hetu bhūtassa

analyzed: vasena pavattam cira ṭṭhitikam hoti taṃ taṃ kamma visesena visesa yuttam yāva cuti avisesena

original: vā yāva parinibbānaṃ avicchinnaṃ pavattati jīvamānatāvisesayuttañcāti rūpārūpajīvitindriyānaṃ
analyzed: vā yāva parinibbānam avicchinnam pavattati jīvamāna tā visesa yuttam ca ati

original: samānalakkhaṇādiṃ vattuṃ “attanā avinibhuttadhammāna”nti āha. Anupāletabbānaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva.
analyzed: samāna lakkhaṇa ādim vattum attanā a vinibhutta dhammānam ti āha anupāletabbānam atthi kkhaṇe iva iva

original: Asati hi anupāletabbe uppalādimhi kiṃ udakaṃ anupāleyyāti. Tassa tassāti anupālanādikassa.
analyzed: asati hi anupāletabbe uppala ādimhi kim udakam anupāleyya ati tassa tassa ati anupālana ādikassa

original: Sādhanatoti sādhanena. Taṃsādhanañca jīvamānavisesapaccayabhāvato.
analyzed: sādhanato ti sādhanena tat sādhanam ca jīvamāna visesa paccaya bhāvato

original: Indriyarāsivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: indriya rāsi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Maggaṅgarāsivaṇṇanā
Sammāti aviparītaniyyānikabhāvena. Pasatthatā ca evameva daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: sammā ti aviparīta niyyānika bhāvena pasattha tā ca evam eva daṭṭhabbā

original: Balarāsivaṇṇanā
Assaddhiyeti assaddhiyakāraṇā. Ubhayapadavasenāti saddhāpadaṃ balapadanti evamādipadadvayavasena.
analyzed: ubhaya pada vasena ati saddhā padam bala padam ti evamādi pada dvaya vasena

original: Niyakajjhattaṃ jātiādisamuṭṭhānaṃ etissāti ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā. Garunā kismiñci vutte
analyzed: niyaka ajjhattam jāti ādi samuṭṭhānam etissa ati ajjhatta samuṭṭhānā garunā kismiñci vutte

original: gāravavasena patissavanaṃ patissavo, saha patissavena sappatissavaṃ, patissavabhūtaṃ
analyzed: gārava vasena patissavanam patissavaḥ saha patissavena sa patissavam patissava bhūtam

original: taṃsabhāgañca yaṃkiñci gāravanti attho. Jātiādimahattapaccavekkhaṇena uppajjamānā
analyzed: taṃsa bhāgañca yaṃkiñci gāravanti attho jāti ādi mahatta paccavekkhaṇena uppajjamānā

original: ca hirī tattha gāravavasena pavattatīti “sappatissavalakkhaṇā”ti vuccati. Vajjaṃ
analyzed: ca hirī tattha gārava vasena pavattati iti sappatissava lakkhaṇā ti vuccati vajjam

original: bhāyati tañca bhayato passatīti vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvī. Evaṃsabhāvaṃ ottappaṃ.
analyzed: bhāyati tat ca bhayataḥ passati iti vajja bhīruka bhaya dassāvī ottappam

original: Hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṃ viya passati, ottappaṃ uṇhaṃ viya. Dāyajjaṃ navalokuttaradhammādi.
analyzed: hirī pāpa dhamme gūtham viya passati ottappam uṇham viya dāyajjam nava lokuttara dhamma ādi

original: Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca hirīottappānaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā, na pana

original: tesaṃ kadāci aññamaññaṃ vippayogā. Na hi lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: tesam kadāci aññamaññam vippayogāḥ na hi lajjanam nibbhayam pāpa bhayam vā alajjanam hoti iti

original: Mūlarāsivaṇṇanā
Agedho anabhijjhanaṃ anabhikaṅkhanaṃ. Anallīno bhāvo adhippāyo etassāti anallīnabhāvo,
analyzed: agedhaḥ an abhijjhanam an abhikaṅkhanam an allīnaḥ bhāvaḥ adhippāyaḥ etassa ati an allīna bhāvaḥ

original: evañhi upamāya sameti. Anukūlamitto anuvattako. Vinayarasoti vinayanaraso. Adoso
analyzed: evam hi upamāya sameti anukūla mittaḥ anuvattakaḥ vinaya rasaḥ ti vinayana rasaḥ adosaḥ

original: dussīlyamalassāti idaṃ dussīlyassa dosasamuṭṭhānataṃ dosūpanissayatañca sandhāya
analyzed: dussīlya malassa ati idam dussīlyassa dosa samuṭṭhāna tam dosa upanissaya tam ca sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Abhāvanāyāti “tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena bhāvanāindriyānaṃ
analyzed: vuttam abhāvanāya ti tattha jātānam dhammānam an ativattana ṭṭhena bhāvanā indriyānam

original: ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā āsevanaṭṭhena bhāvanā”ti
analyzed: ekarasa ṭṭhena bhāvanā tad upaga vīriya vāhana ṭṭhena bhāvanā āsevana ṭṭhena bhāvanā ati

original: evaṃ vuttāya paññāsādhanāya bhāvanāya appavatti, tappaṭipakkhabhūtā vā akusalā abhāvanā.
analyzed: evam vuttāya paññā sādhanāya bhāvanāya appavatti tad paṭipakkha bhūtā vā akusalā abhāvanā

original: Nigguṇepi guṇaggahaṇaṃ adhikaggahaṇaṃ. Vijjamānampi guṇaṃ viddhaṃsetvā gahaṇaṃ ūnaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: nigguṇe api guṇa ggahaṇam adhika ggahaṇam vijjamānam api guṇam gahaṇam ūna ggahaṇam

original: Catuvipallāsaggahaṇaṃ viparītaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: catu vi pallāsa ggahaṇam viparīta ggahaṇam

original: Yāthāvasabhāveti “ettako etassa guṇo, ettako doso”ti guṇadosānaṃ sabhāve “jarādhammo
analyzed: yāthāva sabhāve iti ettakaḥ etassa guṇaḥ ettakaḥ doso ti guṇa dosānam sabhāve jarā dhammo

original: jīrati, taṃ kutettha labbhā mā jīrī”ti evamādipaccavekkhaṇasambhavato. Alobhena ca
analyzed: jīrati tam kutas ittha labbhā mā jīri iti evamādi paccavekkhaṇa sambhavataḥ alobhena ca

original: gahaṭṭhānaṃ khettavatthādīsu vivādābhāvato. Amohena pabbajitānaṃ diṭṭhigatavivādābhāvato.
analyzed: gaha ṭṭhānam khetta vattha ādīsu vivāda abhāvataḥ amohena pabbajitānam diṭṭhi gata vivāda abhāvataḥ

original: Kāmarāgābhinivesavinibandhā hi gahaṭṭhā gahaṭṭhehi vivadanti, diṭṭhirāgābhinivesavinibandhā
analyzed: kāma rāga abhinivesa vinibandhāḥ hi gahaṭṭhāḥ gahaṭṭhehi vivadanti diṭṭhi rāga abhinivesa vinibandhāḥ

original: samaṇā samaṇehīti. Rāgavasena mittasanthavo dosavasena virodho ca tabbisesena upagamāpagamā,
analyzed: samaṇā samaṇehi iti rāga vasena mitta santhavaḥ dosa vasena virodhaḥ ca tad visesena upagama apagamā

original: ārammaṇe vā rūpādimhi anurodhavirodhā. Amajjhattabhāvassa paṭighānunayasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: ārammaṇe vā rūpa ādimhi anurodha virodhā am ajjhatta bhāvassa paṭigha anunaya saṅkhātassa

original: mohena pavatti. Sukhavipariṇāme dukkhasamāyoge ca paṭighapavattiyaṃ vedanāpariggaho
analyzed: mohena pavatti sukha vipariṇāme dukkha samāyoge ca paṭigha pavattiyam vedanā pariggaho

original: na sijjhatīti adosānubhāvena vedanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sijjhati. Dibbavihārassāti catunnaṃ
analyzed: na sijjhati iti adosa anubhāvena vedanā sati paṭṭhānam sijjhati dibba vihārassa ati catunnam

original: jhānānaṃ. Ariyavihāro phalasamāpatti. Mohena avicārento udāsīnapakkhesupi sattasaṅkhāresu
analyzed: ariya vihāro phala samāpatti mohena a vicārento udāsīna pakkhesu pi satta saṅkhāresu

original: sabbesu abhisaṅgaṃ karotīti amūḷhassa tadabhāvo veditabbo. Dukkhadassanassa āsannapaṭipakkhattā
analyzed: sabbesu abhisaṅgam karoti iti amūḷhassa tad abhāvaḥ veditabbaḥ dukkha dassanassa āsanna paṭipakkha ttā

original: dosassa tappaṭipakkhena adosena dukkhadassanaṃ hoti.
analyzed: dosassa tad paṭipakkhena adosena dukkha dassanam hoti

original: Kammapatharāsivaṇṇanā
Sukhādīni attano na byāpādeti na vināseti parassa cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kammapathatātaṃsabhāgatāhi kammapathavasena.
analyzed: sukha ādīni attanaḥ na byāpādeti na vināseti parassa ca ati daṭṭhabbam kamma patha tā ātaṃsa bhāga tāhi kamma patha vasena

original: Passaddhādiyugalavaṇṇanā
analyzed: passaddha ādi yugala vaṇṇanā

original: Daratho sārambho, dukkhadomanassapaccayānaṃ uddhaccādikānaṃ kilesānaṃ catunnaṃ vā
analyzed: darathaḥ sa ārambhaḥ dukkha domanassa paccayānam uddhacca ādikānam kilesānam catunnam vā

original: khandhānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Uddhaccappadhānā kilesā uddhaccādikilesā, uddhaccaṃ
analyzed: khandhānam etam adhivacanam uddhacca ppadhānāḥ kilesāḥ uddhacca ādi kilesāḥ uddhaccam

original: vā ādiṃ katvā sabbakilese saṅgaṇhāti. Suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti yathā suvaṇṇavisuddhi
analyzed: vā ādim katvā sabba kilese saṅgaṇhāti suvaṇṇa visuddhi viyāti yathā

original: alaṅkāravikativiniyogakkhamā, evaṃ ayampi hitakiriyāviniyogakkhamā.
analyzed: alaṅkāra vikati viniyoga kkhamā evam ayam pi hita kiriyā viniyoga kkhamā

original: Samaṃ, samantato vā pakārehi jānanaṃ sampajaññaṃ. Cetiyavandanādiatthaṃ abhikkamādīsu
analyzed: samam samantataḥ vā pakārehi jānanam sampajaññam cetiya vandana ādi attham abhikkama ādīsu

original: atthānatthapariggaṇhanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Sati ca atthe sappāyāsappāyarūpādipariggaṇhanaṃ
analyzed: attha anattha pariggaṇhanam sa atthaka sampajaññam sati ca atthe sappāya asappāya rūpa ādi pariggaṇhanam

original: sappāyasampajaññaṃ. Gocaragāmābhikkamanādīsu kammaṭṭhānāvijahanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ.
analyzed: sa pāya sampajaññam gocara gāma abhikkamana ādīsu kammaṭṭhāna a vijahanam gocara sampajaññam

original: Abhikkamanādīnaṃ dhātuādivasena pavicayo asammohasampajaññaṃ. Sabbakammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyuttānaṃ
analyzed: abhikkamana ādīnam dhātu ādi vasena pavicayaḥ asammoha sampajaññam sabba kammaṭṭhāna bhāvanā anuyuttānam

original: sabbayogīnaṃ sabbadā upakārakā ime dve dhammā pāripanthakaharaṇato bhāvanāvaḍḍhanato
analyzed: sabba yogīnam sabbadā upakārakāḥ ime dve dhammā pāripanthaka haraṇataḥ bhāvanā vaḍḍhanato

original: ca. Yathāha “dve dhammā bahukārā sati ca sampajaññañcā”ti. Yuge naddhā viyāti yuganaddhā,
analyzed: ca yathā āha dve dhammā bahu kārā sati ca sampajaññan ca ati yuge naddhā viyāti yuga naddhā

original: aññamaññaṃ nimittabhāvena samaṃ pavattāti attho. “Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu samathavipassanaṃ
analyzed: aññam aññam nimitta bhāvena samam pavattā ati attho puna caparam āvuso bhikkhu samatha vipassanam

original: yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti hi sutte etesaṃ yuganaddhatā vuttā. Sabbakusaladhammesu līnuddhaccābhāvo
analyzed: yuga naddham bhāveti iti hi sutte etesam yuga naddha tā vuttā sabba kusala dhammesu līn uddhacca abhāvaḥ

original: etehi dvīhi samaṃ yuttehīti “vīriyasamādhiyojanatthāyā”ti āha, yogavacanatthāyāti attho.
analyzed: etehi dvīhi samam yuttehi iti vīriya samādhi yojana tthāya ati āha yogavacana tthāya ati attho

original: Yevāpanakavaṇṇanā
analyzed: yevāpanaka vaṇṇanā

original: Rūpābhāvenāti ruppanābhāvena. Dhammāti etassa attho sabhāvato upalabbhamānāti. Mettāpubbabhāgoti
analyzed: rūpa abhāvena ati ruppana abhāvena dhammā ati etassa attho sabhāvataḥ upalabbhamānā ati mettā pubbabhāgaḥ ti

original: appanāppattāya mettāya pubbabhāgo, parikammamettā etasmiṃ citte atthīti attho. Virativasenāti
analyzed: appanā appattāya mettāya pubbabhāgaḥ parikamma mettā etasmim citte atthi iti atthaḥ virati vasena ati

original: vacīpavattiyā na pūreti, kintu viratiyogenāti attho. Apaṇṇakaṅgānīti aviraddhaṅgāni.
analyzed: vacī pavattiyā na pūreti kintu virati yogena ati attho apaṇṇaka aṅgāni iti a viraddha aṅgāni

original: Yathā tathā vā ārammaṇe vinicchayanaṃ adhimuccanaṃ. Na hi anadhimuccanto pāṇātipātādīsu
analyzed: yathā tathā vā ārammaṇe vinicchayanam adhimuccanam na hi pāṇa atipāta ādīsu

original: dānādīsu vā pavattati, saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasādādhimokkhoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
analyzed: dāna ādīsu vā pavattati saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasāda adhimokkhaḥ ti ayam etesam viseso

original: Dārakassa viya ito cito ca saṃsappanassa karissāmi na karissāmīti avinicchayassa
analyzed: dārakassa viya itas citas ca saṃsappanassa karissāmi na karissāmi iti a vinicchayassa

original: paṭipakkhakiriyā asaṃsappanaṃ. Purimamanatoti bhavaṅgato. Visadisaṃ vīthijavanaṃ
analyzed: paṭipakkha kiriyā a saṃsappanam purima manataḥ ti bhavaṅgataḥ visadisam vīthi javanam

original: manaṃ karotīti manasikārasāmaññena vīthijavanapaṭipādake dasseti. Tesu dhammesūti
analyzed: manam karoti iti manasikāra sāmaññena vīthi javana paṭipādake dasseti tesu dhammesu iti

original: cittacetasikadhammesu. Atadārammaṇattepi hi tesu samappavattesu udāsīnabhāvato tatramajjhattatāti
analyzed: citta cetasika dhammesu hi tesu sama ppavattesu udāsīna bhāvato tatram ajjhatta tā ti

original: vuccati. Alīnānuddhatappavattipaccayattā ūnādhikanivāraṇarasā. Kāyaduccaritādivatthūnanti
analyzed: vuccati alīna anuddhata ppavatti paccaya ttā ūna adhika nivāraṇa rasā

original: pāṇādīnaṃ. Amaddanā maddanapaṭipakkhabhāvova.
analyzed: pāṇa ādīnam amaddanā maddana paṭipakkha bhāvaḥ u

original: Taṃtaṃrāsikiccavasena vibhāgarahitā avibhattikā. Etthāti etesu savibhattikesu dutiyaṭṭhānādīsupi
analyzed: taṃ taṃ rāsi kicca vasena vibhāga rahitāḥ avibhattikāḥ ettha ati etesu savibhattikesu dutiya ṭṭhāna ādīsu pi

original: bhājiyamānesu apubbaṃ natthīti attho. Padaṃ pūritanti jhānādipadaṃ pañcakādivasena
analyzed: bhājiyamānesu apubbam natthi iti attho padam pūritanti jhāna ādi padam pañcaka ādi vasena

original: pūritaṃ. Pañca hi aṅgāni jhānapadassa attho, tesu ekasmiñca ūne jhānapadaṃ ūnaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: pūritam pañca hi aṅgāni jhānapadassa attho tesu ekasmin ca ūne jhānapadam ūnam hoti iti

original: Padasamūho padakoṭṭhāso vā taṃ tameva vā padaṃ, avuttaṃ hāpitaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: pada samūhaḥ pada koṭṭhāsaḥ vā tam tam eva vā padam avuttam hāpitam nāma hoti iti vuttam

original: “pūrita”nti. Vuttasmiññeva vuccamāne anekesaṃ purisasaddānaṃ viya koci sambandho
analyzed: pūritam iti vuttasmin ñeva vuccamāne anekesam purisa saddānam viya koci sambandhaḥ

original: natthīti maññamāno āha “ananusandhikā kathā”ti. Antarantarā vuttasmiññeva vuccamāne
analyzed: natthi iti maññamānaḥ āha ananusandhikā kathā iti antar antarā vuttasmin ñeva vuccamāne

original: anukkamena dhammā kathitā na hontīti āha “uppaṭipāṭiyā”ti. Phassapañcamakarāsi sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇavasena

original: catukkhandhatappaccayasaṅgahavasena ca vutto. Yathāvuttesu pana rāsīsu ekarāsikiccassapi
analyzed: catu khandha tad paccaya saṅgaha vasena ca vuttaḥ yathā vuttesu pana rāsīsu eka rāsi kiccassa api

original: abhāvā chandādayo yevāpanakavasena vuttā. Vuttānampi ca dhammānaṃ yathā vedanādīnaṃ
analyzed: abhāvā chanda ādayaḥ vuttāḥ vuttānam pi ca dhammānam yathā vedanā ādīnam

original: jhānaṅgādibhāvo vutto, na evaṃ sovacassatākalyāṇamittatādiviseso vuttoti tassa saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ
analyzed: jhāna aṅga ādi bhāvaḥ vuttaḥ na evam tassa saṅgaṇhana attham

original: keci dhamme visuṃ ṭhapetvā te ca tañca visesaṃ “ye vā panā”ti āha. Veneyyajjhāsayavasena
analyzed: keci dhamme visum ṭhapetvā te ca tat ca visesam ye vā āha

original: vā sāvasese dhamme vatvā “ye vā panā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vā sa avasese dhamme vatvā ye vā pana ati vuttam

original: Yevāpanakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: yevāpanaka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dhammuddesavārakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dhamma uddesa vāra kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Kāmāvacarakusalaṃ
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalam

original: Niddesavārakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: niddesa vāra kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 2. Phusanakavasenāti sante asantepi visaye āpāthagate cittassa sannipatanavasena
analyzed: phusanaka vasena ati sante asante pi visaye āpātha gate cittassa sannipatana vasena

original: “cittaṃ mano”tiādīsu viya kiccavisesaṃ, “mānasa”ntiādīsu viya samāne atthe saddavisesaṃ,

original: anapekkhitvā dhammamattadīpanaṃ sabhāvapadaṃ. Phusantassa hi cittassa phusanakiriyā
analyzed: an apekkhitvā dhamma matta dīpanam sabhāva padam phusantassa hi cittassa phusana kiriyā

original: phusanākāro. Samphusanāti ārammaṇasamāgamaphusanā, na paṭilābhasamphusanā. Samphusitassa
analyzed: phusana ākāraḥ samphusanā ti ārammaṇa samāgama phusanā na paṭilābha samphusanā samphusitassa

original: ārammaṇena samāgatassa cittassa bhāvo samphusitattaṃ. Yasmiṃ sati cittaṃ samphusitanti
analyzed: ārammaṇena samāgatassa cittassa bhāvaḥ samphusitattam yasmin sati cittam samphusitanti

original: Aparassa vevacanassa, aparena vā purimatthassa dīpanā aparadīpanā. “Paṇḍiccaṃ kosalla”nti
analyzed: aparassa vevacanassa aparena vā purima atthassa dīpanā apara dīpanā paṇḍiccam kosallanti

original: evamādayo paññāvisesā nānākāle labbhamānāpi ekasmiṃ citte labbhanti. Ekasmiñca visese
analyzed: evamādayo paññā visesāḥ nānā kāle labbhamānā api ekasmin citte labbhanti ekasmin ca visese

original: itarepi anugatā hontīti dassetuṃ tathā vibhatti atthato vibhatti hoti atthanānattena
analyzed: itare api anugatāḥ honti iti dassetum tathā vibhatti atthataḥ vibhatti hoti attha nānattena

original: katattā. Atha vā yathā “kodho kujjhanā kujjhitatta”nti sabhāvākārabhāvaniddesehi
analyzed: katattā atha vā yathā kodhaḥ sabhāva ākāra bhāva niddesehi

original: kodhoti evamākārova attho vutto, na evamidha, idha pana paṇḍitādibhāvākārabhinno
analyzed: kodho ti evam ākāraḥ eva attho vuttaḥ na evam idha idha pana paṇḍita ādi bhāva ākāra bhinno

original: attho vuttoti idaṃ vibhattigamanaṃ atthavasena hoti. Samphusitattanti etthāpi na
analyzed: atthaḥ vutto ti idam vibhatti gamanam attha vasena hoti ettha api na

original: “phasso”ti evamākārova attho vutto. Samphassoti evamākāro pana vuttoti atthato vibhattigamananti vuttaṃ.

original: Doso byāpādoti uddesepi nāmanānattena nānābhūto uddiṭṭho. Niddesepi teneva nānattena
analyzed: dosaḥ byāpādaḥ ti uddese pi nāma nānattena nānābhūtaḥ uddiṭṭhaḥ niddese pi tena iva nānattena

original: niddiṭṭho. Ekova khandho hotīti ekena khandhasaddena vattabbataṃ sandhāyāha. Cetanāti

original: saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ dasseti tappamukhattā. Asaddhammāti asataṃ, asanto vā dhammā, na

original: vā saddhammāti asaddhammāti asaddhammavacanīyabhāvena ekībhūtopi asaddhammo kodhagarutādivisiṭṭhena

original: vuccamānā vā asaddhammagarutā asaddhammagarutābhāvena ekībhūtāpi kodhādivisiṭṭhapaṭikkhepanānattena
analyzed: vuccamānā vā asat dhamma garutā asat dhamma garuta abhāvena ekībhūtā api kodha ādi visiṭṭha paṭikkhepa nānattena

original: nānattaṃ gatā. Paṭipakkho vā paṭikkhipīyati tena, sayaṃ vā paṭikkhipatīti paṭikkhepoti

original: vuccatīti saddhammagarutāpaṭikkhepanānattena asaddhammagarutā asaddhammā vā nānattaṃ
analyzed: vuccati iti saddhamma garutā paṭikkhepa nānattena asat dhamma garutā asat dhammāḥ vā nānattam

analyzed: gatāḥ alobho ti ādīnam phassa ādīhi nānattam lobha ādi visiṭṭhena paṭikkhepena lobha ādi paṭipakkhena

analyzed: vā veditabbam a lobha a dosa a mohānam aññamañña nānattam yathā vuttena paṭikkhepa nānattena

original: yojetabbaṃ. Padatthassa padantarena vibhāvanaṃ padatthuti. Tena hi taṃ padaṃ mahatthanti
analyzed: yojetabbam padatthassa pada antarena vibhāvanam tena hi tam padam mahattham ti

original: dīpitaṃ hoti alaṅkatañcāti. Atthavisesābhāvepi ābharaṇavasena ca ādaravasena ca puna
analyzed: dīpitam hoti alaṅkatam ca ati attha visesa abhāve pi ābharaṇa vasena ca ādara vasena ca punar

original: vacanaṃ daḷhīkammaṃ.
analyzed: vacanam daḷhīkammam

original: 3. Tajjanti tassa phalassa anucchavikaṃ. Na kevalaṃ niddisiyamānaṃ sātameva adhikataṃ,
analyzed: tajjanti tassa phalassa anucchavikam na kevalam niddisiyamānam sātam eva adhikatam

original: atha kho yathāniddiṭṭhāni ārammaṇānipīti “tehi vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassa vā jātā kāraṇabhāvena

analyzed: phassa attham pavattā ati tad jā tad samaṅgī puggalam sampayutta dhamme vā attani sādayati iti

original: sātaṃ da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Suṭṭhu khādati, khaṇati vā dukkhanti sukhaṃ.
analyzed: sātam dakārassa takāram katvā suṭṭhu khādati khaṇati vā dukkhanti sukham

original: 5. Pāsoti rāgapāso. So hi nirāvaraṇattā antalikkhacaro. Akusalampi paṇḍaranti vuttaṃ,
analyzed: pāso ti rāgapāso so hi nirāvaraṇa ttā antalikkha caraḥ akusalam pi paṇḍaran ti vuttam

original: ko pana vādo kusalanti adhippāyo. Tañhi paṇḍarato nikkhantaṃ sayañca paṇḍaranti.
analyzed: kaḥ pana vādaḥ kusalanti adhippāyo tat hi paṇḍarataḥ nikkhantam sayam ca paṇḍaranti

original: Atha vā sabbampi cittaṃ sabhāvato paṇḍarameva, āgantukopakkilesavodānehi pana sāvajjānavajjānaṃ
analyzed: atha vā sabbam pi cittam sabhāvato paṇḍaram eva āgantu kopa kilesa vodānehi pana

original: upakkiliṭṭhavisuddhataratā hontīti. Dāruppamāṇesu silādīsu khandhapaññattiyā abhāvā

analyzed: kiñci nimittam an apekkhitvā dārumhi pavattā khandha paññatti iti paṇṇattimatta ṭṭhena ati

original: vuttaṃ. Taṃ-saddena manoviññāṇadhātuyeva vucceyya niddisitabbattāti na tassā tajjatā.
analyzed: vuttam tad saddena manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā iva vucceyya niddisitabba ttā ati na tassā tajja tā

original: Tehi ārammaṇehi jātā tajjāti ca vuccamāne samphassajatā na vattabbā. Na hi so ārammaṇaṃ,
analyzed: tehi ārammaṇehi jātā tajjāti ca vuccamāne samphassa ja tā na vattabbā na hi saḥ ārammaṇam

original: nāpi visesapaccayo. “Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti viññāṇameva phassassa visesapaccayoti

original: labhati, na ca tadeva tassa kāraṇabhāvena phalabhāvena ca vuccamānaṃ suviññeyyaṃ
analyzed: labhati na ca tat eva tassa kāraṇa bhāvena phala bhāvena ca vuccamānam su viññeyyam

original: hotīti. Kiṃ vā etena, yathā bhagavatā vuttā taṃsabhāvāyeva te dhammāti na evaṃvidhesu

original: kāraṇaṃ maggitabbaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇam maggitabbam

original: 7. Evaṃ takkanavasena lokasiddhenāti adhippāyo. Evañcevañca bhavitabbanti vividhaṃ takkanaṃ kūpe viya udakassa ārammaṇassa ākaḍḍhanaṃ vitakkanaṃ.
analyzed: evam takkana vasena loka siddhena ati adhippāyaḥ evam ca ivam ca bhavitabban ti vividham takkanam kūpe viya udakassa ārammaṇassa ākaḍḍhanam vitakkanam

original: 8. Samantato caraṇaṃ vicaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: samantataḥ caraṇam vicaraṇam

original: 9. Attamanatāti ettha atta-saddena na cittaṃ vuttaṃ. Na hi cittassa mano atthīti.
analyzed: atta mana tā ati ettha atta saddena na cittam vuttam na hi cittassa manaḥ atthi iti

original: Attamanassa pana puggalassa bhāvo attamanatāti vatvā puna puggaladiṭṭhinisedhanatthaṃ
analyzed: atta manassa pana puggalassa bhāvaḥ atta mana tā ti vatvā puna puggala diṭṭhi nisedhana attham

original: “cittassā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cittassa iti vuttam

original: 11. Na balavatī, kasmā avaṭṭhiti vuttāti? Ekaggacittena pāṇavadhādikaraṇe tathā avaṭṭhānamattabhāvato.
analyzed: na balavatī kasmai avaṭṭhiti vuttā ati ekagga cittena pāṇa vadha ādi karaṇe tathā avaṭṭhāna matta bhāvato

original: Virūpaṃ, vividhaṃ vā saṃharaṇaṃ vikiraṇaṃ visāhāro, saṃharaṇaṃ vā sampiṇḍanaṃ, tadabhāvo visāhāro.
analyzed: virūpam vividham vā saṃharaṇam vikiraṇam visāhāraḥ saṃharaṇam vā sampiṇḍanam tad abhāvaḥ visāhāraḥ

original: 12. Aññasmiṃ pariyāyeti aññasmiṃ kāraṇe. Samānādhikaraṇabhāvo dvinnaṃ bahūnaṃ vā padānaṃ ekasmiṃ atthe pavatti.
analyzed: aññasmin pariyāya iti aññasmin kāraṇe samāna adhikaraṇa bhāvaḥ dvinnam bahūnam vā padānam ekasmin atthe pavatti

original: 13. Ārambhati cāti āpajjati ca. Uddhaṃ yamanaṃ uyyāmo. Dhuranti nipphādetuṃ āraddhaṃ kusalaṃ, paṭiññaṃ vā.
analyzed: ārambhati ca ati āpajjati ca uddham yamanam uyyāmaḥ dhuranti nipphādetum āraddham kusalam paṭiññam vā

original: 14. Tiṇṇanti buddhādīnaṃ. Citte ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṃ jotanañca satiyevāti tassā etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: tiṇṇam ti buddha ādīnam citte ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānam jotanam ca satiyā eva ati tassāḥ etam lakkhaṇaṃ

original: 16. Pāsāṇasakkharavālikādirahitā bhūmi saṇhāti “saṇhaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pāsāṇa sakkhara vālikā ādi rahitā bhūmi saṇhā ti saṇha aṭṭhena ati vuttam

original: 19. Ayantīti ekakammanibbattamanussādisantatiavicchedavasena pavattanti. Kusalākusalesupi
analyzed: ayanti iti eka kamma nibbatta manussa ādi santati aviccheda vasena pavattanti kusala akusalesu pi

original: hi jīvitaṃ indriyapaccayabhāvena sampayutte pavattayamānameva tadavicchedassa paccayo hoti.
analyzed: hi jīvitam indriya paccaya bhāvena sampayutte pavattayamānam eva tad avicchedassa paccayaḥ hoti

original: 30. Yaṃ hirīyatīti hirīyati-saddena vutto bhāvo yaṃ-saddena vuccatīti yanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ vā etaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Hiriyitabbenāti ca hetuatthe karaṇavacanaṃ yujjati.
analyzed: yam hirīyati iti hirīyati saddena vuttaḥ bhāvaḥ yaṃsaddena vuccati iti yanti bhāva napuṃsakam vā etam daṭṭhabbam hiriyitabbena ati ca hetu atthe karaṇa vacanam yujjati

original: 32. Alubbhanakavasenāti ettha alubbhanameva alubbhanakanti bhāvaniddeso daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: alubbhanaka vasena āti ettha alubbhanam eva alubbhanakanti bhāva niddeso daṭṭhabbo

original: 33. Abyāpajjoti byāpādena dukkhena domanassasaṅkhātena dosena viya na byāpādetabbotipi attho yujjati.
analyzed: a byāpajjaḥ ti byāpādena dukkhena domanassa saṅkhātena dosena viya na byāpādetabbaḥ iti pi atthaḥ yujjati

original: 42-43. Thinamiddhādipaṭipakkhabhāvena kusaladhamme aniccādimanasikāre ca sīghaṃ sīghaṃ
analyzed: thinam iddha ādi paṭipakkha bhāvena kusala dhamme anicca ādi manasikāre ca sīgham sīgham

original: parivattanasamatthatā lahupariṇāmatā, avijjānīvaraṇānañhi taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sattānaṃ
analyzed: parivattana samattha tā lahu pariṇāma tā avijjā nīvaraṇānam hi taṇhā saṃyojanānam sattānam

original: akusalappavatti pakatibhūtāti na tattha lahupariṇāmatāya attho. Tesañca bhāvo garutāyevāti
analyzed: akusala ppavatti pakati bhūtā ati na tattha lahu pariṇāma tāya atthaḥ tesam ca bhāvaḥ garu tāya iva ati

original: tabbidhurasabhāvānaṃ lahutā daṭṭhabbā. Sā hi pavattamānā sīghaṃ bhavaṅgavuṭṭhānassa paccayo hoti.
analyzed: tad bidhu rasa bhāvānam lahu tā daṭṭhabbā sā hi pavattamānā sīgham bhavaṅga vuṭṭhānassa paccayaḥ hoti

original: 44-45. Ye ca dhammā mohasampayuttā viya avipannalahutā, tesañca kusalakaraṇe appaṭighāto mudutā. Appaṭighātena mudutādirūpasadisatāya arūpadhammānampi mudutā maddavatātiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ye ca dhammā moha sampayuttāḥ viya avipanna lahu tā tesam ca kusala karaṇe appaṭighātaḥ mudu tā appaṭighātena mudu tā ādi rūpa sadisa tāya arūpa dhammānam pi mudu tā maddava tā atiādi vuttaṃ

original: 46-47. Sinehavasena kilinnaṃ atimudukaṃ cittaṃ akammaññaṃ hoti vilīnaṃ viya suvaṇṇaṃ,

original: avisesena ca pañcupādānakkhandhe.
analyzed: avisesena ca pañca upādānakkhandhe

original: Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā nijjhāyanaṃ cintanaṃ upanijjhāyanaṃ. Hetvaṭṭhenāti upāyatthena,

original: na mūlatthena. Pubbabhāge gato paṭipanno nānākkhaṇiko aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo lokuttarakkhaṇeva

analyzed: āha cattāro khandhāḥ honti iti ādīsu vedanā khandha ādīnam saṅgahe kate api punar ekaḥ vedanā khandho

original: hotī”tiādivacanaṃ na aneke vedanākkhandhādayo jātiniddesena idha vuttāti dassanatthaṃ.

original: Koṭṭhāsavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: suññata vāra vaṇṇanā

original: Dutiyacittādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: dutiya citta ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 146. Sappayogenāti līnassa cittassa ussāhanapayogasahitena. Saupāyenāti kusalassa karaṇākaraṇesu ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇaṃ parehi ussāhananti evamādiupāyasahitena.
analyzed: sa ppayogena ati līnassa cittassa ussāhana payoga sahitena sa upāyena ati kusalassa karaṇa akaraṇesu ādīnava anisaṃsa paccavekkhaṇam parehi ussāhanam ti evamādi upāya sahitena

original: Puññakiriyavatthādikathāvaṇṇanā
Apaciti eva apacitisahagataṃ puññakiriyāvatthu yathā “nandirāgasahagatā”ti. Apaciti
analyzed: apaciti eva apaciti sahagatam puñña kiriyā vatthu yathā nandi rāga sahagatā ati apaciti

original: Hitapharaṇenāti desake mettāpharaṇena, “evaṃ me hitaṃ bhavissatī”ti pavattena hitacittena

original: Paṭhamajjhānakathāvaṇṇanā

analyzed: paṭipadā eva na ca tatas uddham sukhā paṭipadā hoti iti tikkhattum vikkhambhana vāram

original: dukkhā paṭipadāti rocesuṃ aṭṭhakathācariyā. Tasmiṃ tathārocite tato paresu catukkhattuṃ
analyzed: dukkhā paṭipadā ti rocesuṃ aṭṭhakathā cariyā tasmin tathā ārocite tatas paresu catu khattum

original: vikkhambhanavārādīsu vattabbameva natthīti. Rūpārūpānaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi paricchinditvā
analyzed: vikkhambhana vāra ādīsu vattabbam eva natthi iti rūpa arūpānam lakkhaṇa ādīhi paricchinditvā

original: gahaṇaṃ rūpārūpapariggaho, nāmarūpamattametaṃ, na añño koci sattādikoti vavatthāpanaṃ
analyzed: gahaṇam rūpa arūpa pariggahaḥ nāma rūpam attam etam na añño koci satta ādiko ti vavatthāpanam

original: nāmarūpavavatthāpanaṃ. Pariggahitarūpārūpassa maggapātubhāvadandhatā ca nāmarūpavavatthāpanādīnaṃ
analyzed: nāma rūpa vavatthāpanam pariggahita rūpa arūpassa magga pātubhāva dandha tā ca nāma rūpa vavatthāpana ādīnam

original: kicchasiddhito siyāti na rūpārūpapariggahakicchatāya eva dukkhapaṭipadatā vattabbāti
analyzed: kiccha siddhitaḥ siyā ti na rūpa arūpa pariggaha kiccha tāya eva dukkha paṭipada tā vattabbā ti

original: ce? Taṃ na, nāmarūpavavatthāpanādīnaṃ paccanīkakilesamandatāya sukhasiddhiyampi tathāsiddhavipassanāsahagatānaṃ
analyzed: ce tam na nāma rūpa vavatthāpana ādīnam paccanīka kilesa manda tāya tathā siddha vipassanā sahagatānam

original: indriyānaṃ mandatāya maggapātubhāvadandhabhāvato.
analyzed: manda tāya

original: Rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvāti akicchenapi pariggahetvā. Kicchena pariggahite vattabbameva
analyzed: rūpa arūpam pariggahetvā ti a kicchena api pariggahetvā kicchena pariggahite vattabbam eva

original: natthi. Evaṃ sesesupi. Imaṃ vāraṃ rocesunti kalāpasammasanāvasāne udayabbayānupassanāya
analyzed: natthi evam sesesu pi imam vāram rocesunti kalāpa sammasana avasāne udaya bbaya anupassanāya

original: vattamānāya uppannassa vipassanupakkilesassa tikkhattuṃ vikkhambhanena kicchatāvāraṃ
analyzed: vattamānāya uppannassa vipassanu pakkilesassa tikkhattum vikkhambhanena

original: dukkhā paṭipadāti rocesuṃ etadantattā paṭipadāya. Etassa akicchattepi purimānaṃ kicchatte
analyzed: dukkhā paṭipadā ati rocesuṃ etad anta ttā paṭipadāya etassa a kicchatte pi purimānam kicchatte

original: dukkhapaṭipadatā vuttanayāvāti na paṭisiddhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāvuttaṃ vā sabbaṃ

original: rūpārūpapariggahādikicchataṃ tikkhattuṃ vikkhambhanavāratāvasena “imaṃ vāra”nti āha.
analyzed: rūpa arūpa pariggaha ādi kicchatam tikkhattum vikkhambhana vāra tā vasena imam āha

original: Yassa pana sabbattha akicchatā, tassa sukhā paṭipadā veditabbā.
analyzed: yassa pana sabbattha a kiccha tā tassa sukhā paṭipadā veditabbā

original: Musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato pariggāhakasabhāvā
analyzed: musāvāda ādīnam visaṃvādana ādi kicca tāya lūkhānam a pariggāhakānam paṭipakkha bhāvato pariggāhaka sabhāvā

original: sammāvācā. Sā siniddhabhāvato sampayuttadhamme pariggaṇhāti sammāvācāpaccayasubhāsitasotārañca
analyzed: sammāvācā sā siniddha bhāvataḥ sampayutta dhamme pariggaṇhāti sammāvācā paccaya subhāsita sotāram ca

original: janaṃ. Kāyikakiriyākiccaṃ kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ
analyzed: janam kāyika kiriyā kiccam kattabbam samuṭṭhāpeti sayam ca samuṭṭhahanam ghaṭanam

original: hotīti sammākammantasaṅkhātā viratipi samuṭṭhānasabhāvāti vuttā. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ

original: vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhahanaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya, jīvamānassa sattassa,
analyzed: vā ukkhipanam samuṭṭhahanam kāyika kiriyāya bhāru khipanam viya jīvamānassa sattassa

original: sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā suddhi vodānaṃ ājīvasseva vā jīvitindriyavuttiyā.
analyzed: sampayutta dhammānam vā ājīvassa iva vā jīvitindriya vuttiyā

original: 283. Maggasannissitanti paramatthamaggasabhāvattā maggāvayavabhāvena samudāyasannissitanti attho.
analyzed: magga sannissitanti paramattha magga sabhāvattā magga avayava bhāvena samudāya sannissitanti attho

original: 285. Patiṭṭhānaṃ kilesavasena, āyūhanaṃ abhisaṅkhāravasena. Taṇhāvasena vā patiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: patiṭṭhānam kilesa vasena āyūhanam abhisaṅkhāra vasena taṇhā vasena vā patiṭṭhānam

original: diṭṭhivasena āyūhanaṃ. Bodhīti yā ayaṃ dhammasāmaggī vuccatīti yojetabbā. Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo
analyzed: diṭṭhi vasena āyūhanam bodhi iti yā ayam dhamma sāmaggī vuccati iti yojetabbā senaṅga rathaṅga ādayo

analyzed: viya iti etena puggala paññattiyāḥ avijjamāna paññatti bhāvam dasseti aṅga saddo kāraṇa atthaḥ api

original: hotīti catusaccabodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā. Bujjhantīti bodhiyo, bodhiyo eva
analyzed: hoti iti catu sacca bodhāya saṃvattanti iti bojjhaṅgāḥ bujjhanti iti bodhiyaḥ bodhiyaḥ eva

original: aṅgāti “anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti vuttaṃ. Vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ bujjhitabbānañca
analyzed: aṅgā ati anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā iti vuttam vipassanā ādīnam kāraṇānam bujjhitabbānam ca

original: saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ paccakkhabhāvena paṭimukhaṃ aviparītatāya sammā ca bujjhantīti
analyzed: saccānam anurūpam paccakkha bhāvena paṭimukham a viparīta tāya sammā ca bujjhanti iti

original: evamatthavisesadīpakehi upasaggehi “anubujjhantī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bodhi-saddo hi sabbavisesayuttaṃ
analyzed: evam attha visesa dīpakehi upasaggehi anubujjhanti itiādi vuttam bodhi saddaḥ hi sabba visesa yuttam

original: bujjhanaṃ sāmaññena saṅgaṇhātīti.
analyzed: bujjhanam sāmaññena saṅgaṇhāti iti

original: 299. Tiṇṇanti rāgādīnaṃ. Karoti nāma kiṃ duccaritāni anuvattamānāni.
analyzed: rāga ādīnam karoti nāma kim duccaritāni anuvattamānāni

original: 301. Pāṇātipātādinipphāditapaccayānaṃ niccasevanaṃ dhuvapaṭisevanaṃ. Sakiccakoti
visuṃ attano kiccavā. Na hotīti atthantarabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. Paccayapaṭisevanasāmantajappanairiyāpathappavattanāni
analyzed: visum attanaḥ kiccavā na hoti iti attha antara bhāvam paṭikkhipati paccaya paṭisevana sāmanta jappa na eriyāpatha ppavattanāni

original: pāpicchatānibbattāni tīṇi kuhanavatthūnīti.
analyzed: pāpa iccha tā nibbattāni tīṇi kuhana vatthūni iti

original: 343. Vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā saṅkhārupekkhā sānulomā, sā suññato passantī “suññatā”ti
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna gāminī vipassanā saṅkhāra upekkhā sa anulomā sā suññatas passantī suññatā ti

original: vuccati, dukkhato passantī taṇhāpaṇidhisosanato “appaṇihita”nti. Sā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne

original: maggādhigamatthaṃ āgamanapaṭipadāṭhāne ṭhatvā suññatāppaṇihitanti nāmaṃ deti. Āgamanato
analyzed: magga adhigama attham āgamana paṭipadā ṭhāne ṭhatvā suñña tā appaṇihitanti nāmam deti āgamanataḥ

analyzed: nāme laddhe sa guṇataḥ ārammaṇato ca nāmam siddham eva hoti na pana sa guṇa ārammaṇehi

original: nāmalābhe sabbattha āgamanato nāmaṃ siddhaṃ hotīti paripuṇṇanāmasiddhihetuttā saguṇārammaṇehi
analyzed: nāma lābhe sabbattha āgamanataḥ nāmam siddham hoti iti paripuṇṇa nāma siddhi hetuttā sa guṇa ārammaṇehi

original: sabbesampi nāmattayayogo, na āgamanatoti vavatthānakarattā ca nippariyāyadesanāya
analyzed: sabbesam pi nāma ttaya yogaḥ na āgamanato ti vavatthānakara ttā ca nippariyāya desanāya

original: āgamanatova idha nāmaṃ labhati, na itarehīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: āgamanataḥ vai idha nāmam labhati na itarehi iti vuttam

original: 350. Animittavipassananti aniccānupassanaṃ. Nimittadhammesūti samūhādighanavasena
analyzed: animitta vipassanam ti anicca anupassanam nimitta dhammesu iti samūha ādi ghana vasena

original: ca sakiccaparicchedatāya ca sapariggahesu khandhesu. Animittavimokkhoti aniccānupassanamāha.
analyzed: ca sa kicca pariccheda tāya ca sa pariggahesu khandhesu animitta vimokkhaḥ ti anicca anupassanam āha

original: Evaṃsampadamidanti kathamidha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ hoti. Na hi chandacittānaṃ maggasaṅkhātaadhipatibhāvābhāvo
analyzed: evaṃsampadam idam ti katham idha upamā saṃsandanam hoti na hi chanda cittānam magga saṅkhāta adhipati bhāva abhāvaḥ

original: viya saddhindriyādhikassa animittavimokkhassa animittabhāvābhāvo atthi, na ca amaggādhipatīnaṃ
analyzed: viya saddhi indriya adhikassa animitta vimokkhassa animitta bhāva abhāvaḥ atthi na ca amagga adhipatīnam

analyzed: magga adhipati nāmadāna abhāvaḥ viya animittassa animitta nāmadāna abhāvaḥ ti sakkā vattum a nimitta vimokkhassa

original: ananimittatāya abhāvato. Maggo adhipati etesanti ca maggādhipatinoti yutto tattha
analyzed: an animitta tāya abhāvataḥ maggaḥ adhipati etesanti ca magga adhipatino ti yuttaḥ tattha

original: chandacittehi taṃsampayuttānaṃ maggādhipatibhāvābhāvo. Idha pana maggo animittaṃ
analyzed: chanda cittehi tad sampayuttānam magga adhipati bhāva abhāvaḥ idha pana maggaḥ animittam

original: etassāti maggānimittoti ayamattho na sambhavatīti na tena amaggena maggassa animittabhāvo
analyzed: etassa ati magga animittaḥ ti ayam atthaḥ na sambhavati iti na tena amaggena maggassa animitta bhāvaḥ

original: na yujjati, kiṃ vā ettha sāmaññaṃ adhippetanti. Amaggaṅgamagganāmābhāvo. Yathā satipi

original: adhipatibhāve chandacittānaṃ na maggādhipatīti magganāmaṃ, na ca tehi maggassa tesaṃ

original: amaggaṅgattā, tathā satipi saddhāya āgamanabhāvena tassā animittanti magganāmaṃ,
analyzed: a maggaṅga ttā tathā sati pi saddhāya āgamana bhāvena tassā animittam ti magga nāmam

original: na ca tāya maggassa tassā amaggaṅgattā. Evaṃ animittavipassanāyapi animittabhāvo
analyzed: na ca tāya maggassa tassāḥ a maggaṅga ttā evam animitta vipassanāya api animitta bhāvaḥ

original: nippariyāyena natthīti dīpito hoti.
analyzed: nippariyāyena natthi iti dīpitaḥ hoti

original: Nanu ca idha jhānaṃ suññatādināmena vuttaṃ, na maggoti ce? Na, maggasampayogato jhānassa
analyzed: nanu ca idha jhānam suññatā ādi nāmena vuttam na maggo ti ce na magga sampayogato jhānassa

original: suññatādināmakattā. Suttantapariyāyena saguṇārammaṇehi idha abhidhammepi nāmaṃ labhatīti
analyzed: suññata ādi nāmaka ttā suttanta pariyāyena sa guṇa ārammaṇehi idha abhidhamme pi nāmam labhati iti

original: āhaṃsu. Tasmā paṭikkhittā “na pana labhantī”ti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Abhidhamme sarasaṃ anāmasitvā
analyzed: āhaṃsu tasmā paṭikkhittāḥ na pana labhanti iti kim kāraṇā abhidhamme sarasam an āmasitvā

original: paccanīkatova nāmalābhāti adhippāyo. Yo hi saguṇārammaṇehi nāmalābho, so sarasappadhāno
analyzed: paccanīkato va nāma lābhā ti adhippāyaḥ yaḥ hi sa guṇa ārammaṇehi nāma lābhaḥ so sa rasa ppadhāno

original: hoti. Saraseneva ca nāmalābhe sabbamaggānaṃ suññatādibhāvoti vavatthānaṃ na siyā.
analyzed: hoti sa rasena iva ca nāma lābhe sabba maggānam suñña tā ādi bhāvaḥ ti vavatthānam na siyā

original: Tasmā abhidhamme satipi dvīhi nāmalābhe paccanīkato nāmavavatthānakaraṃ gahitanti
analyzed: tasmai abhidhamme sati pi dvīhi nāma lābhe paccanīkataḥ nāma vavatthāna karam gahitanti

original: saguṇārammaṇehi suññatāppaṇihitamaggā nāmaṃ na labhantīti āha. Atha vā na pana labhantīti
analyzed: sa guṇa ārammaṇehi suñña tā appaṇihita maggāḥ nāmam na labhanti iti āha atha vā na pana labhanti iti

original: aññanirapekkhehi saguṇārammaṇehi na labhanti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Abhidhamme sarasapaccanīkehi
analyzed: añña nirapekkhehi sa guṇa ārammaṇehi na labhanti kim kāraṇā abhidhamme sa rasa paccanīkehi

original: sahitehi nāmalābhāti attho. Paccanīkañhi vavatthānakaraṃ anapekkhitvā kevalassa sarasassa
analyzed: sahitehi nāma lābhā ati attho paccanīkam hi vavatthāna karam an apekkhitvā kevalassa sarasassa

analyzed: maggā sati pi sara santare paccanīka sahitena sa rasena nāmam labhanti a nimitta maggassa

original: pana vipassanā nimittapaṭipakkhā na hoti sayaṃ nimittaggahaṇato nimittaggahaṇānivāraṇāti
analyzed: pana vipassanā nimitta paṭipakkhā na hoti sayam nimitta ggahaṇataḥ nimitta ggahaṇa a nivāraṇā ati

original: tadanulomamaggopi na nimittassa paṭipakkho. Yadi siyā, nimittagatavipassanāyapi paṭipakkho
analyzed: tad anuloma maggaḥ api na nimittassa paṭipakkhaḥ yadi siyā paṭipakkhaḥ

original: siyāti. Tasmā vijjamānopi saraso vavatthānakarapaccanīkābhāvā abhidhamme animittanti
analyzed: siyā ati tasmā vijjamānaḥ api sarasaḥ vavatthāna kara paccanīka abhāvā abhidhamme animittan ti

original: nāmadāyako na gahito. Aniccānupassanānulomo pana maggo suddhikapaṭipadānayeyeva saṅgahitoti

original: daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā eva ca so nayo vuttoti. Evanti yaṃ vakkhati “aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ tasmai eva ca saḥ nayaḥ vutto ti evam ti yam vakkhati aniccataḥ vuṭṭhahantassa

original: maggo animitto hotī”ti, evaṃ āharitvā aṭṭhakathācariyehi so animittamaggo dīpitoti attho.
analyzed: maggaḥ animittaḥ hoti iti evam āharitvā aṭṭhakathā cariyehi so animitta maggaḥ dīpitaḥ iti attho

original: Vuṭṭhāna…pe… kimārammaṇāti aniccādito vuṭṭhahantassa vuṭṭhānagāminiyā lakkhaṇārammaṇatte
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna pe kim ārammaṇā ti anicca āditaḥ vuṭṭhahantassa vuṭṭhāna gāminiyā lakkhaṇa ārammaṇa tte

original: sati saṅkhārehi vuṭṭhānaṃ na siyā, saṅkhārārammaṇatte ca lakkhaṇapaṭivedhoti maññamāno
analyzed: sati saṅkhārehi vuṭṭhānam na siyā saṅkhāra ārammaṇa tte ca lakkhaṇa paṭivedho ti maññamāno

analyzed: pucchati aniccanti ādinā saṅkhāresu pavattamānena ñāṇena lakkhaṇāni pi paṭividdhāni

original: honti tadākārasaṅkhāragahaṇatoti āha “lakkhaṇārammaṇā”ti. Saṅkhārārammaṇā eva yathāvuttādhippāyena
analyzed: honti tad ākāra saṅkhāra gahaṇato ti āha lakkhaṇa ārammaṇā ti saṅkhāra ārammaṇāḥ eva yathā vutta adhippāyena

original: “lakkhaṇārammaṇā”ti vuttāti dassento “lakkhaṇaṃ nāmā”tiādimāha. Aniccatā dukkhatā
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ārammaṇā iti vuttā iti dassentaḥ lakkhaṇam nāma ati ādim āha anicca tā dukkha tā

original: anattatāti hi visuṃ gayhamānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ paññattigatikaṃ paramatthato avijjamānaṃ,
analyzed: anatta tā ati hi visum gayhamānam lakkhaṇam paññatti gatikam paramatthataḥ a vijjamānam

analyzed: eva paritta ādi vasena navattabba dhamma bhūtam tasmā visum gahetabbassa

original: lakkhaṇassa paramatthato abhāvā “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti saṅkhāre sabhāvato sallakkhentova
analyzed: lakkhaṇassa paramatthataḥ abhāvā aniccam dukkham anattā ati saṅkhāre sabhāvataḥ sallakkhentaḥ iva

original: lakkhaṇāni sallakkheti nāmāti āha “yo pana aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni
analyzed: lakkhaṇāni sallakkhā iti nāma ati āha yaḥ pana aniccam dukkham anattā ati tīṇi lakkhaṇāni

original: sallakkhetī”ti. Yasmā ca aniccantiādinā saṅkhārāva dissamānā, tasmā te kaṇṭhe baddhakuṇapaṃ
analyzed: sallakkheti iti yasmā ca aniccanti ādinā saṅkhārā ava dissamānā tasmā te kaṇṭhe baddha kuṇapam

original: viya paṭinissajjanīyā honti.
analyzed: viya paṭinissajjanīyāḥ honti

original: Lokuttarakusalaṃ
analyzed: lokuttara kusalam

original: Pakiṇṇakakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Tatrāti lokuttarajjhāne. Ajjhattañcāti upaḍḍhagāthāya abhinivisitabbaṃ vuṭṭhātabbaṃ

original: vipassanābhūmiṃ pañcadhā uddisati. Sattaaṭṭhādīni aṅgāni sattaṭṭhaṅgānīti ādisaddassa
analyzed: vipassanā bhūmim pañcadhā uddisati satta aṭṭha ādīni aṅgāni satta ṭṭhaṅgāni iti ādi saddassa

original: lopo daṭṭhabbo. Nimittanti yato vuṭṭhānaṃ, tāni nimittapavattāni nimittavacaneneva
analyzed: lopaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ nimittam ti yatas vuṭṭhānam tāni nimitta pavattāni nimitta vacanena iva

original: Tato tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato uppannassa sasaṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ

original: apādakapaṭhamajjhānapādakamaggā paṭhamajjhānikāva honti, itare ca pādakajjhānavipassanāniyamehi

original: taṃtaṃjhānikā. Evaṃ sesavādesupi vipassanāniyamo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
analyzed: evam sesa vādesu pi vipassanā niyamaḥ yathāsambhavam yojetabbaḥ

original: Pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāreti pādakajjhānato aññasaṅkhāre. Tena pādakajjhānasaṅkhāresu sammasitesu

original: vattabbameva natthīti dasseti. Tatrāpīti dutiyattheravādepi. Taṃtaṃjhānikatā taṃtaṃsammasitasaṅkhāravipassanāniyamehi
analyzed: vattabbam eva natthi iti dasseti tatra api iti dutiya thera vāde pi taṃ taṃ jhānika tā taṃ taṃ sammasita saṅkhāra vipassanā niyamehi

original: hoti. Tatrāpi hi vipassanā taṃtaṃvirāgāvirāgabhāvanābhāvena somanassasahagatā upekkhāsahagatā
analyzed: hoti tatra api hi vipassanā taṃ taṃ virāga avirāga bhāvanā bhāvena somanassa sahagatā upekkhā sahagatā

analyzed: ca hutvā jhāna aṅga ādi niyamam maggassa karoti iti evam vipassanā niyamaḥ vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: Tanti taṃtaṃjhānasadisabhavanaṃ. Svāyamattho pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānupanissayehi

original: asijjhanadīpakena nandakovādena dīpetabbo. Tattha hi sotāpannāyapi paripuṇṇasaṅkappabhāvaṃ

analyzed: vadantena bhagavatā yassa yassa upanissayaḥ atthi tassa tassa iva ajjhāsayaḥ niyāmako

original: Imasmiṃ pana vāde pādakasammasitajjhānupanissayasabbhāve ajjhāsayo ekantena hoti,

original: Yasmiṃ pana pādakajjhānaṃ natthīti catutthajjhānikavajjānaṃ pādakāni lokiyajjhānāni

analyzed: catuttha jhānika tā api samānā anusaya samugghāṭana samatthassa na saṅkhāra avasesa tā ti

original: Lokuttarakusalapakiṇṇakakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Paṭhamamaggavīsatimahānayavaṇṇanā
357. Yassa pubbabhāge “maggaṃ bhāvemī”ti ajjhāsayo pavatto, so maggaṃ bhāveti. Evaṃ sabbattha ajjhāsayavisesena taṃtaṃbhāvanāviseso daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: yassa pubba bhāge maggam bhāvemi iti ajjhāsayaḥ pavatto saḥ maggam bhāveti evam sabbattha ajjhāsaya visesena taṃ taṃ bhāvanā visesaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: 358. Chandādhipateyyantiādīsu ekacittakkhaṇe vattamānesu dhammesu kathaṃ chandassa
analyzed: chanda ādhipateyya ntiādīsu eka cittakkhaṇe vattamānesu dhammesu katham chandassa

original: taṃsahajātassa adhipatibhāvo vīriyādīnañcāti? Upanissayavasena. Yassa hi sace chandavato
analyzed: tad sahajātassa adhipati bhāvaḥ vīriya ādīnam ca ati upanissaya vasena yassa hi sace chandavato

original: kusalaṃ nipphajjati, “ahaṃ nipphādessāmī”ti pavattamānassa kusalaṃ nipphannaṃ, tassa
analyzed: kusalam nipphajjati aham nipphādessāmi iti pavattamānassa kusalam nipphannam tassa

original: taṃsahajāto chando tena purimupanissayena visiṭṭho sahajātadhamme attano vase vatteti.
analyzed: tad sahajātaḥ chandaḥ tena purima upanissayena visiṭṭhaḥ sahajāta dhamme attanaḥ vase vatteti

original: Tasmiñca pavattamāne te pavattanti, nivattamāne nivattanti, tadanurūpabalā ca honti
analyzed: tasmin ca pavattamāne te pavattanti nivattamāne nivattanti tad anurūpa balā ca honti

original: rājapurisā viyāti. Evaṃ vīriyādīsu. Sesadhammānaṃ pana katthaci vuttappakārappavattisabbhāvepi

original: ataṃsabhāvattā adhipatibhāvo natthīti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: a taṃsa bhāva ttā adhipati bhāvaḥ na atthi iti daṭṭhabbo

original: Dutiyamaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dutiya magga vaṇṇanā

original: 361. Ā-kārassa rassattaṃ katvā aññindriyaṃ vuttaṃ, ā-kāro ca dhammamariyādattho.
analyzed: ākārassa rassa ttam katvā aññindriyam vuttaṃ ākāro ca

original: Tatiyacatutthamaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: tatiya catuttha magga vaṇṇanā

analyzed: maggaṅgāni na pūrenti a kiccaka ttā sammādiṭṭhiyā ati adhippāyaḥ mārentaḥ gacchati iti

analyzed: hi maggaḥ na cetāya māretabbam atthi iti mānassa diṭṭhi sadisā pavatti aham asmi iti pavatta mānassa

original: kiledetvā. Chandoti taṇhā. Anusayoti taṇhā mānānusayo ca. Etasmiñca sutte asamūhatassa

original: Dhammuddesavāro
analyzed: dhammuddesa vāro

original: Tasmā yena kenaci kammunā ekena anekaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ kammavisesābhāvā

original: hotīti javanenāyaṃ tadārammaṇaniyāmo vutto, na nānākammunā nibbattamānassa vasena.

original: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “sahetuke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. Kusalākusale
