original: abyākatassa sabhāvatoyeva niddese ekadesaṃ niddisitvā nigamanakaraṇassa anupapattito
analyzed: abyākatassa sabhāvataḥ yā iva niddese eka desam niddisitvā nigamana karaṇassa anupapattito

original: ca vibhattañca avibhattañca sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhanto āha “katame dhammā abyākatā? Kusalā…pe…
analyzed: ca vibhattam ca a vibhattam ca sabbam saṅgaṇhantaḥ āha katame dhammāḥ abyākatā

original: asaṅkhatā ca dhātu. Ime dhammā abyākatā”ti. Avibhatte hi vibhajitabbe dassite vibhajanaṃ
analyzed: asaṅkhatā ca dhātu ime dhammā abyākatā ati a vibhatte hi vibhajitabbe dassite vibhajanam

original: yuttaṃ ñātuṃ icchāya uppāditāyāti. Ettha pana vipākakiriyābyākataṃ vibhattattā na
analyzed: yuttam ñātum icchāya uppāditāya ati ettha pana vipāka kiriyā byākatam na

original: vibhajitabbaṃ, asaṅkhatā ca dhātu bhedābhāvato. Yaṃ panettha bhedayuttattā avibhattattā
analyzed: vibhajitabbam asaṅkhatā ca dhātu bheda abhāvataḥ yam pana ittha bheda yutta ttā a vibhatta ttā

original: ca vibhajitabbaṃ, taṃ vibhajanto āha “tattha katamaṃ sabbaṃ rūpa”ntiādi. Ayamettha pāḷiyojanā.
analyzed: ca vibhajitabbam tam vibhajantaḥ āha tattha katamam sabbam rūpa ntiādi ayam ettha pāḷiyojanā

original: Nayaṃ dassetvāti ettha heṭṭhā gahaṇameva nayadassanaṃ. Taṃ vipākesu katvā viññātattā
analyzed: nayam dassetvā ti ettha heṭṭhā gahaṇam eva naya dassanam tam vipākesu katvā viññāta ttā

original: kiriyābyākatesu nissaṭṭhaṃ. Kāmāvacarādibhāvena vattabbassa kiriyābyākatassa vā dassanaṃ,
analyzed: kiriyā abyākatesu nissaṭṭham kāmāvacara ādi bhāvena vattabbassa kiriyā abyākatassa vā dassanam

original: taṃ katvā kāmāvacarātiādikaṃ gahetvā vuttattā nissaṭṭhaṃ. Pañcavīsati rūpānīti pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: tam katvā kāmāvacara ati ādikam gahetvā vutta ttā nissaṭṭham pañcavīsati rūpāni iti pāḷiyam

original: vuttāni dasāyatanāni pañcadasa ca sukhumarūpāni, upacayasantatiyo vā ekanti katvā
analyzed: vuttāni dasa āyatanāni pañcadasa ca sukhuma rūpāni upacaya santatiyaḥ vā ekanti katvā

original: hadayavatthuñca. Channavutīti cakkhādidasakā satta utusamuṭṭhānādayo tayo aṭṭhakā
analyzed: hadaya vatthum ca channavuti iti cakkha ādi dasakā satta utu samuṭṭhāna ādayo tayo aṭṭhakā

original: utucittajā dve saddā ca. Kalāpabhāvena pavattarūparūpāni “rūpakoṭṭhāsā”ti vuttāni
analyzed: utu citta jāḥ dve ca kalāpa bhāvena pavatta rūpa rūpāni rūpa koṭṭhāsā ti vuttāni

original: rūpakalāpakoṭṭhāsabhāvato. Koṭṭhāsāti ca aṃsā, avayavāti attho. Koṭṭhanti vā sarīraṃ,
analyzed: rūpa kalāpa koṭṭhāsa bhāvato koṭṭhāsā ati ca aṃsāḥ avayavā ti attho koṭṭhanti vā sarīram

original: tassa aṃsā kesādayo koṭṭhāsāti aññepi avayavā koṭṭhāsā viya koṭṭhāsā. Nibbānaṃ nippadesato
analyzed: tassa aṃsā kesa ādayo koṭṭhāsā ti aññe pi avayavā koṭṭhāsāḥ viya koṭṭhāsāḥ nibbānam nippadesato

original: gahitanti sopādisesanirupādisesarāgakkhayādiasaṅkhatādivacanīyabhāvena bhinnaṃ nippadesato
analyzed: gahitam ti sa upādi sesa nirupādi sesa rāga kkhaya ādi asaṅkhata ādi vacanīya bhāvena bhinnam nippadesataḥ

original: gahitaṃ. Atthato hi ekāva asaṅkhatā dhātūti.
analyzed: gahitam atthataḥ hi ekā ava asaṅkhatā dhātu uti

original: 584. Sabbanti sakalaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ. Parimaṇḍalaṃ parimaṇḍalasaṇṭhānaṃ, parikkhepato
analyzed: sabbanti sakalam cakkavāḷam parimaṇḍalam parimaṇḍala saṇṭhānam parikkhepato

original: chattiṃsa satasahassāni dasa ceva sahassāni aḍḍhacatutthāni ca yojanasatāni hontīti
analyzed: chattiṃsa sata sahassāni dasa ca iva sahassāni aḍḍha catutthāni ca yojana satāni honti iti

original: attho. Ettha ca vaṭṭaṃ “parimaṇḍala”nti vuttaṃ. Cattāri nahutānīti cattālīsa sahassāni.
analyzed: ettha ca vaṭṭam parimaṇḍalanti vuttam cattāri nahutāni iti cattālīsa sahassāni

original: Nagavhayāti nagāti avhātabbā nagasaddanāmāti attho.
analyzed: naga vhayā ati nagā ati a vhātabbā naga sadda nāmā ati attho

original: Devadānavādīnaṃ tigāvutādisarīravasena mahantāni pātubhūtāni. Tatthāyaṃ vacanattho
analyzed: deva dānava ādīnam tigāvuta ādi sarīra vasena mahantāni pātubhūtāni tattha ayam vacana attho

original: – bhūtāni jātāni nibbattāni mahantāni mahābhūtānīti. Anekacchariyadassanena anekābhūtavisesadassanavasena
analyzed: bhūtāni jātāni nibbattāni mahantāni mahābhūtāni iti

original: ca māyākāro mahanto bhūtoti mahābhūto. Yakkhādayo jātivaseneva mahantā bhūtāti mahābhūtā.
analyzed: ca māyākāraḥ mahantaḥ bhūtaḥ iti mahā bhūtaḥ yakkha ādayaḥ jāti vasena iva mahantā bhūtā ati mahā bhūtā

original: Niruḷho vā ayaṃ mahābhūtasaddo tesu daṭṭhabbo. Pathaviyādayo pana mahābhūtā viya
analyzed: niruḷhaḥ vā ayam mahābhūta saddo tesu daṭṭhabbo pathaviya ādayo pana mahābhūtāḥ viya

original: mahābhūtā. Bhūtasaddassa ubhayaliṅgattā napuṃsakatā katā. Mahāparihāratoti ettha
analyzed: mahābhūtāḥ bhūta saddassa ubhaya liṅga ttā napuṃsaka tā katā mahā parihārato ti ettha

original: vacanatthaṃ vadanto āha “mahantehi bhūtāni, mahāparihārāni vā bhūtānī”ti. Tattha
analyzed: vacana attham vadantaḥ āha bhūtāni mahā parihārāni vā bhūtāni iti tattha

original: pacchimatthe purimapade uttarapadassa parihārasaddassa lopaṃ katvā “mahābhūtānī”ti vuccanti.
analyzed: pacchimatthe purima pade uttara padassa parihāra saddassa lopam katvā mahābhūtāni iti vuccanti

original: Accimatoti aggissa. Koṭisatasahassaṃ ekaṃ koṭisatasahassekaṃ. Cakkavāḷanti taṃ sabbaṃ
analyzed: accimataḥ ti aggissa koṭi sata sahassam ekam koṭi sata sahassa ekam cakkavāḷanti tat sabbam

original: āṇākkhettavasena ekaṃ katvā voharanti. Vilīyati khārodakena. Vikīratīti viddhaṃsati.
analyzed: ekam katvā voharanti vilīyati khāra udakena vikīrati iti

original: Upādinnakesu vikāraṃ dassento “patthaddho”tiādimāha. Kaṭṭhamukhena vāti vā-saddo
analyzed: upādinnakesu vikāram dassento patthaddhaḥ ti ādim āha kaṭṭha mukhena vā ati vāsaddaḥ

original: upamattho. Yathā kaṭṭhamukhasappena daṭṭho patthaddho hoti, evaṃ pathavīdhātuppakopena
analyzed: upamatthaḥ yathā kaṭṭha mukha sappena daṭṭhaḥ patthaddhaḥ hoti evam pathavī dhātu pakopena

original: so kāyo kaṭṭhamukheva hoti, kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya patthaddho hotīti attho. Atha
analyzed: so kāyaḥ kaṭṭha mukhā iva hoti kaṭṭha mukha mukha gataḥ viya patthaddhaḥ hoti iti atthaḥ atha

original: vā vā-saddo evasaddassatthe. “Pathavīdhātuppakopenā”ti etassa ca parato āharitvā
analyzed: vā vā saddaḥ eva saddassa atthe pathavī dhātu pakopena ati etassa ca paratas āharitvā

original: veditabbo. Tatrāyamattho – “kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭhopi kāyo pathavīdhātuppakopeneva patthaddho
analyzed: veditabbaḥ tatra ayam atthaḥ kaṭṭha mukhena daṭṭhaḥ api kāyaḥ pathavī dhātu pakopena iva patthaddhaḥ

original: hoti, tasmā pathavīdhātuyā aviyutto so kāyo sabbadā kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hotī”ti.
analyzed: hoti tasmā pathavī dhātuyā a viyuttaḥ so kāyo sabbadā kaṭṭha mukha mukha gataḥ viya hoti iti

original: Atha vā aniyamattho vā-saddo. Tatrāyamattho – “kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭho kāyo patthaddho
analyzed: atha vā aniyama atthaḥ vāsaddaḥ tatra ayam atthaḥ kaṭṭha mukhena daṭṭhaḥ kāyaḥ patthaddho

original: hoti vā na vā hoti mantāgadavasena, pathavīdhātuppakopena pana mantāgadarahito so
analyzed: hoti vā na vā hoti mantāgada vasena pathavī dhātu pakopena pana mantāgada rahito so

original: kāyo kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hoti ekantapatthaddho”ti. Pūtiyoti kuthito. Mahāvikārāni
analyzed: kāyo kaṭṭha mukha mukha gataḥ viya hoti ekanta patthaddho ti kuthitaḥ mahā vikārāni

original: bhūtānīti mahāvikārāni jātāni, vijjamānānīti vā attho. Ettha ca purimapade uttarapadassa
analyzed: bhūtāni iti mahā vikārāni jātāni vijjamānāni iti vā atthaḥ ettha ca purima pade uttara padassa

original: vikārasaddassa lopaṃ katvā “mahābhūtānī”ti vuttāni.
analyzed: vikāra saddassa lopam katvā mahābhūtāni iti vuttāni

original: Pathavītiādinā sabbalokassa pākaṭānipi vipallāsaṃ muñcitvā yathāsabhāvato pariggayhamānāni
analyzed: pathavī iti ādinā sabba lokassa vipallāsam muñcitvā yathā sabhāvato pariggayhamānāni

original: mahantena vāyāmena vinā na pariggayhantīti pākaṭānipi duviññeyyasabhāvattā “mahantānī”ti
analyzed: mahantena vā āyāmena vinā na pariggayhanti iti pākaṭāni pi du viññeyya sabhāva ttā mahantāni iti

original: vuccanti. Tāni hi suviññeyyāni amahantānīti gahetvā ṭhito tesaṃ duppariggahitataṃ
analyzed: vuccanti tāni hi su viññeyyāni amahantāni iti gahetvā ṭhitaḥ tesam duppariggahita tam

original: disvā “aho mahantāni etānī”ti pajānāti. Upādāyāti etena viññāyamānā pacchimakālakiriyā
analyzed: disvā aho mahantāni etāni iti pajānāti upādāya ati etena viññāyamānā pacchima kālakiriyā

original: pavattīti katvā “pavattarūpa”nti vuttaṃ. Evañhi “upādāyā”ti etena paṭiccasamuppannatā
analyzed: pavattī iti katvā pavatta rūpan ti vuttam evam hi upādāya ati etena paṭiccasamuppanna tā

original: vuttā hotīti. Atha vā upādāyati nissayatīti upādāyaṃ, upādāyameva rūpaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ,
analyzed: vuttā hoti iti atha vā upādāyati nissayati iti upādāyam upādāyam eva rūpam upādāya rūpam

original: aññanissayassa ekantanissitassa rūpassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ pana na sattassa, nāpi
analyzed: añña nissayassa ekanta nissitassa rūpassa itam adhivacanam tam pana na sattassa na api

original: vedanādino tadabhāvepi bhāvatoti dassetuṃ “catunnaṃ mahābhūtāna”ntiādimāha. Bhavati
analyzed: vedanā ādino tad abhāve pi bhāvato ti dassetum catunnam mahābhūtānanti ādim āha bhavati

original: hi nissayarūpānaṃ sāmibhāvoti.
analyzed: hi nissaya rūpānam sāmi bhāvaḥ ti

original: Tividharūpasaṅgahavaṇṇanā
analyzed: tividha rūpa saṅgaha vaṇṇanā

original: 585. Pakiṇṇakadukesu ajjhattikadukaṃ muñcitvā añño sabbadukehi tikavasena yojanaṃ
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka dukesu ajjhattika dukam muñcitvā sabba dukehi tika vasena yojanam

original: gacchanto natthi, viññattiduko ca yojanaṃ na gacchatīti sabbadukayogīsu ādibhūtaṃ
analyzed: gacchantaḥ natthi viññatti duko ca yojanam na gacchati iti sabba duka yogīsu ādi bhūtam

original: ajjhattikadukameva gahetvā sesehi sabbadukehi yojetvā tikā vuttā. Sakkā hi etena
analyzed: ajjhattika dukam eva gahetvā sesehi sabba dukehi yojetvā tikā vuttā sakkā hi etena

original: nayena aññesampi dukānaṃ dukantarehi labbhamānā tikayojanā viññātunti.
analyzed: nayena aññesam pi dukānam duka antarehi labbhamānā tika yojanā viññātunti

original: Catubbidhādirūpasaṅgahavaṇṇanā
analyzed: catubbidha ādi rūpa saṅgaha vaṇṇanā

original: 586. Catukkesu ekantacittasamuṭṭhānassa viññattidvayabhāvato viññattidukādīhi samānagatiko
analyzed: catukkesu ekanta citta samuṭṭhānassa viññatti dvaya bhāvataḥ viññatti duka ādīhi samāna gatikaḥ

original: cittasamuṭṭhānadukoti tena saha upādādukassa yojanāya labbhamānopi catukko na vutto,
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhāna duko ti tena saha upādā dukassa yojanāya labbhamānaḥ api catukkaḥ na vuttaḥ

original: tathā sanidassanadukādīnaṃ tena tassa ca oḷārikadūradukehi yojanāya labbhamānā na
analyzed: tathā sani dassana duka ādīnam tena tassa ca oḷārika dūra dukehi yojanāya labbhamānā na

original: vuttā, dhammānaṃ vā sabhāvakiccāni bodhetabbākārañca yāthāvato jānantena bhagavatā
analyzed: vuttā dhammānam vā sabhāva kiccāni bodhetabba ākāram ca yāthāvataḥ jānantena bhagavatā

original: tena aññesaṃ tassa ca aññehi yojanā na katāti kiṃ ettha kāraṇapariyesanāya, addhā
analyzed: tena aññesam tassa ca aññehi yojanā na katā ati kim ettha kāraṇa pariyesanāya addhā

original: sā yojanā na kātabbā, yato bhagavatā na katāti veditabbā. Aññe pana pakiṇṇakadukā
analyzed: sā yojanā na kātabbā yatas bhagavatā na katā ati veditabbā aññe pana

original: aññehi pakiṇṇakadukehi yojetuṃ yuttā, tehi yojitā eva. Vatthudukādīsu pana sotasamphassārammaṇadukādayo
analyzed: aññehi pakiṇṇaka dukehi yojetum yuttā tehi yojitā eva vatthu duka ādīsu pana sota samphassa ārammaṇa duka ādayo

original: vajjetvā aññehi ārammaṇabāhirāyatanādilabbhamānadukehi upādinnakadukassa upādinnupādāniyadukassa
analyzed: vajjetvā aññehi ārammaṇa bāhira āyatana ādi labbhamāna dukehi upādinna ka dukassa upādinna upādāniya dukassa

original: ca yojanāya catukkā labbhanti, cittasamuṭṭhānadukassa ca sabbārammaṇabāhirāyatanādilabbhamānadukehi.
analyzed: ca yojanāya catukkāḥ labbhanti citta samuṭṭhāna dukassa ca sabba ārammaṇa bāhira āyatana ādi labbhamāna dukehi

original: Avasesehi pana tesaṃ aññesañca sabbavatthudukādīhi yojanāya na labbhantīti veditabbā.
analyzed: avasesehi pana tesam aññesam ca sabba vatthu duka ādīhi yojanāya na labbhanti iti veditabbā

original: Uddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: uddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Rūpavibhatti
analyzed: rūpa vibhatti

original: Ekakaniddesavaṇṇanā
594. Avijjamānavibhāgassa vibhāgābhāvadassanameva niddeso nicchayakaraṇato, tasmā
analyzed: a vijjamāna vibhāgassa vibhāga abhāva dassanam eva niddesaḥ nicchaya karaṇato tasmā

original: “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetumevā”tiādinā vibhāgābhāvāvadhāraṇena eva-saddena niddesaṃ karoti.
analyzed: sabbam rūpam na hetum eva ati ādinā vibhāga abhāva avadhāraṇena eva saddena niddesam karoti

original: Hetuhetūti mūlahetu, hetupaccayahetūti vā ayamattho. Mahābhūtā hetūti ayamevattho
analyzed: hetu hetū iti mūla hetu hetu paccaya hetū ti vā ayam atthaḥ mahābhūtāḥ hetū iti ayam eva atthaḥ

original: mahābhūtā paccayoti etenapi vuttoti. Hetupaccayasaddānaṃ samānatthattā paccayo eva
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti etena api vuttaḥ ti hetu paccaya saddānam samāna attha ttā paccayaḥ eva

original: hetu paccayahetu. Yo ca rūpakkhandhassa hetu, so eva tassa paññāpanāya hetūti vutto
analyzed: hetu paccaya hetu yaḥ ca rūpa kkhandhassa hetu saḥ eva tassa paññāpanāya hetu iti vuttaḥ

original: tadabhāve abhāvato. Atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākanti
analyzed: tad abhāve abhāvataḥ atīta anāgata paccuppannānam kamma samādānānam ṭhānasaḥ hetusaḥ vipākam ti

original: ettha vijjamānesupi aññesu paccayesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākaniyāmakattā uttamaṃ padhānaṃ
analyzed: ettha vijjamānesu pi aññesu paccayesu iṭṭha aniṭṭha vipāka niyāmaka ttā uttamam padhānam

original: kusalākusalaṃ gatiupadhikaālapayogasampattivipattiṭṭhānanipphāditaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇañca
analyzed: kusala akusalam gati upadhika āla payoga sampatti vipatti ṭṭhāna nipphāditam iṭṭha aniṭṭha ārammaṇam ca

original: kammamiva padhānattā “hetū”ti vuttanti iminā adhippāyena kammārammaṇāni “uttamahetū”ti
analyzed: kammam iva padhāna ttā hetū ti vuttanti iminā adhippāyena kamma ārammaṇāni uttama hetū ti

original: vuttāni. Vakkhati ca “gatiupadhikālapayogā vipākassa ṭhānaṃ, kammaṃ hetū”ti. Idha
analyzed: vuttāni vakkhati ca gati upadhi kāla payogā vipākassa ṭhānam kammam hetu idha

original: pana kammamiva uttamattā ārammaṇampi hetuvacanaṃ arahatīti “uttamahetū”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pana kammam iva uttama ttā ārammaṇam pi hetu vacanam arahati iti uttama hetu iti vuttam

original: Saṅkhārānanti puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ avijjā sādhāraṇapaccayattā “hetū”ti vuttā. Pharatīti
analyzed: saṅkhāra ananti puñña abhisaṅkhāra ādīnam avijjā sādhāraṇa paccaya ttā hetu uti vuttā pharati iti

original: gacchati pāpuṇāti. Paṭikkhepaniddesoti idaṃ mātikāya āgatapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: gacchati pāpuṇāti paṭikkhepa niddeso ti idam mātikāya āgata paṭikkhepa vasena vuttam

original: Idha pana mātikāya na hetupadādisaṅgahitatā ca rūpassa vuttā taṃtaṃsabhāvattā, avadhāritatā ca anaññasabhāvato.
analyzed: idha pana mātikāya na hetu pada ādi saṅgahita tā ca rūpassa vuttā taṃ taṃ sabhāva ttā avadhārita tā ca anañña sabhāvato

original: Rūpīduke rūpīpadameva idha “rūpa”nti vuttaṃ. Tena rūpīrūpapadānaṃ ekatthatā siddhā
analyzed: rūpīduke rūpī padam eva idha rūpan ti vuttam tena rūpī rūpa padānam ekattha tā siddhā

original: hoti ruppanalakkhaṇayuttasseva rūpīrūpabhāvato. Uppannaṃ chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyanti
analyzed: hoti ruppana lakkhaṇa yuttassa iva rūpī rūpa bhāvataḥ uppannam chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyanti

original: arūpato vidhuraṃ rūpassa sabhāvaṃ dasseti. Na hi arūpaṃ uppannaṃ chahi viññāṇehi
analyzed: arūpataḥ vidhuram rūpassa sabhāvam dasseti na hi arūpam uppannam chahi viññāṇehi

original: viññeyyaṃ yathā rūpaṃ, tena rūpaṃ uppannaṃ chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyaṃ, na arūpanti
analyzed: viññeyyam yathā rūpam tena rūpam uppannam chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyam na arūpanti

original: arūpato nivattetvā rūpe eva etaṃ sabhāvaṃ niyameti, na rūpaṃ etasmiṃ sabhāve. Atthi
analyzed: arūpataḥ nivattetvā rūpe eva etam sabhāvam niyameti na rūpam etasmin sabhāve atthi

original: hi rūpaṃ atītānāgataṃ yaṃ uppannaṃ chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyasabhāvaṃ na hotīti. Etameva
analyzed: hi rūpam atīta anāgatam yam uppannam chahi viññāṇehi viññeyya sabhāvam na hoti iti etam eva

original: ca niyamaṃ puna evasaddena niyameti “yathāvutto niyamo rūpe atthi eva, arūpe viya
analyzed: ca niyamam punar eva saddena niyama iti yathā vuttaḥ niyamaḥ rūpe atthi eva arūpe viya

original: na natthī”ti. Atha vā sabbaṃ rūpanti bhūtupādāyarūpaṃ kālabhedaṃ anāmasitvā “sabba”nti
analyzed: na natthi iti atha vā sabbam rūpam iti bhūta upādāya rūpam kāla bhedam an āmasitvā sabbanti

original: vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ arūpehi samānaviññeyyasabhāvaṃ atītānāgataṃ nivattetuṃ uppannanti
analyzed: vuttam tat sabbam arūpehi samāna viññeyya sabhāvam atīta anāgatam nivattetum uppannanti

original: etena viseseti, taṃ uppannaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyamevāti attho.
analyzed: etena viseseti tat uppannam sabbam rūpam chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyam eva ati attho

original: Nanu evaṃ rūpāyatanassapi sotaviññāṇādīhi viññeyyatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati rūpaṃ
analyzed: nanu evam rūpa āyatanassa api sota viññāṇa ādīhi viññeyya tā āpajjati iti na āpajjati rūpam

original: sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā ekantalakkhaṇadassanavasena ekībhāvena gahetvā arūpato vidhurassa
analyzed: sabbam sampiṇḍetvā ekanta lakkhaṇa dassana vasena ekībhāvena gahetvā arūpataḥ vidhurassa

original: chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyasabhāvassa dassanato. Paccuppannarūpameva chahi viññāṇehi
analyzed: chahi viññāṇehi viññeyya sabhāvassa dassanato paccuppanna rūpam eva chahi viññāṇehi

original: viññeyyanti etasmiṃ pana niyame “sabbaṃ rūpa”nti etthāyaṃ viññeyyabhāvaniyamo na
analyzed: viññeyyanti etasmin pana niyame sabbam rūpan ti ettha ayam viññeyya bhāva niyamaḥ na

original: vutto, atha kho paccuppannanti sabbarūpassa ekantalakkhaṇaniyamo dassito na siyā.
analyzed: vuttaḥ atha kho paccuppanna nti sabba rūpassa ekanta lakkhaṇa niyamaḥ dassitaḥ na siyā

original: Pāḷiyañca viññeyyamevāti eva-kāro vutto, na uppannamevāti. Tasmā uppannasseva manoviññeyyaniyamāpatti
analyzed: pāḷiyam ca viññeyyam evā ti eva kāraḥ vuttaḥ na uppannam evā ti tasmai uppannassa iva manaḥ viññeyya niyama āpatti

original: natthīti kiṃ sotapatitattena, tasmā vuttanayenattho yojetabbo.
analyzed: na atthi iti kim tasmā vutta nayena atthaḥ yojetabbo

original: Kathaṃvidhanti guṇehi kathaṃ saṇṭhitaṃ. Ñāṇameva ñāṇavatthu. Samānajātikānaṃ saṅgaho,
analyzed: kathaṃvidhanti guṇehi katham saṇṭhitam ñāṇam eva ñāṇa vatthu samāna jātikānam saṅgahaḥ

original: samānajātiyā vā saṅgaho sajātisaṅgaho. Sañjāyanti etthāti sañjāti, sañjātiyā saṅgaho
analyzed: samāna jātiyā vā saṅgahaḥ sajāti saṅgahaḥ sañjāyanti ettha ati sañjāti sañjātiyā saṅgahaḥ

original: sañjātisaṅgaho, sañjātidesena saṅgahoti attho. Aññamaññopakāravasena avippayogena
analyzed: sañjātisaṅgahaḥ sañjā atidesena saṅgaho ti attho aññamañña upakāra vasena a vippayogena

original: ca samādhidese jātā sammāsatiādayo samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā. Yattha ca satiādisahāyavato
analyzed: ca samādhi dese jātā sammā sati ādayo samādhi kkhandhe saṅgahitāḥ yattha ca sati ādi sahāyavataḥ

original: samādhissa attano kiccakaraṇaṃ, so cittuppādo samādhideso. Sammāsaṅkappassa ca appanābhāvato
analyzed: samādhissa attano kicca karaṇam so cittuppādaḥ samādhi deso sammāsaṅkappassa ca appanā bhāvato

original: paṭivedhasadisaṃ kiccanti samānena paṭivedhakiccena diṭṭhisaṅkappā paññakkhandhe saṅgahitā.
analyzed: paṭivedha sadisam kiccanti samānena paṭivedha kiccena diṭṭhi saṅkappā pañña kkhandhe saṅgahitā

original: Rūpavibhattiekakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: rūpa vibhatti ekaka niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dukaniddeso
analyzed: duka niddeso

original: Upādābhājanīyakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: upādābhājanīya kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 596. Apparajakkhādisattasamūhadassanaṃ buddhacakkhu, chasu asādhāraṇañāṇesu indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ
analyzed: appara jakkha ādi satta samūha dassanam buddha cakkhu chasu asādhāraṇa ñāṇesu indriya para upari yatta ñāṇam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatadassanaṃ samantacakkhu. “Dukkhaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pariññāta”nti
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam sabba saṅkhata asaṅkhata dassanam samanta cakkhu dukkham pariññeyyam pariññātam

original: evamādinā ākārena pavattaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ ñāṇacakkhu, tampi purimadvayamiva kāmāvacaraṃ.
analyzed: evamādinā ākārena pavattam ñāṇa dassanam ñāṇa cakkhu tat pi purima dvayam iva kāmāvacaram

original: Catusaccadhammadassanaṃ dhammacakkhu. Upatthambhabhūtā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpasantatiyo
analyzed: catu acca dhamma dassanam dhammacakkhu upatthambha bhūtā catu samuṭṭhānika rūpa santatiyaḥ

original: sambhārā. Saha sambhārehi sasambhāraṃ, sambhāravantaṃ. Sambhavoti āpodhātumeva sambhavasambhūtamāha.
analyzed: sambhārā saha sambhārehi sa sambhāram sambhāravantam āha

original: Saṇṭhānanti vaṇṇāyatanameva parimaṇḍalādisaṇṭhānabhūtaṃ. Tesaṃ pana visuṃ vacanaṃ
analyzed: saṇṭhānam ti vaṇṇa āyatanam eva parimaṇḍala ādi saṇṭhāna bhūtam tesam pana visum vacanam

original: tathābhūtānaṃ atathābhūtānañca āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanānaṃ yathāvutte maṃsapiṇḍe vijjamānattā.
analyzed: tathābhūtānam a tathābhūtānam ca āpodhātu vaṇṇa āyatanānam yathāvutte maṃsa piṇḍe

original: Cuddasasambhāro hi maṃsapiṇḍo. Sambhavassa catudhātunissitehi saha vuttassa dhātuttayanissitatā
analyzed: cuddasa sambhāraḥ hi maṃsa piṇḍaḥ sambhavassa catu dhātu nissitehi saha vuttassa dhātu ttaya nissita tā

original: yojetabbā. Āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanānameva vā sambhavasaṇṭhānābhāvā visuṃ vuttāti catudhātunissitatā
analyzed: yojetabbā āpodhātu vaṇṇa āyatanānam eva vā sambhava saṇṭhāna abhāvā visum vuttā iti catu dhātu nissita tā

original: ca na virujjhati. Yaṃ maṃsapiṇḍaṃ setādinā sañjānanto na pasādacakkhuṃ sañjānāti,
analyzed: ca na virujjhati yam maṃsa piṇḍam seta ādinā sañjānantaḥ na pasāda cakkhum sañjānāti

original: patthiṇṇatādivisesaṃ vattukāmo “pathavīpi atthī”tiādi vuttampi vadati.
analyzed: patthiṇṇa tā ādi visesam vattu kāmo pathavī pi atthi itiādi vuttam pi vadati

original: Sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidesabhūteti etena avasesaṃ kaṇhamaṇḍalaṃ paṭikkhipati. Snehamiva
analyzed: sarīra saṇṭhāna uppatti desa bhūtā iti etena avasesam kaṇha maṇḍalam paṭikkhipati sneham iva

original: sattakkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāheva attano nissayabhūtāhi catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ
analyzed: satta kkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāhi iva attanaḥ nissaya bhūtāhi catūhi dhātūhi katu upakāram

original: taṃnissitehi eva āyuvaṇṇādīhi anupālitaparivāritaṃ tisantatirūpasamuṭṭhāpakehi utucittāhārehi
analyzed: tad nissitehi eva āyu vaṇṇa ādīhi anupālita parivāritam ti santati rūpa samuṭṭhāpakehi utu citta āhārehi

original: upatthambhiyamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Sattakkhipaṭalānaṃ byāpanavacanena ca anekakalāpagatabhāvaṃ
analyzed: upatthambhiyamānam tiṭṭhati satta kkhipaṭalānam byāpana vacanena ca aneka kalāpa gata bhāvam

original: cakkhussa dasseti. Pamāṇato ūkāsiramattanti ūkāsiramatte padese pavattanato vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cakkhussa dasseti pamāṇataḥ ūkāsiramattanti ūkāsiramatte padese pavattanato vuttam

original: Rūpāni manupassatīti ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Atha vā manūti macco. Upakārabhūtehi
analyzed: rūpāni manu passati iti makāro pada sandhi karo atha vā upakāra bhūtehi

original: saṅgahito. Pariyāyenāti catunnaṃ pasādo tesu ekassa dvinnañcātipi vattuṃ yutto samānadhanānaṃ
analyzed: saṅgahitaḥ pariyāyena ati catunnam pasādaḥ tesu ekassa vattum yuttaḥ samāna dhanānam

original: dhanaṃ viyāti etena pariyāyena. Sarīraṃ rūpakkhandho eva. Paṭighaṭṭanameva nighaṃso
analyzed: dhanam viyāti etena pariyāyena sarīram rūpa kkhandhaḥ eva paṭighaṭṭanam eva nighaṃsaḥ

original: paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso. Rūpābhimukhabhāvena cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayabhāvāpattisaṅkhāto
analyzed: paṭighaṭṭana anighaṃsaḥ rūpa abhimukha bhāvena cakkhu viññāṇassa nissaya bhāva āpatti saṅkhāto

original: paṭighaṭṭanato jāto vā nighaṃso paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso.
analyzed: paṭighaṭṭanataḥ jātaḥ vā nighaṃsaḥ paṭighaṭṭana anighaṃsaḥ

original: Parikappavacanaṃ “sace āpāthaṃ āgaccheyyā”ti hetukiriyaṃ, “passeyyā”ti phalakiriyañca
analyzed: parikappa vacanam sace āpātham āgaccheyya ati hetu kiriyam passeyya ati phala kiriyam ca

original: parikappetvā tena parikappena vacanaṃ. Ettha ca hetukiriyā anekattā avuttāpi viññāyatīti
analyzed: parikappetvā tena parikappena vacanam ettha ca hetu kiriyā aneka attā a vuttā api viññāyati iti

original: daṭṭhabbā. “Passe vā”ti iminā vacanena tīsupi kālesu cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayabhāvaṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā passe vā ti iminā vacanena tīsu pi kālesu cakkhu viññāṇassa nissaya bhāvam

original: anupagacchantaṃ cakkhuṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Dassane pariṇāyakabhāvo dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭho.
analyzed: an upagacchantam cakkhum saṅgaṇhāti dassane pariṇāyaka bhāvaḥ dassana pariṇāyaka ṭṭho

original: Yathā hi issaro “idañcidañca karothā”ti vadanto tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kicce sapurise pariṇāyati
analyzed: yathā hi issaraḥ idam cidam ca karotha ati vadantaḥ tasmim tasmim kicce sa purise pariṇāyati

original: pavattayati, evamidampi cakkhusamphassādīnaṃ nissayabhāvena te dhamme dassanakicce
analyzed: pavattayati evam idam pi cakkhu samphassa ādīnam nissaya bhāvena te dhamme dassana kicce

original: āṇāpentaṃ viya pariṇāyatīti cakkhūti vuccati. Cakkhatīti hi cakkhu, yathāvuttena
analyzed: āṇāpentam viya pariṇāyati iti cakkhu iti vuccati cakkhati iti hi cakkhu yathā vuttena

original: nayena ācikkhati pariṇāyatīti attho. Atha vā samavisamāni rūpāni cakkhati ācikkhati,
analyzed: nayena ācikkhati pariṇāyati iti attho atha vā sama visamāni rūpāni cakkhati ācikkhati

original: pakāsetīti vā cakkhu. Sañjāyanti etthāti sañjāti. Ke sañjāyanti? Phassādīni. Tathā
analyzed: pakāseti iti vā cakkhu sañjāyanti ettha ati sañjāti ke sañjāyanti phassa ādīni tathā

original: samosaraṇaṃ. Cakkhusamphassādīnaṃ attano tikkhamandabhāvānupavattanena indaṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: samosaraṇam cakkhu samphassa ādīnam attanaḥ tikkha manda bhāva anupavattanena indaṭṭham

original: kāretīti. Niccaṃ dhuvaṃ attāti gahitassapi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena. Vaḷañjanti pavisanti
analyzed: kāreti iti niccam dhuvam attā ati gahitassa api lujjana palujjana aṭṭhena vaḷañjanti pavisanti

original: etenāti vaḷañjanaṃ, taṃdvārikānaṃ phassādīnaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhena.
analyzed: etena ati vaḷañjanam taṃdvārikānam phassa ādīnam vaḷañjana ṭṭhena

original: 597. Pubbe vutto parikappo eva vikappanattho. Ghaṭṭayamānamevāti pasādassa abhimukhabhāvavisesaṃ gacchantameva.
analyzed: pubbe vuttaḥ parikappaḥ eva vikappana atthaḥ ghaṭṭayamānam eva ati pasādassa abhimukha bhāva visesam gacchantam eva

original: 599. Rūpaṃ ārabbha cakkhusamphassādīnaṃ uppattivacaneneva tesaṃ taṃdvārikānaṃ aññesañca
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha cakkhu samphassa ādīnam uppatti vacanena iva tesam taṃdvārikānam aññesam ca

original: rūpaṃ ārabbha uppatti vuttā hoti. Yathā ca tesaṃ rūpaṃ paccayo hoti, tena paccayena
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha uppatti vuttā hoti yathā ca tesam rūpam paccayaḥ hoti tena paccayena

original: uppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyena “iminā”tiādimāha. Tattha cakkhupasādavatthukānaṃ
analyzed: uppatti vuttā hoti iti adhippāyena iminā atiādim āha tattha cakkhu pasāda vatthukānam

original: phassādīnanti iminā vacanena tadālambanarūpārammaṇatāya taṃsadisānaṃ manodhātuādīnañca
analyzed: phassa ādīnam ti iminā vacanena tad ālambana rūpa ārammaṇa tāya manaḥ dhātu ādīnam ca

original: purejātapaccayena uppatti dassitāti daṭṭhabbā. Yattha pana viseso atthi, taṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: purejāta paccayena uppatti dassitā ati daṭṭhabbā yattha pana visesaḥ atthi tam dassetum

original: “cakkhudvārajavanavīthipariyāpannāna”ntiādimāha. Tāni hi rūpaṃ garuṃ katvā pavattamānassādanābhinandanabhūtāni
analyzed: cakkhu dvāra javana vīthi pariyāpannāna nti ādim āha tāni hi rūpam garum katvā pavatta māna ssādana abhinandana bhūtāni

original: taṃsampayuttāni ca ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayehi uppajjanti, aññāni ārammaṇapurejātenevāti
analyzed: tad sampayuttāni ca ārammaṇa adhipati ārammaṇa upanissayehi uppajjanti aññāni ārammaṇa purejātena iva āti

original: evaṃ “ārabbhā”ti vacanaṃ ārammaṇapaccayato aññapaccayabhāvassapi dīpakaṃ, ārammaṇavacanaṃ
analyzed: evam ārabbha ati vacanam ārammaṇa paccayataḥ añña paccaya bhāvassa api dīpakam ārammaṇa vacanam

original: ārammaṇapaccayabhāvassevāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccaya bhāvassa iva ati ayam etesam viseso

original: 600. Suṇātīti sotaviññāṇassa nissayabhāvena suṇāti. Jivhāsaddena viññāyamānā kiriyā
analyzed: suṇāti iti sota viññāṇassa nissaya bhāvena suṇāti jivhā saddena viññāyamānā kiriyā

original: sāyananti katvā “sāyanaṭṭhenā”ti āha. Kucchitānaṃ dukkhasampayuttaphassādīnaṃ āyoti
analyzed: sāyanam ti katvā sāyanaṭṭhena ati āha kucchitānam dukkha sampayutta phassa ādīnam

original: kāyo, dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhānaṃ vā. Kāyāyatanassa byāpitāya cakkhupasāde kāyapasādabhāvopi
analyzed: kāyaḥ dukkha dukkha vipariṇāma dukkhānam vā kāya āyatanassa byāpitāya cakkhu pasāde kāya pasāda bhāvaḥ api

original: atthi, tena cakkhupasādassa anuviddhattā no byāpitā ca na siyā, vuttā ca sā. Tasmā
analyzed: atthi tena cakkhu pasādassa anuviddha ttā no byāpitā ca na siyā vuttā ca sā tasmā

original: cakkhupasādassa phoṭṭhabbāvabhāsanaṃ kāyapasādassa ca rūpāvabhāsanaṃ āpannanti lakkhaṇasammissataṃ
analyzed: cakkhu pasādassa phoṭṭhabba avabhāsanam kāya pasādassa ca rūpa avabhāsanam āpannanti lakkhaṇa sammissa tam

original: codeti. Cakkhukāyānaṃ aññanissayattā kalāpantaragatatāya “aññassa aññattha abhāvato”ti
analyzed: codeti cakkhu kāyānam añña nissaya ttā kalāpa antara gata tāya aññassa aññattha abhāvato ti

original: āha. Rūparasādinidassanaṃ samānanissayānañca aññamaññasabhāvānupagamena aññamaññasmiṃ
analyzed: āha rūpa rasa ādi nidassanam aññam añña sabhāva anupagamena aññam aññasmin

original: abhāvo, ko pana vādo asamānanissayānanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: abhāvaḥ kaḥ pana vādaḥ asamāna nissayānam ti dassetum vuttam

original: Rūpābhighātāraho ca so bhūtappasādo cāti rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādo. Evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: rūpa abhighāta araho ca so bhūta ppasādo ca ati rūpa abhighāta araha bhūta ppasādaḥ evaṃlakkhaṇam

original: cakkhu. Rūpābhighātoti ca rūpe, rūpassa vā abhighātoti attho. Paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇāyatanattabhāvanibbattakassa
analyzed: cakkhu rūpa abhighāto ti ca rūpe rūpassa vā abhighāto ti attho paripuṇṇa a paripuṇṇa āyatana atta bhāva nibbattakassa

original: kammassa nidānabhūtā kāmataṇhā rūpataṇhā ca tadāyatanikabhavapatthanābhāvato daṭṭhukāmatādivohāraṃ
analyzed: kammassa nidāna bhūtā kāma taṇhā rūpa taṇhā ca tad āyatanika bhava patthanā bhāvataḥ daṭṭhu kāma tā ādi vohāram

original: arahatīti dutiyo nayo sabbattha vutto. Tattha daṭṭhukāmatānidānaṃ kammaṃ samuṭṭhānametesanti
analyzed: arahati iti dutiyaḥ nayaḥ sabbattha vuttaḥ tattha daṭṭhu kāma tā nidānam kammam samuṭṭhānam etesan ti

original: daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānāni, evaṃvidhānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādalakkhaṇaṃ cakkhu,
analyzed: daṭṭhu kāma tā nidāna kamma samuṭṭhānāni evaṃvidhānam bhūtānam pasāda lakkhaṇam cakkhu

original: evaṃvidho vā bhūtappasādo daṭṭhukāmatāni…pe… pasādo. Evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cakkhu. Rūpesu
analyzed: evaṃvidhaḥ vā bhūta ppasādaḥ daṭṭhu kāma tā nipe pasādaḥ evaṃlakkhaṇam cakkhu rūpesu

original: puggalassa vā viññāṇassa vā āviñchanarasaṃ.

original: visesito. Samuṭṭhāti etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ, tassa visesanaṃ nibbattakanti. Sabbāni
analyzed: visesitaḥ etena ati samuṭṭhānam tassa visesanam nibbattakanti sabbāni

original: vā etāni pariyāyavacanāni. Atthavasenāti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu kusalamūlānaṃ hetubhāvato
analyzed: vā etāni pariyāya vacanāni attha vasena ati kasmai vuttam nanu kusala mūlānam hetu bhāvato

original: dhammavasenāti yuttanti? Saccametaṃ, alobhādīnaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ samānassa mūlaṭṭhassa
analyzed: dhamma vasena ati yuttam ti saccam etam alobha ādīnam pana tiṇṇam samānassa mūla ṭṭhassa

original: vasena dassitataṃ sandhāya “atthavasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Iminā dhammoti bhāvo, atthoti
analyzed: vasena dassita tam sandhāya attha vasena ati vuttam iminā dhammo ti bhāvaḥ attho ti

original: dhammakiccaṃ adhippetanti viññāyati. “Alobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā”tiādivacanato
analyzed: dhamma kiccam adhippetanti viññāyati alobhaḥ nidānam kammānam samudayāya ati ādi vacanato

original: tāni kusalamūlāni samuṭṭhānaṃ etassātipi taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ pana tehi samuṭṭhitaṃ
analyzed: tāni kusala mūlāni samuṭṭhānam etassa atipi tat samuṭṭhānam tam pana tehi samuṭṭhitam

original: hotīti “alobhādīhi samuṭṭhita”nti āha. Te kusalamūlataṃsampayuttā samuṭṭhānaṃ etassātipi
analyzed: hoti iti alobha ādīhi samuṭṭhitanti āha te kusala mūla taṃ sampayuttā samuṭṭhānam etassa atipi

original: attho sambhavati. Ettha pana cetanaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe “taṃsampayuttā”ti samuṭṭhānabhāve
analyzed: atthaḥ sambhavati ettha pana cetanam ṭhapetvā aññe tad sampayuttā ati samuṭṭhāna bhāve

original: vattabbā. Tattha mūlehi attano paccayato kusale pariyādiyati, khandhehi sabhāvato,
analyzed: vattabbā tattha mūlehi attanaḥ paccayataḥ kusale pariyādiyati khandhehi sabhāvato

original: kammehi aññassa nibbattanakiccato. Mūlehi ca kusalānaṃ anavajjatāya hetuṃ dasseti,
analyzed: kammehi aññassa nibbattana kiccataḥ mūlehi ca kusalānam anavajja tāya hetum dasseti

original: khandhehi taṃsampayogakataṃ anavajjasabhāvaṃ, kammehi sukhavipākataṃ. Mūlehi vā nidānasampattiyā
analyzed: khandhehi tad sampayoga katam anavajja sabhāvam kammehi sukha vipākatam mūlehi vā nidāna sampattiyā

original: ādikalyāṇataṃ, khandhehi sabhāvasampattiyā majjhekalyāṇataṃ, kammehi nibbattisampattiyā
analyzed: ādi kalyāṇa tam khandhehi sabhāva sampattiyā majjhe kalyāṇa tam kammehi nibbatti sampattiyā

original: pariyosānakalyāṇataṃ.
analyzed: pariyosāna kalyāṇa tam

original: 986. Taṃ …pe… uddhaṃ akusalaṃ nāma natthīti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu vicikicchuddhaccasahagatamoho
analyzed: tam pe uddham akusalam nāma natthi iti kasmai vuttam nanu vicikicchu dhacca sahagata moho

original: atthīti? Saccametaṃ, tena pana vinā taṃsampayuttatā natthīti taṃsampayuttesu gahitesu
analyzed: atthi iti saccam etam tena pana vinā tad sampayutta tā na atthi iti tad sampayuttesu gahitesu

original: moho gahito evāti katvā “tato uddhaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ aññattha abhāvā. Ekasmiṃ ṭhitaṃ
analyzed: mohaḥ gahitaḥ evā ti katvā tatas uddham natthi iti vuttam aññattha abhāvā ekasmin ṭhitam

original: ekaṭṭhaṃ, sahajabhāvena ekaṭṭhaṃ sahajekaṭṭhaṃ. Pahātabbanti pahānaṃ, pahānabhāvena
analyzed: ekaṭṭham sahaja bhāvena ekaṭṭham sahaja ekaṭṭham pahātabbanti pahānam pahāna bhāvena

original: ekaṭṭhaṃ pahānekaṭṭhaṃ. Yena hi yaṃ saha pahātabbaṃ, tena taṃ ekasmiṃ puggale ṭhitaṃ
analyzed: ekaṭṭham pahānekaṭṭham yena hi yam saha pahātabbam tena tam ekasmin puggale ṭhitam

original: hoti, ekasmiṃ samucchinne asamucchinne ca itarassa samucchinnatāya asamucchinnatāya
analyzed: hoti ekasmin samucchinne a samucchinne ca itarassa samucchinna tāya a samucchinna tāya

original: ca vasena aññamaññāvirahitato.
analyzed: ca vasena aññamaññā virahitato

original: 987. Tīṇi lakkhaṇānīti aniccadukkhaanattatā. Nāmakasiṇasattapaññattiyo tisso paññattiyo.
analyzed: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni iti anicca dukkha anatta tā nāma kasiṇa satta paññattiyaḥ tisso paññattiyaḥ

original: Paramatthe amuñcitvā vohariyamānā vihāramañcādikā upādāpaññatti sattapaññattiggahaṇena
analyzed: param atthe a muñcitvā vohariyamānā vihāra mañca ādikā upādā paññatti satta paññatti ggahaṇena

original: gahitāti veditabbā, etāni ca lakkhaṇādīni heṭṭhā dvīsu kaṇḍesu viññattiādīni viya
analyzed: gahitā ti veditabbā etāni ca lakkhaṇa ādīni heṭṭhā dvīsu kaṇḍesu viññatti ādīni viya

original: na vuttāni, na ca sabhāvadhammāti katvā na labbhantīti vuttāni. Na hi koci sabhāvo
analyzed: na vuttāni na ca sabhāva dhammā ati katvā na labbhanti iti vuttāni na hi koci sabhāvaḥ

original: kusalattikāsaṅgahitoti vattuṃ yuttanti.
analyzed: kusala ttikā saṅgahitā iti vattum yuttam ti

original: 988. Sukhabhūmīti kāmāvacarādayopi yujjanti. Sukhasahagatā hi kāmāvacarādibhūmi sukhabhūmi.
analyzed: sukha bhūmi iti kāmāvacara ādayaḥ api yujjanti sukha sahagatā hi kāmāvacara ādi bhūmi sukha bhūmi

original: Kāmāvacarādibhūmīti ca kāmāvacarāditāya dhammā eva vuccantīti kāmāvacarādicittuppādesūti
analyzed: kāmāvacara ādi bhūmi iti ca kāmāvacara ādi tāya dhammāḥ eva vuccanti iti kāmāvacara ādi cittuppādesu uti

original: atthato viññāyati. Evañca katvā “sukhabhūmiya”nti vatvā tassā eva vibhāgadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: atthataḥ viññāyati evam ca katvā sukha bhūmiyanti vatvā tassāḥ eva vibhāga dassana ttham

original: “kāmāvacare”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhūmi-saddo ca abhidhamme kāmāvacarādīsu niruḷhoti “catūsu
analyzed: kāmāvacara itiādi vuttam bhūmi saddaḥ ca abhidhamme kāmāvacara ādīsu niruḷhaḥ ti catūsu

original: bhūmīsu kusala”ntiādīsu aññabhūmiggahaṇaṃ na hotīti. Pāḷito cāti “visiṭṭhānaṃ pākāti
analyzed: bhūmīsu kusala nti ādīsu añña bhūmi ggahaṇam na hoti iti ca ati

original: vipākā”tiādivacanatthavibhāvanena pāḷito. “Vipakkabhāvamāpannānaṃ arūpadhammānametaṃ
analyzed: vipāka ati ādi vacana attha vibhāvanena pāḷitaḥ vipakka bhāvam āpannānam arūpa dhammānam etam

original: adhivacana”ntiādinā bhāsitatthavibhāvanena atthato ca. Nāmaparicchedādīhi tikadukānaṃ
analyzed: adhivacana nti ādinā bhāsita attha vibhāvanena atthato ca nāma pariccheda ādīhi

original: vavatthānadassanena vā pāḷito, tadatthaviññāpanena atthato.
analyzed: vavatthāna dassanena vā pāḷitaḥ tad attha viññāpanena atthato

original: 991. Sāliphalanti sālipākamāha.
analyzed: sāliphalanti sālipākam āha

original: 994. Amhākaṃ mātulattheroti puggalārammaṇassapi upādānassa upādānakkhandhā eva paccayo, na lokuttarā, ko pana vādo khandhārammaṇassa. Tenāha “aggahitānī”ti.
analyzed: amhākam mātulattheraḥ ti puggala ārammaṇassa api upādānassa upādāna khandhāḥ eva paccayaḥ na lokuttarā kaḥ pana vādaḥ khandha ārammaṇassa tena āha agga hitāni iti

original: 998. Yathā upādānehi aggahetabbā anupādāniyā, evaṃ saṃkilesehi aggahetabbā asaṃkilesikāti katvā “asaṃ…pe… eseva nayo”ti āha.
analyzed: yathā upādānehi aggahetabbā anupādāniyā evam saṃkilesehi aggahetabbā asaṃkilesikā ati katvā esā iva āha

original: 1006. Diṭṭhiyā gahito attā na vijjati. Yesu pana vipallatthagāho, te upādānakkhandhāva
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā gahitaḥ attā na vijjati yesu pana vipallattha gāho te upādānakkhandhāḥ ava

original: kāyo. Tattha niccādiākārassa avijjamānatādassanatthaṃ ruppanādisabhāvasseva ca vijjamānatādassanatthaṃ
analyzed: kāyaḥ tattha nicca ādi ākārassa avijjamāna tā dassana ttham ruppana ādi sabhāvassa iva ca vijjamāna tā dassana ttham

analyzed: vijjamānaḥ kāyaḥ iti visesetvā vuttaḥ lokuttarāḥ pana na kadāci a vijjamāna ākārena gayhanti iti

original: na idaṃ visesanaṃ arahanti. Sakkāye diṭṭhi, satī vā kāye diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi. Attanā
analyzed: na idam visesanam arahanti sa kāye diṭṭhi satī vā kāye diṭṭhi sa kāya diṭṭhi attanā

analyzed: gahita ākārassa a vijjamāna tāya sayam eva satī na tāya gahitaḥ attā attaniyam vā ati atthaḥ

original: Ayaṃ panattho sambhavatīti katvā vutto, purimo eva pana padhāno. Dutiye hi diṭṭhiyā
analyzed: ayam pana atthaḥ sambhavati iti katvā vuttaḥ purimaḥ eva pana padhānaḥ dutiye hi diṭṭhiyā

original: vatthu avisesitaṃ hoti. Kāyoti hi khandhapañcake vuccamāne lokuttarāpanayanaṃ natthi.
analyzed: vatthu avisesitam hoti kāyo ti hi khandha pañcake vuccamāne lokuttara apanayanam natthi

original: Na hi lokuttaresu kāya-saddo na vattati. Kāyapassaddhiādīsu hi lokuttaresu kāya-saddopi
analyzed: na hi lokuttaresu kāya saddaḥ na vattati kāya passaddhi ādīsu hi lokuttaresu kāya saddaḥ api

original: lokuttarakkhandhavācakoti. Sīlenāti suddhiyā ahetubhūtena sīlena. Gahitasamādānanti
analyzed: sīlena ati suddhiyā ahetu bhūtena sīlena gahita samādāna ati

original: uppāditaparāmāsova. So hi samādiyanti etena kukkurasīlavatādīnīti “samādāna”nti vutto.
analyzed: uppādita parāmāsaḥ uva saḥ hi etena kukkura sīlavata ādīni iti samādānam ti vutto

original: Tattha avītikkamanīyatāya sīlaṃ, bhattivasena satataṃ caritabbatāya vataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tattha a vītikkamanīya tāya sīlam bhatti vasena satatam caritabba tāya vatam daṭṭhabbam

original: 1007. Idheva tiṭṭhamānassāti imissāyeva indasālaguhāyaṃ tiṭṭhamānassa. Vācuggatakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: idha iva tiṭṭhamānassa ati imissāya iva indasālaguhāyam tiṭṭhamānassa vācuggata karaṇam

original: uggaho. Atthaparipucchanaṃ paripucchā. Kusalehi saha codanāpariharaṇavasena vinicchayakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: uggahaḥ attha paripucchanam paripucchā kusalehi saha codanā pariharaṇa vasena vinicchaya karaṇam

original: vinicchayo. Bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhīnaṃ avihatattā tā janenti, tāhi janitāti
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ bahūnam nānappakārānam sakkāyadiṭṭhīnam avihata ttā tāḥ janenti tāhi janitā ati

original: vā puthujjanā. Avighātameva vā jana-saddo vadati. Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhullokikāti
analyzed: vā puthujjanāḥ avighātam eva vā jana saddaḥ vadati puthu

original: ettha puthū janā etesanti puthujjanāti vacanattho. Puthu…pe… avuṭṭhitāti ettha janetabbā,
analyzed: ettha puthū janāḥ etesanti puthujjanā ati vacana atthaḥ a vuṭṭhitā ati ettha janetabbā

analyzed: jāyanti vai ettha ati janāḥ gatiyaḥ puthū janāḥ etesanti puthujjanāḥ itas pare jāyanti

original: etehīti janā, abhisaṅkhārādayo. Te etesaṃ puthū vijjantīti puthujjanā. Abhisaṅkharaṇādiattho
analyzed: etehi iti janāḥ abhisaṅkhāra ādayaḥ te etesam puthū vijjanti iti puthujjanāḥ abhisaṅkharaṇa ādi attho

original: eva vā jana-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Rāgaggiādayo santāpā. Te eva sabbepi vā kilesā pariḷāhā.
analyzed: eva vā jana saddaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ rāga aggi ādayo santāpā te eva sabbe api vā kilesā pariḷāhā

original: Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesūti ettha jāyatīti jano, “rāgo gedho”ti evamādiko. Puthu jano
analyzed: puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu iti ettha jāyati iti janaḥ rāgaḥ gedhaḥ iti evamādiko puthu janaḥ

original: etesanti puthujjanā. Puthūsu vā janā jātā rattāti evaṃ rāgādiattho eva jana-saddo
analyzed: etesanti puthujjanā puthūsu vā janāḥ jātāḥ rattā ati evam rāga ādi atthaḥ eva jana saddo

original: daṭṭhabbo. Palibuddhāti sambaddhā upaddutā vā. Assutavāti etena andhatā vuttāti “andhaputhujjano vutto”ti āha.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ palibuddhā nti sambaddhā upaddutā vā assutavā ati etena andha tā vuttā ati andha puthujjanaḥ vuttaḥ iti āha

original: Anayeti avaḍḍhiyaṃ. Sabbattha niruttilakkhaṇena padasiddhi veditabbā. Anekesu ca
analyzed: anayā iti sabbattha nirutti lakkhaṇena pada siddhi veditabbā anekesu ca

original: paccekasambuddhā, tatheva dukkhitassa sakkaccaṃ kātabbaṃ karonti. Sammāsambuddho
analyzed: paccekasambuddhāḥ tathā iva dukkhitassa sakkaccam kātabbam karonti sammāsambuddhaḥ

original: pana asaṅkhyeyyaappameyyesupi kataṃ upakāraṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayañca jānāti,
analyzed: pana asaṅkhyeyya appameyyesu pi katam upakāram magga phalānam upanissayam ca jānāti

original: pākaṭañca karoti, sīho viya ca javaṃ sabbattha sakkaccameva dhammadesanaṃ karoti.
analyzed: pākaṭam ca karoti sīhaḥ viya ca javam sabbattha sakkaccam eva dhamma desanam karoti

original: Ariyabhāvoti yehi yogato ariyā vuccanti, te maggaphaladhammā daṭṭhabbā. Ariyakaradhammā

original: aniccadassanādayo, vipassiyamānā vā aniccādayo.
analyzed: anicca dassana ādayaḥ vipassiyamānāḥ vā anicca ādayaḥ

original: Sotānīti taṇhādiṭṭhikilesaduccaritaavijjāsotāni. “Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī”ti vatvā

analyzed: pāpakānam akkhanti aññāṇa kosajjānam ca anupekkhā saṅkhārehi a vivaṭṭanam sālayata ati

analyzed: catunnam ariya maggānam bhāvita ttā accantam appavatti bhāvena yam pahānanti yojanā

original: veditabbā. Kena pana pahānanti? Ariyamaggehevāti viññāyamāno ayamattho tesaṃ bhāvitattā
analyzed: veditabbā kena pana pahānan ti ariya maggehi iva āti viññāyamānaḥ ayam attho tesam bhāvita ttā

original: appavattivacanena. Samudayapakkhikassāti ettha cattāropi maggā catusaccābhisamayāti
analyzed: appavatti vacanena samudaya pakkhikassa ti ettha cattāraḥ api maggā catu sacca abhisamayā ti

original: katvā tehi pahātabbena tena tena samudayena saha pahātabbattā samudayasabhāgattā
analyzed: katvā tehi pahātabbena tena tena samudayena saha pahātabba ttā samudaya sabhāga ttā

original: ca saccavibhaṅge ca sabbakilesānaṃ samudayabhāvassa vuttattā “samudayapakkhikā”ti
analyzed: ca sacca vibhaṅge ca sabba kilesānam samudaya bhāvassa vutta ttā samudaya pakkhikā ti

original: diṭṭhiādayo vuccanti. Kāyavācācittānaṃ virūpappavattiyā nayanaṃ apayāpanaṃ, kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhi ādayaḥ vuccanti kāya vācā cittānam virūpa ppavattiyāḥ nayanam apayāpanam kāya duccarita ādīnam

original: vināsanayanaṃ vā vinayo, tesaṃ vā jimhappavattiṃ vicchinditvā ujukanayanaṃ vinayanaṃ.
analyzed: vināsa nayanam vā vinayo tesam vā jimha ppavattim vicchinditvā ujuka nayanam vinayanam

original: Eseseti eso so eva, atthato anaññoti attho. Tajjāteti atthato taṃsabhāvova. Sappuriso
analyzed: esa ise iti eso saḥ eva atthataḥ anaññaḥ ti attho tad jātā iti atthataḥ sappuriso

original: ariyasabhāvo, ariyo ca sappurisabhāvoti attho.
analyzed: ariya sabhāvaḥ ariyo ca sappurisa bhāvo ti attho

original: Advayanti dvayatārahitaṃ, vaṇṇameva “accī”ti gahetvā acciṃ vā “vaṇṇo evā”ti tesaṃ
analyzed: advayanti dvaya tā rahitam vaṇṇam eva acci iti gahetvā accim vā vaṇṇo eva ati tesam

analyzed: ekattam passantaḥ viya yathā ātakkitam attānam yathā ādiṭṭham vā rūpam attā ati

original: gahetvā tesaṃ ekattaṃ passanto daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca “rūpaṃ attā”ti imissā pavattiyā
analyzed: gahetvā tesam ekattam passantaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ ettha ca rūpam attā iti imissā pavattiyā

original: vuttā, na vaṇṇādīnaṃ viya attano vijjamānattassa, attano viya vā vaṇṇādīnaṃ avijjamānattassa dassanatthaṃ.

analyzed: sarīra nipphattiyā ti sarīra pāripūriyā nicchetum a sakkontaḥ vicinantaḥ kicchati iti

original: vicikicchā. Idappaccayānaṃ bhāvoti jātiādisabhāvameva āha, jātiādīnaṃ vā jarāmaraṇādiuppādanasamatthataṃ.

analyzed: idha anāgata kilesā tad ekaṭṭhā kilesā ati vuccanti iti te dassetuṃ imissā ca

original: 1011. Saṃyojanādīnaṃ viyāti saṃyojanatadekaṭṭhakilesādīnaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ viya. Tehīti

analyzed: dassana bhāvanā maggehi abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇam kusala akusalam nāma rūpam ca vipākan ti

analyzed: vadati ettha ca purima nayena ime dhammā dassanena apahātabba hetukā ati imā iye eva dassanena apahātabba hetukā

analyzed: na itas aññā iti ayam niyamo paññāyati na ime dassanena apahātabba hetukāya iva ati tasmā

original: 1035. Anantare niyuttāni, anantaraphalappayojanāni, anantaraphalakaraṇasīlāni vā

analyzed: ānantarikāni tāni pana paṭipakkhena a nivāraṇīya phala ttā antarāya rahitāni iti anantarāyena

original: phaladāyakānī”ti vuttaṃ. Anantarāyāni vā ānantarikānīti niruttivasena padasiddhi

analyzed: veditabbā ekasmim pi iti pi saddena anekasmim pi āyūhite vattabbam eva natthi iti dasseti

analyzed: anubala ppadānato ca natthi hetu natthi paccayaḥ sattānam saṃkilesāya ati evamādiko

original: Tañhīti ahetukādiniyatamicchādiṭṭhiṃ, na pana niyatabhāvaṃ appattaṃ.

original: 1039. Paccayaṭṭhenāti maggapaccayasaṅkhātena sampayogavisiṭṭhena paccayabhāvenāti
analyzed: paccaya ṭṭhena ati magga paccaya saṅkhātena sampayoga visiṭṭhena paccaya bhāvena ati

analyzed: veditabbam ettha ca maggaṅgānam ṭhapanam magga paccaya bhāva rahite magga hetuke dassetuṃ

original: tena maggahetuke asaṅkarato vavatthapeti. Sace pana koci vadeyya “ekekaṃ aṅgaṃ ṭhapetvā
analyzed: tena magga hetuke asaṅkarataḥ vavatthapeti sace pana koci vadeyya ekekam aṅgam ṭhapetvā

original: vuttanayenevattho veditabbo. Maggaṅgāmaggaṅgānañhi sampayuttānaṃ visesadassanattho
analyzed: vutta nayena iva atthaḥ veditabbaḥ maggaṅga amaggaṅgānam hi sampayuttānam visesa dassana tthaḥ

analyzed: ayam nayaḥ ti sesa maggaṅgānam pubbe ṭhapitānanti adhippāyaḥ phassa ādīnam hi purima naye pi

original: maggahetukatā siddhāti.
analyzed: magga hetuka tā siddhā ati

analyzed: nanu ariya magga samaṅgissa alobhaḥ adosaḥ ime dhammā magga hetu iti avatvā alobhaḥ adosaḥ

original: amoho ime dhammā maggahetū”ti visuṃ sammādiṭṭhiādike maggahetū dassetvā “taṃsampayutto…pe…
analyzed: amohaḥ ime dhammā magga hetū ti visum sammādiṭṭhi ādike magga hetū dassetvā tad sampayutta upe

original: tatiyanayo, tasmā tattha “amoho”tipi vuttaṃ. Na hi so maggahetu na hotīti. Ime pana

original: tayopi nayā atthavisesavasena nikkhittattā atthato nikkhepā daṭṭhabbā. Atha vā sarūpena
analyzed: tayo api nayā attha visesa vasena nikkhitta ttā atthataḥ nikkhepāḥ daṭṭhabbāḥ atha vā sarūpena

original: vacanaṃ dhammato nikkhepo, atthena atthatoti evampi yojanā sambhavati. Tattha dutiyatatiyanayā

analyzed: atthena ca hetu hetu mantu bhāva avagamanataḥ atthataḥ nikkhepaḥ ti

original: 1040. Yasmiṃ sabhāvadhamme ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena cittaṃ pavattati, so tassa ārammaṇādhipati
analyzed: yasmin sabhāva dhamme ninna poṇa pabbhāra bhāvena cittam pavattati saḥ tassa ārammaṇa adhipati

analyzed: veditabbaḥ cetas pariya ñāṇena jānitvā paccavekkhamāno tena paccavekkhamāno ti vutto

original: Etthāpīti etasmimpi aṭṭhakathāvacane, ettha vā paṭṭhāne maggādīni ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ
analyzed: ettha api iti etasmim pi aṭṭhakathā vacane ettha vā paṭṭhāne magga ādīni ṭhapetvā aññesam

original: adhipatipaccayabhāvassa avacaneneva paṭikkhepapāḷiyaṃ. Ayamevatthoti attano maggaphalaṃ
analyzed: adhipati paccaya bhāvassa a vacanena iva paṭikkhepa pāḷiyam ayam eva atthaḥ ti attanaḥ magga phalam

original: ṭhapetvāti attho. Vīmaṃsādhipateyyanti padhānena adhipatinā sahajātādhipati nidassito,
analyzed: ṭhapetvā ti atthaḥ vīmaṃsa ādhipateyyam ti padhānena adhipatinā sahajāta adhipati nidassito

original: tayidaṃ nayadassanamattameva hotīti aññopi evaṃpakāro sahajāto maggādhipati nidassito
analyzed: tayidam naya dassana mattam eva hoti iti aññaḥ api evaṃpakāraḥ sahajātaḥ magga adhipati nidassito

original: hoti, tasmā vīriyādhipateyyanti ca yojetabbaṃ. Idampi hi atthato vuttamevāti.
analyzed: hoti tasmā vīriya ādhipateyyanti ca yojetabbam idam pi hi atthataḥ vuttam eva ati

original: 1041. Attano sabhāvo attabhāvo. Laddhokāsassa kammassa vipāko kappasahassātikkame
analyzed: attano sabhāvaḥ attabhāvaḥ laddha ukāsassa kammassa vipāko kappa sahassa atikkame

original: yaṃ bhavissati, tadapi laddhokāsamevāti attano vipākaṃ sandhāya vuccati. Natthi nāma
analyzed: yat bhavissati tat api laddha ukāsam eva ati attanaḥ vipākam sandhāya vuccati natthi nāma

original: arūpabhavaṅgaṃ āha. Tattha ākāsānañcāyatanasaññādimayo attāti hi atthato vohāro pavattoti.
analyzed: arūpa bhavaṅgam āha tattha ākāsa anañcāyatana saññā ādi mayaḥ attā iti hi atthataḥ vohāro pavatto ti

original: Yadi pana āyū…pe… sabbaṃ vipākaṃ dadeyya, aladdhokāsañca vipākaṃ detīti katvā vipakkavipākañca
analyzed: yadi pana āyūpe sabbam vipākam dadeyya a laddha ukāsam ca vipākam deti iti katvā vipakka vipākam ca

original: dadeyya, tato ekasseva kammassa sabbavipākena bhavitabbanti aññassa kammassa okāso
analyzed: dadeyya tatas ekassa iva kammassa sabba vipākena bhavitabbanti aññassa kammassa okāsaḥ

original: na bhaveyya niratthakattā, uppattiyāyeva okāso na bhaveyya, uppannassa vā phaladāne.
analyzed: na bhaveyya niratthaka ttā uppattiyāya iva okāsaḥ na bhaveyya uppannassa vā phala dāne

original: Atha vā aladdhokāsassa vipākadāne paccayantararahitassapi vipākadānaṃ āpannanti avijjātaṇhādipaccayantarakhepakassa
analyzed: atha vā aladdha ukāsassa vipāka dāne paccaya antara rahitassa api vipāka dānam āpannanti avijjā taṇhā ādi paccaya antara khepakassa

original: aññassa apacayagāmikammassa kammakkhayakarassa okāso na bhaveyya. Bhāvitepi magge

original: avijjādipaccayantararahitassa ca kammassa vipaccanato samatthatā na siyāti attho.
analyzed: avijjā ādi paccaya antara rahitassa ca kammassa vipaccanataḥ samattha tā na siyāti attho

original: Sabbadā vā vipākappavattiyā eva bhavitabbattā vipākato aññassa pavattiokāso na bhaveyya.

analyzed: upādinnā ati ettha na upetena ādinnā ati ayam attho upasaddo pana upasagga mattam eva

analyzed: duka nikkhepa kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: ekaccam attānam hoti iti niccatas aññam ca na hoti iti aniccatas gaṇhantassa hoti ca

analyzed: pañca kāmaguṇikaḥ rāgaḥ kāmāsavaḥ ti vutto ti katvā brahmānam vimāna ādīsu rāgassa diṭṭhi rāgassa

analyzed: catūsu diṭṭhi gata vippayuttesu lobha sahagatesu cittuppādesu uppannaḥ mohaḥ siyā āsava sampayutto

original: 1320. Ekekasmiñca attāti ca lokoti ca gahaṇavisesaṃ upādāya “attā ca loko cā”ti vuttaṃ.

analyzed: siddhitaḥ evam api yathā kammūpaga ñāṇassa a vitakka vicāra mattāḥ khandhāḥ

original: Dukaatthuddhāravaṇṇanā

analyzed: mānaḥ pe ekadhāvā ti idam avutta ppakāra dassana vasena vuttam aññathā mānaḥ kāma rāga avijjā saññojanehi

original: Heṭṭhimaparicchedenāti uddhaccassa sabbākusale uppajjanato uddhaccasahagate dve,
analyzed: heṭṭhima paricchedena ati uddhaccassa sabba akusale uppajjanataḥ uddhacca sahagate dve

original: cāti ayamattho sambhavati, heṭṭhimantena tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “dve”ti vuttaṃ. Tato

original: uddhampi pavattiyaṃ ayamattho sambhavati evāti dassanatthaṃ “tīṇī”ti vuttaṃ. Dve

original: tīṇīti ca dve vā tīṇi vāti aniyamaniddesoti cattāri vā pañca vātipi viññāyati. Yattha
analyzed: tīṇi iti ca dve vā tīṇi vā ati aniyama niddeso ti cattāri vā pañca vā atipi viññāyati yattha

original: sahuppatti, tattha nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā ca hontīti etassa vā lakkhaṇassa

original: dassanametanti. Yattha cattāri pañca ca uppajjanti, tattha cāyamattho sādhito hoti.
analyzed: dassanam etat ti yattha cattāri pañca ca uppajjanti tattha ca ayam atthaḥ sādhitaḥ hoti

original: Evañca katvā kilesagocchake ca “dve tayo”ti vuttaṃ. Lakkhaṇadassanavasena hi kilesā
analyzed: evam ca katvā kilesa gocchake ca dve tayo ti vuttam lakkhaṇa dassana vasena hi kilesā

original: ceva kilesasampayuttā ca vuttā, na sabbesaṃ sambhavantānaṃ sarūpena dassanavasenāti.
analyzed: ca iva kilesa sampayuttā ca vuttā na sabbesam sambhavantānam sarūpena dassana vasena ati

original: Yadi uddhaccaṃ sabbākusale uppajjati, kasmā vuttaṃ “uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccasahagate
analyzed: yadi uddhaccam sabba akusale uppajjati kasmai vuttam uddhacca nīvaraṇam uddhacca sahagate

original: cittuppāde uppajjatī”ti? Suttante vuttesu pañcasu nīvaraṇesu aññanīvaraṇarahitassa
analyzed: cittuppāde uppajjati iti suttante vuttesu pañcasu nīvaraṇesu añña nīvaraṇa rahitassa

original: uddhaccassa visayavisesadassanatthaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ pana nīvaraṇaṃ abhidhamme itarehi
analyzed: uddhaccassa visaya visesa dassana attham chaṭṭham pana nīvaraṇam abhidhamme itarehi

original: sahagatanti tassa aññanīvaraṇarahitassa na koci visayaviseso atthi, attanā sahagatehi
analyzed: sahagatanti tassa añña nīvaraṇa rahitassa na koci visaya viseso atthi attanā sahagatehi

original: vinā uppajjanaṭṭhānābhāvā tadupalakkhitassa cittuppādassa abhāvā ca nattheva visayaviseso,
analyzed: vinā uppajjana ṭṭhāna abhāvā tad upalakkhitassa cittuppādassa abhāvā ca natthi iva visaya viseso

original: tasmā “taṃ sabbākusale uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Uddhaccasahagato pana vuttacittuppādo
analyzed: tasmā tam sabba akusale uppajjati iti vuttam uddhacca sahagataḥ pana vutta cittuppādaḥ

original: sesadhammānaṃ uddhaccānuvattanabhāvena tadupalakkhito uddhaccassa visayaviseso, tasmā
analyzed: sesa dhammānam uddhacca anuvattana bhāvena tad upalakkhitaḥ uddhaccassa visaya viseso tasmā

original: sabbākusale uppajjamānaṃ uddhaccaṃ sāmaññena “uddhaccanīvaraṇa”nti gahetvāpi taṃ
analyzed: sabba akusale uppajjamānam uddhaccam sāmaññena uddhacca nīvaraṇanti gahetvā api tam

original: attano visayavisesena pakāsetuṃ “uddhaccasahagate cittuppāde uppajjatī”ti āha. Evañca
analyzed: attanaḥ visaya visesena pakāsetum uddhacca sahagate cittuppāde uppajjati iti āha evam ca

original: pakāsanaṃ visayavisesesu lobhadomanassasahagatasasaṅkhārikavicikicchuddhaccasahagatesu
analyzed: pakāsanam visaya visesesu lobha domanassa sahagata sasaṅkhārika vicikicchu ddhacca sahagatesu

original: pañca nīvaraṇāni vavatthapetvā tesaṃ byāpakabhāvena chaṭṭhaṃ pakāsetuṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: pañca nīvaraṇāni vavatthapetvā tesam byāpaka bhāvena chaṭṭham pakāsetum katam ti veditabbam

original: Keci pana “uddhaccasahagateti sāmaññena sabbaṃ uddhaccaṃ ‘uddhacca’nti gahetvā tena
analyzed: keci pana uddhacca sahagata iti sāmaññena sabbam uddhaccam uddhaccanti gahetvā tena

original: sahagate cittuppāde”ti vadanti, ayaṃ panattho na bahumato dvādasamacittuppādassa
analyzed: sahagate cittuppāde iti vadanti ayam pana atthaḥ na bahu mataḥ dvādasama cittuppādassa

original: viya sabbākusalacittuppādānaṃ uddhaccena anupalakkhitattā, sati ca upalakkhitatte
analyzed: viya sabba akusala cittuppādānam uddhaccena anupalakkhita ttā sati ca upalakkhita tte

original: “aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatesū”tiādīsu viya aññesaṃ cittuppādānaṃ nivattanatthaṃ “dvādasasu
analyzed: aṭṭhasu lobha sahagatesu tiādīsu viya aññesam cittuppādānam nivattana attham dvādasasu

original: uddhaccasahagatesū”ti vattabbattā. Uddhaccānupalakkhitattā pana sabbākusalānaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ
analyzed: uddhacca sahagatesu iti vattabba ttā uddhacca anupalakkhita ttā pana sabba akusalānam avijjā nīvaraṇam

original: viya idampi “sabbākusalesu uppajjatī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, na pana vuttaṃ, tasmā vuttanayeneva
analyzed: viya idam pi sabba akusalesu uppajjati iti vattabbam siyā na pana vuttam tasmā vutta nayena iva

original: attho veditabbo. Yasmā ca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ viya uddhaccanīvaraṇañca sabbākusalesu
analyzed: atthaḥ veditabbaḥ yasmā ca avijjā nīvaraṇam viya uddhacca nīvaraṇam ca sabba akusalesu

original: uppajjati, tasmā nikkhepakaṇḍe “kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇena nīvaraṇañceva
analyzed: uppajjati tasmā nikkhepa kaṇḍe kāmacchanda nīvaraṇam uddhacca nīvaraṇena nīvaraṇam ca iva

original: nīvaraṇasampayuttañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena ekasmiṃyeva cittuppāde uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ
analyzed: nīvaraṇa sampayuttam ca atiādi vuttam tena ekasmin yeva cittuppāde uddhacca nīvaraṇam

original: uppajjatīti aggahetvā adhippāyo maggitabboti.
analyzed: uppajjati iti aggahetvā adhippāyaḥ maggitabbaḥ ti

original: Kilesagocchake lobhādīni dasa kilesavatthūni iminā anukkamena idheva abhidhamme āgatāni.
analyzed: kilesa gocchake lobha ādīni dasa kilesa vatthūni iminā anukkamena idha iva abhidhamme āgatāni

original: Tasmā idheva vuttassa uddhaccakilesassa attanā saha vuttehi kilesehi rahitassa visayaviseso
analyzed: tasmai idha iva vuttassa uddhacca kilesassa attanā saha vuttehi kilesehi rahitassa visaya visesaḥ

original: natthīti visayavisesena pakāsanaṃ akatvā “uddhaccañca ahirikañca anottappañca sabbākusalesu
analyzed: natthi iti visaya visesena pakāsanam a katvā uddhaccam ca ahirikam ca anottappam ca sabba akusalesu

original: uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kilesā ceva saṃkiliṭṭhapadaniddese yasmā saṃkiliṭṭhapadaṃ kilesasampayuttapadena
analyzed: uppajjati iti vuttam kilesā ca iva saṃkiliṭṭha pada niddese yasmā saṃkiliṭṭha padam kilesa sampayutta padena

original: asamānatthaṃ kevalaṃ malena upatāpitataṃ vibādhitatañca dīpeti, tasmā kilesā ceva
analyzed: asamāna attham kevalam malena dīpeti tasmā kilesā ca iva

original: kilesasampayuttapadaniddesena samānaṃ niddesaṃ akatvā “teva kilesā kilesā ceva saṃkiliṭṭhā cā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: kilesa sampayutta pada niddesena samānam niddesam a katvā te iva kilesā kilesā ca iva saṃkiliṭṭhā ca ati vuttam

original: 1577. Dve tayo kilesāti ettha “dve tayoti hetugocchakādīsu vuttādhikāravasena ruḷhiyā
analyzed: dve tayo kilesā ati ettha dve tayo iti hetu gocchaka ādīsu vutta adhikāra vasena

original: vutta”nti keci vadanti. Yadi atthaṃ anapekkhitvā ruḷhiyā vucceyya, ganthagocchake
analyzed: vuttanti keci vadanti yadi attham an apekkhitvā ruḷhiyā vucceyya gantha gocchake

original: ca “yattha dve tayo ganthā ekato uppajjantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Yañca vadanti “yattha
analyzed: ca yattha dve tayaḥ ganthāḥ ekatas uppajjanti iti vattabbam siyā yat ca vadanti yattha

original: dve tayo aññehi ekato uppajjantīti imassatthassa sambhavato ekato-saddo kilesagocchake
analyzed: dve tayo aññehi ekatas uppajjanti iti imassa atthassa sambhavataḥ ekatasaddaḥ kilesa gocchake

original: sātthako, na hetugocchakādīsu tena vināpi adhippāyavijānanato”ti, tampi na, hetugocchakādīsupi
analyzed: na hetu gocchaka ādīsu tena vinā api adhippāya vijānanato ti na hetu gocchaka ādīsu pi

original: nānāuppattiyaṃ hetū ceva hetusampayuttādiggahaṇanivāraṇatthattā ekato-saddassa, tasmā
analyzed: hetū ca iva hetu sampayutta ādi ggahaṇa nivāraṇa atthattā ekatas saddassa tasmā

original: ruḷhīanvatthakathāropanañca vajjetvā yathāvutteneva nayena attho veditabboti. Lobho
analyzed: ruḷhī anvattha kathā āropanam ca vajjetvā yathā vuttena iva nayena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ iti lobho

original: chadhātiādinā lobhapaṭighamohānaṃ aññehi ekato uppattidassaneneva tesampi lobhādīhi
analyzed: chadhā ti ādinā lobha paṭigha mohānam aññehi ekatas uppatti dassanena iva tesam pi lobha ādīhi

original: ekato uppatti dassitāti veditabbā. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
analyzed: ekatas uppatti dassitā ati veditabbā sesam uttāna attham eva ati

original: Aṭṭhakathākaṇḍavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā kaṇḍa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Cattāri ca sahassāni, puna tīṇi satāni ca;
analyzed: cattāri ca sahassāni puna tīṇi satāni ca

original: Aṭṭhasāliniyā ete, padā līnatthajotakā.
analyzed: aṭṭhasāliniyā ete padā līna attha jotakā

original: Dhammamittoti nāmena, sakkaccaṃ abhiyācito;
analyzed: dhammamitto ti nāmena sakkaccam abhiyācitaḥ

original: Ānandoiti nāmena, katā ganthā subuddhināti.
analyzed: nāmena katā ganthā

original: Iti aṭṭhasāliniyā līnatthapadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: iti aṭṭhasāliniyā līna ttha pada vaṇṇanā

original: Dhammasaṅgaṇī-mūlaṭīkā samattā.
